story:
KIWEE Triangle Pouch

 

In 2015, three designers chose to challenge themselves by designing a brand from scratch. By chance, they came across some fishermen off the coast. The three designers were fascinated by the old-fashioned work trousers the fishermen wore. It was here especially the long durability and high durability that caught their interest. It inspired them to design durable and sustainable bags. 12 months later, they produced their first product, a 'fisherman backpack' made from the same material that fishermen carry daily. This was the starting shot for KIWEE.

KIWEE designs and manufactures sustainable design bags and backpacks that support free movement and life on the go. KIWEE's square backpacks in waterproof microfiber keep your things dry, even when it's raining. "Fisherman Backpack" and the yellow tote bag are also in waterproof microfiber, and they are also our special favorites.

We present you the new Triangle Puch. It's a must have product.

 

Velcro Strap

Take a look at the Velcro Strap, which attaches and detaches effortlessly, keeping your belongings safe and secured. 

Be cool - Be different - Be yourself

 

It comes with many shapes and colors

 

Compact yet spacious 

Walk the streets with confidence

Dine out in style

This bag is suitable for every situation. And it will be noticed. In a good way.

Where does the contribution go?

We use your valuable contribution towards improving our brand, adding fuel to our marketing and further developing our products.

Thank you for being a part of our journey!

story:
http://www.smarteralex.com


WHAT'S SO SMART ABOUT SMARTERALEX ROOM MONITORS?

SmarterAlex are incredibly clever little devices – just slightly larger than a bar of soap – and are packed with the latest technology.

SmarterAlex contains its own mobile phone modem so works entirely independently of WiFi or local internet connectivity and has an internal rechargeable battery so can continue to operate in case of power failure, making it perfect for commercial applications. 

SmarterAlex is a range of stand-alone units containing a number of different sensors. Different models are equipped with different sensors to address specific requirements or all sensors can be combined into a single unit. The range of sensors is ever increasing and currently consists of temperature, humidity, light, power failure, movement of the unit, movement in the vicinity, intruder camera and GPS. Temperature monitoring is further extended by a temperature probe which can be inserted inside a fridge/freezer or other location. 


SMALL & MIGHTY

The SmarterAlex monitor is housed in a simple minimalist white casing, just a touch larger than a bar of soap, which fits discreetly in to most situations. Extremely versatile, light to hold and can be fixed to a wall; a fridge; it can also operate whilst free standing and be carried in a case.


BEAUTIFULLY CONVENIENT

The SmarterAlex interface has been designed to work on all your devices, using either our custom built mobile app, or straight from the web. You can enjoy total control of your SmarterAlex monitor, where-ever you are.



WHAT CAN I USE MY SMARTERALEX ROOM MONITOR FOR?

Which box ?

Because of its smart design, we have tailored to the specific needs of
the customer by developing a range of units, each with a specific task.

There is of course a single unit which encapsulates all the sensors in
one box if that is what your application demands!

There are four core units that operate to a specific task.


Driven by the Customer

Too much technology is driven  without a thought for the end-user. Technology for  technology sake. At SmarterAlex, we have the heart of the customer in every decision we make. 

So we are guided by three principles :

Ease of use, products shouldn’t be challenging or mystifying. You buy it, plug it in, it sets itself up and you’re up and running. Simple!

Technology should be intelligent and provide the services the customer actually wants. Not only that it should evolve but also have the ability to grow to accommodate future needs.

Technology should empower the user, giving them more control over their lives. As a result we have created a range of monitors to suit each individual needs as well as an "all in one" unit.









ENVIRONMENT

Light, Humidity, Temperature and Power.

Monitors light, room temperature, humidity and power. We all want to try and be ‘a bit greener’ in our approach and this handy unit has been designed specifically to monitor light, humidity and temperature and the recorded data can be collated to provide a valuable source of information over specific periods of time and can show the interaction between the monitored functions .This monitoring can result in valuable cost savings.

Designed for use in greenhouses, homes, food tunnels, wine cellars, hydroponics, art galleries, museums and rooms containing environmentally sensitive equipment.


TEMPERATURE

Temperature probe for fridges/freezers.

Measures room temperature and also has a probe which can monitor the temperature of a fridge or freezer, it is ideal for:

  • The restaurant and cafe trade, hotel kitchens
  • Food retailers large and small
  • Alerting home owners someone has left the fridge freezer door open
  • Alerting holiday makers their fridge freezer is on the blink

Specifically designed for monitoring locations where temperature is not only a critical factor but where for commercial reasons data has to be stored, analysed and collated for compliance purposes. A cabled thermocouple sensor (which can be placed in the actual fridge/freezer) is linked into the monitor that reports data back to the user.




SECURITY / SECURITY +

Movement detector and movement camera.

Monitors motion using the built-in motion sensor and camera and optionally, with the Security + unit, includes a GPS (Global Positioning System). Not only can SmarterAlex alert you if it spots a potential intruder, it can also keep you updated of its own whereabouts if located in a bag/briefcase. Perfect anywhere where mobile or portable security is needed.

In addition a built-in camera will take a snapshot and send it straight to you if it detects movement, so you can see whether you need to take action or not. This function is great in homes, restaurants and cafes, museums, commercial premises, libraries, greenhouses.

Location Examples: Place the monitor on a hotel bedroom wall and it can detect someone entering the room. Use it in your briefcase/hand bag and receive an alert if someone moves it. In both instances you will be notified immediately and it will also take a photo which can be down loaded giving the possibility of the intruder being captured on film. The Security+ version is also capable of being tracked using GPS so you can ascertain its location.


ALL-IN-ONE

Environment. Temperature. Security +

The All-In-One incorporates all the features in the Environment, Temperature and Security Plus versions wrapped up in a single unit giving a substantial cost saving and provides you with a truly awesome monitor!

This unit provides a full monitoring procedure for whatever uses you have in mind. Utilising our unique cloud based services the data can be collated to your specific requirements.

Location Examples: This device can be located in both stationary and moving locations dependent on the tasks you need it to carry out. Its versatility allows you to carry it with you for motion protection and also to monitor temperature/humidity and light in a static location. Especially useful for travelers and those on the move. Also, it can be moved around the house to suit your different needs throughout the year. As an example: Winter time-monitor bedroom temperature and Summer time monitor greenhouse temperature, humidity and light. At night the motion sensor can monitor activity outside your bedroom door or in the hallway/back door.





HOW DO I SET MY SMARTERALEX UP?

Monitored from your computer or mobile device, SmarterAlex informs you
when a sensor triggers an alert  - whether that is a temperature change which may indicate equipment failure, movement that could mean an potential intrusion or a power failure which stops equipment from working - SmarterAlex will instantly send a text, email or voice message notifying you of the event.


SmarterAlex is very easy to set up. You sign up to an online account. Using a pre-bought SIM card or one supplied by us, you enter the telephone number and then switch on the unit to activate… it’s really as simple as that !



From that point on, whenever you log on to your online account you can immediately access the data your SmarterAlex is recording. You define the rules. You use the simple set-up screen that allows you to define what alerts you wish to receive and when they are to be sent. From that point on you can relax in the knowledge that RoomMonitor will be keeping a watchful eye 24/7 on those things important to you.


At any time you can adjust, switch on or off, any element of the monitoring using the online account or the mobile app to suit your needs. You’re in control.


Not being there doesn’t mean that you can’t respond when something is wrong. As soon as SmarterAlex senses an event outside your pre-set levels it will immediately inform you by SMS, Email or Voice Message. You choose how to respond. The SmarterAlex app will offer you suggestions such as 'escalate', 'remind', 'call a third party' or simply 'ignore'. You can even check in to make sure everything is OK, just for peace of mind. With the SmarterAlex room monitor you can do this virtually anywhere, from the other side of the globe, to the comfort of your bed. You’re always in control.




SMARTERALEX'S TECH SPECS



SmarterAlex is a compact, lightweight unit containing a processor board
with sensors, a back-up battery and a modem that accepts a mobile SIM card.

It can be stand alone on any horizontal surface or be mounted on a vertical surface with no requirement for any DIY skills using the simple self-adhesive mounting pads supplied. It operates at 5 Volts and comes supplied with a UK three pin plug. Internally a battery is fitted to facilitate back up power in the event of a power failure or interruption to enable the unit to maintain the data link.

Once you open the box you insert the prepay SIM card provided (if requested) or purchase your own. Plug the unit in. Go online, to set up your account. It is as simple as that.


Case: 110m x 70mm x 37.5mm, 100g

Modem: GSM/GPRS: 850 MHz/900 MHz/1800 MHz/1900 MHz

Battery: Lithium Polymer 980mAh (2-12 hours depending on configuration)

Temperature probe: 1m length, -75°C to +250°C

Accelerometer: 3 axis, vibration/movement

Movement sensor: 12m range, 102° angle

Humidity: 0-100% +/- 3%

Temperature: -40°C to +125°C +/- 1%

Light: 1-64,000 Lux

Camera: VGA (640×480) with InfraRed LED


SmarterAlex uses the cloud to store data


You will get an alert through which ever method you choose. Or you can go on line at any-time to check the current status of the environment you are monitoring.  

- Easy to set-up

- Easy to customise

- Has real-time notification


Access from anywhere

The SmarterAlex solution is accessed by users using a Web Browser.
This is the gateway into the system so complies with standards for
accessibility, security and privacy as well as allow customization for language
and themes. The user must be able to use any common browser and any common device to access the site.


Service Plans

With SmarterAlex, the app and primary service plan are free, and accessible via as many phones as you'd like. That means you can download the app, receive alerts, add your friends or family as your backup, and monitor sensor data.

After the products ship, there will be additional (optional) service plans that include more data options such as storing events over a longer period or time. These premium plans will have a surcharge but are optional and contract-free.

Please note, contrubuting to the campaign here in no way signs you up for a paid service plan. Updates to the app are free for users as well.


STILL HAVE SOME QUESTIONS?

Will SmarterAlex use other than UK power sockets?

All units will work in any country. We supply a standard USB lead that can be used in any USB power socket.

When will I receive my SmarterAlex?

March 2015-We plan to initialise the manufacturing process as soon as we reach our funding target. We estimate the tooling; manufacturing and assembling will take 3-4 months.

How long will the SmarterAlex internal battery last?

The battery is designed to power the units for at least 8 hours in the event of mains power failure – but it will also alert you when the battery is going flat! Because the Security model is intended for mobile use, an extended battery allows use for upto 24 hours.

Is an internet connection required for SmarterAlex to work?

No – SmarterAlex is not dependent on your Internet connection because there is 2G/3G capability built-in which allows SmarterAlex to work independently. This is what differentiates SmarterAlex from other devices, it will keep you connected to what matters to you.

Is there a limit on the number of SmarterAlex that can be installed?

Quite simply no! You can have as many as you wish, in the house, in the garden, in the garage. They are independent units.

Can I have more than one SmarterAlex on my account?

You can operate as many SmarterAlex as you wish from your main account. However you may want to divide the information into separate accounts which is not a problem.

Where can I put my SmarterAlex?

Because SmarterAlex is not dependent on WiFi you can put them pretty much anywhere (within reason!!) as long as there is a power socket handy.

Do I have to buy a SIM card from you, and is it easy to install?

No you don’t. You can buy any type of SIM only card package, from any network. Just bear in mind that the data stream is continuous, so don’t forget to ‘Top-Up’ your data! Installation is simple; just insert the SIM card into the slot provided (see drawing), register the card number on your online account and you’ll be up and running.

The Modem contained in the SmarterAlex range works at GSM/GPRS:850Mhz/900MHz/1000MHz/1900MHz. The modem will not operate in countries which do not support these frequencies

What about International Shipping?

If you're in the UK you will receive SmarterAlex by Royal Mail Special Delivery.

We will ship internationally but do bear in mind that it is the responsibility of the purchaser to pay any charges relating to importing a product from the UK.

Some International shipments may be subject to UK or US shipping restrictions. If this applies to your shipment we will offer a full refund.


If you have any other questions please let us know!


We want you to feel a part of the SmarterAlex future!


Carrying out research and development to produce cutting edge technology is time consuming and expensive but with your support and enthusiasm for the SmarterAlex range of monitors we can enter into our final phase and deliver you your chosen monitor by March of next year. Like the rest of the SmarterAlex set up our manufacturers are UK based and have been established for over 30 years with a proven track record of excellence in the world of technology. To make this a cost effective production we have to order a minimum number of monitors and with your help we know we can meet that target figure.

Current Progress: We already have fully functional prototype versions that are up and running. SmarterAlex now has to move to the next and final development stage. We will be providing regular progress reports to keep you up to date.

Manufacturing Production Plan: Production needs cash up front to start the process and this includes making high quality plastic moulds; buying top quality circuit boards, batteries switches etc.  With your support we can move to the final phase and end up with a top quality marketable product that you will be proud to own and use.

The End Product: A range of monitors specifically designed to provide a number of every day practical sensors with the addition of the SmarterAlex unique cloud servicing ability to store and collate data that can together be used to enhance everyday living; the versatility and functionality of the monitors can make your day to day living easier to control and to provide a less stressful environment in which to work, rest and play.



THE SMARTERALEX JOURNEY

story:
The Project & Rewards

The original Limited Edition 2" Cyber-Rex pin set

The Original 4 Designs & Display Boards for your pin(s)

 

Shipping 

USA (1-2 Weeks)
                                                            $3.00
                                                            First Class Mail USPS
                                                            Tracking Included
 

International (2-4 Weeks)
                                                            $15.00
                                                            First Class Mail USPS
                                                            Tracking Included

All of the packages will be safely packed in a bubble mailers. I will not be responsible if the package gets lost during the delivery process! If you wish to upgrade to a tracked package, please send me a message and I'll let you know how much extra to add to your pledge! 

If you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact me.

Thank you so much for stopping by and I hope you enjoyed my campaign! 

- Brandon

 

Risks & Challenges

I work with a very reliable manufacturer and the designs have already been approved for production! However, there is always a small defect rate in enamel pins - same with condoms. 
These are pins with a very small defect, If the defect rate is higher than 10%, then I will contact the manufacturer about getting replacements, which could delay the shipment process.

If there are any shipping delays, I will be sure to update everyone!

Please keep in mind the colors of the pins may differ from the colors you may see on your screen ever so slightly. Also, be cautious if you have a metal allergy! Or an allergy to dinosaurs! Or Cybernetics!!!

Shipping for domestic and international are available and will be handled by USPS. Please ensure that your address is correct to avoid lost packages.
story_txt: The Project & RewardsThe original Limited Edition 2" Cyber-Rex pin setThe Original 4 Designs & Display Boards for your pin(s) Shipping USA (1-2 Weeks)                                                            $3.00                                                            First Class Mail USPS                                                            Tracking Included International (2-4 Weeks)                                                            $15.00                                                            First Class Mail USPS                                                            Tracking IncludedAll of the packages will be safely packed in a bubble mailers. I will not be responsible if the package gets lost during the delivery process! If you wish to upgrade to a tracked package, please send me a message and I'll let you know how much extra to add to your pledge! If you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact me.Thank you so much for stopping by and I hope you enjoyed my campaign! - Brandon Risks & ChallengesI work with a very reliable manufacturer and the designs have already been approved for production! However, there is always a small defect rate in enamel pins - same with condoms. These are pins with a very small defect, If the defect rate is higher than 10%, then I will contact the manufacturer about getting replacements, which could delay the shipment process.If there are any shipping delays, I will be sure to update everyone!Please keep in mind the colors of the pins may differ from the colors you may see on your screen ever so slightly. Also, be cautious if you have a metal allergy! Or an allergy to dinosaurs! Or Cybernetics!!!Shipping for domestic and international are available and will be handled by USPS. Please ensure that your address is correct to avoid lost packages.

story:
(Klicke hier für die deutsche Beschreibung)

What is Apson?

Apson is a web-site where you can customize, design and order individual bespoke shirts. This platform is the missing link to get you the shirt you always wanted: a shirt that is made specially for you – your individual design in your unique size. At the same time, you will feel good knowing that your shirt is not made in a sweatshop, but is tailored by small Thai enterprises.


How does Apson work?

Apson is the platform where you choose between different fabrics and assemble the different patterns (collar, cuffs, pockets, button tab, finishing, etc.) to your own design. Premium features will be available (fabric mix & match, premium buttons, etc.).
We have several ways to take your measurements to make sure that the shirt will fit. You can choose a standard-size and alter the needed parts, you can use your own unique measurements according to our guide, or you can try our app to be measured via your webcam. 
In any case the shirt will be unique and perfectly made for you.

The power of the crowd

Each great idea needs material support to get realized. Apson will be great from the start on: great in design, great in handling, great in experience. Therefore, an initial capital of €5.000 is needed to kickstart the process. To gather this initial capital, Shirt-Futures are on sale. Help kickstarting Apson, by getting one!

Shirt-Future?

Buy one of our Shirt-Futures and look forward to your first Apson shirt. As soon as Apson is ready to go, your unique shirt will wait for you at your doorstep. No extra costs, no hustle – just pure enjoyment over the quality from your piece of individuality.

Bulletproof

100 sold Shirt-Futures are the lower limit. If they are sold within 30 days, Apson is sufficiently founded and ready to go. In the unlikely case not enough will be sold in time, you get your money back. Indiegogo guarantees for that. No worries, no costs, no risk – but fun!



Deutsch

Was ist Apson?

Apson ist eine Website wo du individuelle Maßhemden gestalten, anpassen und bestellen kannst. Diese Webseite ist die Lösung um dir das Hemd zu bringen, das du schon immer wolltest: ein Hemd das nur für dich gemacht wurde – dein eigenes Design in deinen persönlichen Maßen. Gleichzeitig kannst du ein gutes Gewissen haben, da das Hemd nicht in einem »Sweatshop« gemacht wurde, sondern von kleinen Unternehmen in Thailand geschneidert wird.


Wie funktioniert Apson?

Auf der Webseite wählst du aus verschiedenen Stoffen aus und erstellst aus den unterschiedlichen Elementen (Kragen, Manschetten, Taschen, Knopfleisten, Abschluss, usw.) dein eigenes Design. Premium Features sind ebenfalls verfügbar (mix & match mit anderen Stoffen, Premium Knöpfe, usw.).

Wir haben verschiedene Methoden um deine Maße zu nehmen, um sicherzustellen, dass das Hemd passen wird. Du kannst eine passende Standardgröße wählen und die Feinheiten anpassen, du kannst deine eigenen Maße entsprechend unserer Anleitung verwenden oder du kannst dich mithilfe deiner Webcam und unserer App vermessen lassen.

In jedem Fall wird das Hemd einzigartig und perfekt für dich gemacht sein.

Die Macht der Menge

Jede große Idee bedarf der nötigen Mittel um Realität zu werden. Apson wird großartig von Anfang an: im Design, in der Bedienung und in der Abwicklung. Um die Entwicklung auf einem hohen Niveau zu machen, ist ein Kapital von €5.000 notwendig. Um dieses Kapital zu bekommen, werden Shirt-Futures verkauft. Hilf mit Apson zu starten, indem du dir ein Shirt-Future holst!

Shirt-Future?

Kauf eines unserer Shirt-Futures und freue dich auf dein erstes Apson-Hemd. Sobald Apson versandbereit ist, bekommst du dein individuelles Maßhemd and deine Tür geliefert. Keine extra kosten, kein Ärger – nur reine Freude über die Qualität deines individuellen Hemdes.

Bulletproof

100 verkaufte Shirt-Futures sind die untere Grenze. Wenn diese innerhalb von 30 Tagen verkauft werden, ist Apson  ausreichend finanziert und wird entwickelt. Für den Fall, dass nicht genügend verkauft würde, bekommst du dein Geld zurück. Indiegogo garantiert für das. Keine Sorgen, keine Kosten, kein Risiko!

story:
Absolutely loving it!

Hi everyone! Thank you for visiting our Indiegogo project. We are very very very (i think you get the gist) excited about this because we know that our product, the ibanglez fills a gap in the market for the Ipod Nano to be worn as a FASHIONABLE WATCH. Unlike the other products already in the market, ibanglez is very fashionable, beautiful, & because we're using only pure stainless steel, the quality is absolutely superb.

The idea for the ibanglez came about when my wife wanted to wear the Ipod Nano as a watch. After searching for a strap that she might like, we were disappointed since they were almost exclusively designed for men or simply looked and suited men better. There was nothing available that she could wear to complement her outfits whenever she wanted to accessorize. For this reason, we wanted to give women an alternative... something fun, funky, beautiful & worn together with the Nano! The Ipod Nano is definitely a revolutionary product and we really felt like it needed a deserving & beautiful band to complement it!

For this reason, the idea of ibanglez was born & we have not looked back since! 

ibanglez invented with help from beyond?

From idea to prototyping, this has definitely been a difficult task, but the journey to creating the ibanglez has been awesome since day one. I'm the kind of guy that has always had a million ideas but never really acted on them. Now, since I've made the step to convert from my frustrating export job to the creative field, I've really been feeling a new zest for life & I'm absolutely loving it. With this happiness i'm feeling, I know for a fact that I'm reflecting this energy into my work and with great hopes it will only keep you guys, our backers, very happy with the finished product.

Hope you love your presents (Rewards).

We have 2 editions of iBanglez for you to start off with.

Our first edition is the "SPOT ON" edition which comes in eight colors: black, blue, green, orange, pink, purple, red, & white. This reward is for $50 per piece, Ipod not included (USA & Canada delivery included) & will retail at $69 in the future.

Our second edition is the "MATT GOLD" & "MATT SILVER" edition.  This reward is for $69 per piece, Ipod not included (USA & Canada delivery included) & will retail at $85 in the future.

Besides the rewards offered above, we have several more rewards that reduce your cost if you buy more than one piece at a time. 

Sizes available & the way to check your size.

The ibanglez will come in 3 sizes as follows:

VS - 4.5cm, S - 5.0cm, & M - 5.5cm

We are able to produce size L - 6cm also but will only do so if we receive enough orders for this size.

In order to check the correct size of your wrist, please take a measuring tape & wrap around your wrist & check how many cm & inform us accordingly. 

Deliveries of the ibanglez.

We mentioned in the Rewards section that deliveries would begin in November 2012. In the spirit of being direct & honest to our backers to avoid future misunderstandings, we don't anticipate deliveries happening before then. Should any unforeseen circumstances arise, we would require a maximum of an additional month for delivery (although we have no reason to believe this will occur).

If it does for any reason at all I will definitely keep you'll updated & aware of the situation. At the end of the day I want to make you happy because I know in the future when I want to do anything else I will have your support! 

MUCHO GRATITUDE FROM THE BOTTOM OF OUR HEARTS!

We appreciate all your support!  Thank you once again for visiting our page & backing our project. We can't wait to get the ibanglez into the market for everyone to have the opportunity to buy & YOU'RE DEFINITELY ONE OF THE REASONS WHY! 

Thank you & much much love! It is because of you (Indiegogo & our backers) that we've gotten the courage to do what we want to.

PLEASE NOTE: Ipod Nano, Apple, & the Apple logo are registered trademarks of Apple Inc.

Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/ibangleznano

Press inquiries: dheeraj@ibanglez.com

www.ibanglez.com - Coming soon!

story:
O čemu je riječ!?

Ove godine Susret hrvatske katoličke mladeži održava se u Đakovačko-osječkoj nadbiskupiji i u gradu Vukovaru. Želimo da vam ovaj susret doista bude poseban, ne samo u sjećanjima nego i kroz uspomenu koju ćete moći svakodnevno upotrijebiti. Stoga su u suradnji s vukovarskom tvornicom Borovo dizajnirane posebne Startas tenisice za mlade koji će biti na Susretu, ali također i za one koji iz raznih razloga neće moći doći.

Je li ovo nešto više od same kupnje tenisica?

Naravno!

Kupnjom ovih tenisica nećete samo dobiti trajnu i lijepu uspomenu na ovaj događaj, nego ćete i pomoći gradu Vukovaru. Tenisice izrađuje tvornica Borovo, koja zapošljava mnoge Vukovarce i na ovaj način želimo promovirati gospodarski rast grada Vukovara.

Pomoć za bolnicu u Vukovaru

Također, od svakog prodanog para tenisica po 50 kn ići će za pomoć bolnici u gradu Vukovaru. Vukovarska je bolnica mjesto na kojemu medicinsko osoblje iz dana u dan pomaže velikomu broju ljudi iz Vukovara i okolice. Ona je imala i posebnu ulogu u vrijeme Domovinskoga rata, kada je bila svakodnevno razarana. Usprkos tome, medicinsko osoblje bolnice spasilo je mnoge živote i pomagalo braniteljima i civilima Vukovara u borbi za slobodu. 

Startasice za tebe!

Ukoliko želiš i ti imati Startasice sa ovoga susreta, podrži ovu inicijativu svojim pledgeom. Potrebno nam je skupiti najmanje 1,000 narudžbi do kraja veljače kako bismo mogli krenuti u izradu ovih tenisica. Možete naručiti mušku verziju (plava sa crvenim logom) i žensku verziju (crvena s plavim logom).

Imaš priliku dobiti jedinstvenu uspomenu na Susret hrvatske katoličke mladeži u Vukovaru, a isto tako i pomoći Gradu-heroju kako bi budućnost bila bolja.

story:
William Wood was the name of my late grandfather. He was an elegant, stylish, and charismatic English gentleman.  He served in the British Fire Service for 25 years, and was awarded with commendations for his bravery and service.  As a tribute to this incredible man, I have dedicated our logo to represent a traditional British brass Fireman's helmet seen below.

My most vivid memory of my grandfather was that he was the most chivalrous man I have ever met. And that is why we decided to call our watches; THE CHIVALROUS COLLECTION!

We sincerely hope you enjoy our watches as much as we have loved creating them. Please click the 'back this project' button now in the right hand corner of your screen and become a part of the William Wood family!!!

Warm Regards,

Jonny

Founder & Grandson of William Wood

We work with expert designers and suppliers who have decades of experience in the watch making industry. Every component has been carefully chosen by us to create the perfect timepiece!

Our Chivalrous Collection was designed to appeal to all tastes.  In fact we think you may find it difficult to choose your favourite - We have five beautiful colours!

MIDNIGHT BLUE

BRITISH RACING GREEN

ROSE GOLD

TUXEDO BLACK

PEACOCK EDITION

100% STAINLESS STEEL - Our 100% stainless steel 316L grade cases offer high strength durability, and a long-lasting pristine appearance. 

BRASS COIN CASEBACK - Placed in the back of every watch is a William Wood coin embossed with our signature Fireman’s helmet logo. Each coin is made from brass, which is the same metal used in a vintage British Fireman's helmet.

SWISS MOVEMENT - Our Swiss Ronda-762 quartz movement is extremely reliable with a battery-life of up to 10 years!

GENUINE ITALIAN LEATHER - All of our straps are made out of genuine Italian leather and fitted orange velvet leather backs.

QUICK-RELEASE STRAPS - We have fitted a quick-release mechanism to all of our straps to allow you change the look of you watch in seconds!

LUXURY PRESENTATION BOX - We have created a presentation box like no other! Our oak brown piano lacquered wooden boxes are lined with a genuine Italian leather and protective suede cloth.

Have you ever wanted to own your own watch collection? When backing 3 or more watches we’ll add our luxury William Wood Collection Box. Normally £99.99, your's for FREE!

We are offering you a one time only, limited edition run of 250 watches available in each colour.  Each watch will have engraved production numbers between 1 - 250 visible through the glass caseback.

NOTE: You will be assigned a number between 1 - 250 depending upon when you make your purchase - Don't miss out!

Want to add an additional strap? Follow the 3 simple steps below. 

1.) Select reward

2.) Add £40.00 for each additional strap

3.) Pay

WARRANTY - 1 Year international warranty from the date your watch arrives.

My idea for William Wood Watches began in July 2016. I have alway been super passionate about watches, and I was sick of seeing big corporate brands producing watches that were inspired by no meaningful story, whilst also using low quality components. Through William Wood I have been able to combine my passion for watches with my incredible memories of my grandfather. For me, it has been the most rewarding journey, and makes getting out of bed every morning so easy! I can't thank you all enough for your support and hope to welcome you to the William Wood family.

If you would like to reach me then please feel free to email me at info@williamwoodwatches.com.

You can also learn more about our story at our website http://www.williamwoodwatches.com

We have built up a loyal social media following of 27.5k+. If you are not following us already then what are you waiting for? Click on on our watches below to take you to our social media pages and website!

Have a Question?

Please check our FAQ's at the bottom of the page. If that doesn’t help, email us at  info@williamwoodwatches.com

Lifestyle Photographer: Credit to our Lifestyle Photographer Rachael Cox rachaelcoxartist.com

FAQ

How do I choose which watch model I want? 

We'll send a survey after the Indiegogo campaign is over. In the survey you can choose which colour watches/straps you would like.

How do I add an additional leather strap? 

Indiegogo only allows you to select one reward. If you would like to add additional straps simply add £40.00 GBP to your pledge amount for each additional strap after you select your reward on the right hand side of the page. After our Indiegogo campaign is over, we will contact you to ask which additional strap colours you would like. It is that easy!!!

How water resistant are our watches? 

Our watches are resistant to 5ATM. This mean you can swim up to 50 metres deep and can easily wear our watches in the shower.

How much does shipping cost? 

Shipping is £10 in the UK and £20 outside the UK.

What currency is our Indiegogo campaign in? 

All values are GBP £ 

What are your watch measurements? 

Our watch cases have a 41mm diameter x 10.7mm thickness.

How much do our watches cost? 

Check out the rewards section above.  You will receive a discount off the future RRP of between £49.99 - £249.95 depending upon the reward level you choose.  And if you buy 3 watches or more you will receive a free William Wood Collection Box worth £99.99!

Are there a limited number of limited edition watches?

Yes - There are only 250 limited edition watches in each colour so you must be quick!

Have any questions? 

Don't send them via Indiegogo private message.  Send them through to info@williamwoodwatches.com as you will receive a quicker response.

Risks and challenges

Planning: Our production is advanced and you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We've spent over 1 year designing, developing, and receiving finalised samples.

Suppliers:  We have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards. 

Deficiencies: When manufacturing watches it is expected that there will be a 2% - 3% deficiency rate.  If you feel your watch has a fault then please inform us immediately and we will exchange it for a brand new watch for free.

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't influence this part of the process but will look to keep you updated as much as we can.

Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, our Indiegogo community!
story_txt: William Wood was the name of my late grandfather. He was an elegant, stylish, and charismatic English gentleman.  He served in the British Fire Service for 25 years, and was awarded with commendations for his bravery and service.  As a tribute to this incredible man, I have dedicated our logo to represent a traditional British brass Fireman's helmet seen below.My most vivid memory of my grandfather was that he was the most chivalrous man I have ever met. And that is why we decided to call our watches; THE CHIVALROUS COLLECTION!We sincerely hope you enjoy our watches as much as we have loved creating them. Please click the 'back this project' button now in the right hand corner of your screen and become a part of the William Wood family!!!Warm Regards,JonnyFounder & Grandson of William WoodWe work with expert designers and suppliers who have decades of experience in the watch making industry. Every component has been carefully chosen by us to create the perfect timepiece!Our Chivalrous Collection was designed to appeal to all tastes.  In fact we think you may find it difficult to choose your favourite - We have five beautiful colours!MIDNIGHT BLUEBRITISH RACING GREENROSE GOLDTUXEDO BLACKPEACOCK EDITION100% STAINLESS STEEL - Our 100% stainless steel 316L grade cases offer high strength durability, and a long-lasting pristine appearance. BRASS COIN CASEBACK - Placed in the back of every watch is a William Wood coin embossed with our signature Fireman’s helmet logo. Each coin is made from brass, which is the same metal used in a vintage British Fireman's helmet.SWISS MOVEMENT - Our Swiss Ronda-762 quartz movement is extremely reliable with a battery-life of up to 10 years!GENUINE ITALIAN LEATHER - All of our straps are made out of genuine Italian leather and fitted orange velvet leather backs.QUICK-RELEASE STRAPS - We have fitted a quick-release mechanism to all of our straps to allow you change the look of you watch in seconds!LUXURY PRESENTATION BOX - We have created a presentation box like no other! Our oak brown piano lacquered wooden boxes are lined with a genuine Italian leather and protective suede cloth.Have you ever wanted to own your own watch collection? When backing 3 or more watches we’ll add our luxury William Wood Collection Box. Normally £99.99, your's for FREE!We are offering you a one time only, limited edition run of 250 watches available in each colour.  Each watch will have engraved production numbers between 1 - 250 visible through the glass caseback.NOTE: You will be assigned a number between 1 - 250 depending upon when you make your purchase - Don't miss out!Want to add an additional strap? Follow the 3 simple steps below. 1.) Select reward2.) Add £40.00 for each additional strap3.) PayWARRANTY - 1 Year international warranty from the date your watch arrives.My idea for William Wood Watches began in July 2016. I have alway been super passionate about watches, and I was sick of seeing big corporate brands producing watches that were inspired by no meaningful story, whilst also using low quality components. Through William Wood I have been able to combine my passion for watches with my incredible memories of my grandfather. For me, it has been the most rewarding journey, and makes getting out of bed every morning so easy! I can't thank you all enough for your support and hope to welcome you to the William Wood family.If you would like to reach me then please feel free to email me at info@williamwoodwatches.com.You can also learn more about our story at our website http://www.williamwoodwatches.comWe have built up a loyal social media following of 27.5k+. If you are not following us already then what are you waiting for? Click on on our watches below to take you to our social media pages and website!Have a Question?Please check our FAQ's at the bottom of the page. If that doesn’t help, email us at  info@williamwoodwatches.comLifestyle Photographer: Credit to our Lifestyle Photographer Rachael Cox rachaelcoxartist.comFAQHow do I choose which watch model I want? We'll send a survey after the Indiegogo campaign is over. In the survey you can choose which colour watches/straps you would like.How do I add an additional leather strap? Indiegogo only allows you to select one reward. If you would like to add additional straps simply add £40.00 GBP to your pledge amount for each additional strap after you select your reward on the right hand side of the page. After our Indiegogo campaign is over, we will contact you to ask which additional strap colours you would like. It is that easy!!!How water resistant are our watches? Our watches are resistant to 5ATM. This mean you can swim up to 50 metres deep and can easily wear our watches in the shower.How much does shipping cost? Shipping is £10 in the UK and £20 outside the UK.What currency is our Indiegogo campaign in? All values are GBP £ What are your watch measurements? Our watch cases have a 41mm diameter x 10.7mm thickness.How much do our watches cost? Check out the rewards section above.  You will receive a discount off the future RRP of between £49.99 - £249.95 depending upon the reward level you choose.  And if you buy 3 watches or more you will receive a free William Wood Collection Box worth £99.99!Are there a limited number of limited edition watches?Yes - There are only 250 limited edition watches in each colour so you must be quick!Have any questions? Don't send them via Indiegogo private message.  Send them through to info@williamwoodwatches.com as you will receive a quicker response.Risks and challengesPlanning: Our production is advanced and you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We've spent over 1 year designing, developing, and receiving finalised samples.Suppliers:  We have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards. Deficiencies: When manufacturing watches it is expected that there will be a 2% - 3% deficiency rate.  If you feel your watch has a fault then please inform us immediately and we will exchange it for a brand new watch for free.Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't influence this part of the process but will look to keep you updated as much as we can.Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, our Indiegogo community!

story:
Have the funnest nights you can remember

When founders Duncan & Alphonsine wore these suspenders for the first time they were amazed. They couldn't believe how much enthusiasm people would have for them or how much fun they'd have wearing them. They had such a  good time that they rediscovered their love for partying! 

Now you too can rediscover your love for partying and have: 

  • An instant conversation starter with anyone - let us know if you meet the one ;)
  • A ton of enthusiasm from friends and strangers alike
  • A party atmosphere 'light' no other... see what i did there ;) 

 

 

Change the world by having fun 

It's the simplest principle but sometimes we all forget to just have a good time. Be silly, be up for anything and have fun. 

You've probably heard of the butterfly effect. Well, just think... you could be wearing you're light up suspenders to your friends birthday party, make their week and start a train of positive vibes that brings peace to the middle east!!

I'm not saying it's probable but .... it could happen! :) 

 

Light up your friends day 

I bet you could come up with a reason to gift these to every person on your Christmas List...

  • Cousin Jonny just loves to party.
  • Auntie Murial can use these to find her way to the toilet in the night.
  • Little James has always wanted a slingshot he can use in the dark. 

Or maybe, you just want to give a classy gift to a classy friend. :)

 

Do these suspenders grow on trees?

No, they don't. In fact we've been working for 6 months, iterating on our designs, & testing with our customers. 

Below is our latest prototype. The finished product will be far superior to this. For instance the battery will be much smaller, integrated into the product and likely be rechargeable. 

120 LEDs makes you stand out and brings the party to you like never before. It's even been described as mesmerising! 

The picture below has been taken with a standard i-phone camera and no special effects have been applied. 

Please Note: The final designs will not be exactly the same as these since we have further improvements on the way, such as button clasps for adjustable sizes & most likely rechargeable batteries.  

 

An indication of the final specs are below:

LEDs: 120 LEDs with 5cm spacing

Suspenders: 2-2.5cm width, Y shape 

Batteries: Rechargeable Batteries (incorporated into the back of the brace.)

Sizes: Kids sizes are for roughly ages 8-12, Regular (for 5ft - 5ft 8), Large (for 5ft8-6ft4)

Adjustable Size: The size will be adjustable via button clasps attached to the back of the suspenders. 

 

And Here is a Previous Design 

Here's a sneak preview of a previous prototype. Less lights but more classy design. We've had great feedback on these too. And we may even let customers choose between these designs.

 

This is a smart design with tiny batteries, very neat lights and delightful buckles...

 

Final Thoughts... 

 

 

How You Can Help?

First Up. Grab a pair of suspenders or donate to the campaign.

And then... Share Share Share. Who do you know that loves to party? Who's got charisma and likes the spotlight? Send this their way and tell them why you did too. Trust me, they'll like that :)

story:
Introducing Men-Fitted

The idea of Men-fitted underwear was first brainstormed early in 2016 as our founder Alina Lewis was talking to her friends who were complaining about their underwear. She thought to herself :"How cool and innovative it would be to finally design men’s underwear that is comfortable, practical, eco-friendly and looks attractive." After researching and surveys, and not finding nothing like that, especially underwear that “has-it-all”, we realized that it’s about a time to design underwear for men that has all the features they are searching for. Fast forward year and half, we are proud to introduce premium underwear MEN-FITTED.

It all starts with your underwear. The way you feel, the way you smell, the way you move… We know that every man wants to feel comfortable, smell good and be confident in what he wears. Men-fitted is about innovative underwear that feels and fits right. And it's about details...

From the minute you first put them on through a lifetime of washing and every step you make, you can feel the difference.

We partnered with the finest craftsmen, producers and engineers to bring you premium underwear regardless of body type, height or daily activities.

We are proud to manufacture Men-Fitted in California in order to produce and deliver the best product and most importantly focus 24/7 on every little detail that is put into Men-Fitted.

We focused on details. Many men we talked to still don't have underwear that has all the features they are searching for. They still have to compromise when it’s about their underwear that is only good in one way or another. Men-fitted underwear is designed to be perfect in every detail.

Waistband: Our band is 2 inches (5 cm) tall, which is a perfect height for a waistband. It’s wide enough to not cut into your body, but also designed not to fold, roll or bind. Men-fitted waistband is made of soft plush elastic material for an excellent comfort whether you’re sitting or running a marathon.

Seams: We said goodbye to itchy seams! Men-fitted underwear is sewed with flat lock seams to make the seam as flat as possible without sacrificing the look and comfort. High-quality precise seams also make your underwear last much longer. 

No inner tags: We have also completely removed inner tags, because there’s nothing more irritating than mile-long inner tag.

Cuts and supportive 3D pouch: It’s time to ged rid off that terrible feeling of discomfort caused by incorrectly shaped pouch. Men-fitted provides support without pressure, extra Tencel® fabric panels are reducing bacterias that cause odor for multiple wearings, and we paid an extra attention to contour Men-fitted pouch 3D as it should be anatomical, and provide you that comfort and support you need. You don’t need to adjust yourself during the day anymore, or make wide steps…you know why.. Men-fitted pouch panels are moisture wicking, breathable, light, soft, and regulate your body temperature. 

We know how important is that comfort, but also support. Therefore we blend 95% Tencel with 5% lycra for an extra comfort and stretch. Men-fitted contours your body without any pressure or uncomfortable feelings, but gives you the support you need. Tencel fabric adapts perfectly to any physique.

We knew how important is high quality fabric. We put maximum effort to find a fabric that doesn't make compromises. Nanotech eco Tencel® - fabric made of wood cellulose. The new age eco-friendly material. 

Tencel® (lyocell) is a complete innovation among all materials. It’s a smooth, sustainable, breathable material that naturally reduces growth of bacteria that causes odors. Tencel® is the best premium fiber for underwear to satisfy any customer regardless of body type or daily activities.

Smooth and soft: No pinch and itching! The microscopic surface of Tencel fiber is smoother than surfaces of modal, cotton, and wool. Extremely smooth surface makes lyocell a perfect solution for people with sensitive skin.

No odor: Tencel reduces bacterias that cause odors naturally without any chemical treatments. Bacterias growth is prevented through the moisture management of the fiber. Men-Fitted underwear remains odor free even for multiple wearings.

Moisture absorption: Men-Fitted regularly controls and absorbs moisture, 50% more than cotton and even more than wool (by contrast synthetics do not absorb moisture). If Men-Fitted absorbs water (sweat etc..), all the water will be absorbed into the fiber. No film or liquid will cover the surface of the fiber.

Tencel is more eco-friendly and absorbent than cotton, softer than silk, more sustainable than bamboo, stronger than modal and any other cellulose fibers,… it’s a true leader and innovation among all fabrics.

Cooling: Men-Fitted naturally regulates body temperature and has perfect cooling properties thanks to Tencel fabric.

We are proud to manufacture Men-Fitted by using Tencel. Tencel is one of the best and most sustainable eco materials on the planet. It is a fabric made from wood cellulose. Once the eucalyptus trees are harvested in sustainable farms, the wood is soaked in non-toxic solution, that is after use reused again and again. The result is a raw pure cellulose.

It's truly an environmental achievement in fiber production. It’s derived from a renewable raw material, its manufacturing is sustainable, and its disposal is biodegradable.

Designed to be faultless and innovative in every little detail. Innovations don't belong only to technology. We are proud to move forward standards in men’s underwear, and raise the level of comfort and design higher. Men-fitted boxer briefs go down the leg to mid-thigh, and are designed to stay in place.

Men-Fitted underwear comes in two colors: Centurion (black) and Sporty Red.

It’s all about you and your preferences, whether you want to look sophisticated and timeless or modern and fearless, each of them will look great on you. (Women approved - just in case you would question it :-) 

Men-Fitted boxer briefs are the perfect choice whether you’re doing sports, walking, going out or sitting for many hours. Made of an innovative material that is smooth, soft, breathable and light. We put science in it, because of science we were able to make underwear that makes every man feel comfortable, confident and attractive.

Select your pledge level on the right by picking the pledge you would like to choose. After that, please enter the information required by Indiegogo. After the campaign is funded, we will then build your underwear and send you updates on the progress. When your Men-fitted pair is ready, we will send them right to you.

Men-fitted underwear is designed and developed to feel just right. If you are on the edge of a size, and can’t decide, we suggest you to go size up. How to measure: Bend torso side to side to find natural waist. Measure around allowing the tape to sit comfortably.

 

We are convinced you will love Men-Fitted underwear. 

If you have any more questions, ideas or suggestions, or if you are a potencial investor, don't hesitate to contact us at hello@alinalewis.com or via our Instagram or our webpage www.alinalewis.com

story:
PLEASE SUPPORT D'ON's project

 

Our project is to develop a bag with e-paper front , with the property to change the logos, images on the display / on the bag with your smartphone.

 

 

(E-paper front of 6 inch to 7.4 inch display) / (1 inch = 2.54 cm)

 

So we have together the chance to be the first company in the world, to develop this kind of bags, D'ON's bags!

 

 

We re-invent the bag!

 

 

 

On this software (app) it would be possible for you to choose every possible logo, samples, photos (black/white) and in the future also coloured & MOVABLE desings and download them through an app onto the e-paper-bag. 

You would be able to also create own logos, to put them online and show them to all the world.

There are no restrictions. 

The bag motives (desings,samples or photos) are on the app and available to you 24h a day, 365 days a year and without the risk, that a logo, sample are not more available. 

 

The Power & Image is Wireless data transferred (NFC-Technology)

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Near_field_communication

 


 

e-paper:

electronic paper displays (flexible touchscreens) reflect light like ordinary paper.

 

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electronic_paper

 

 

 

what wee need?

  • We need a minimum of USD 130'000 through donations or bag orders. We need this amout to realize this project.

If we don't realize our goal of USD 130‘000, you will get your money back.

 
 
The goal of this campaign is to obtain the start-up capital USD 130'000 in order to realize our dream, to be able to offer you the world's smartest bag.
 

Why USD 130‘000?

We need USD 130'000 for the completion of the prototype (bag & software) and for the production of the bags for our supporter.

 

PLEASE SUPPORT DON's bag

 

We need everyone of you to support us! Just with your help we can realize this awesome project. Please tell from this project to your parents, friends, and follow us on twitter, facebook and visit our homepage www.donsbag.com.

 

Dear people, the whole project can maybe sound "futuristic", but it's only a matter of time, when this project is implemented, and presence. You can help realize this!

We have the chance together, to be the first ones with this project worldwide and change a little bit the everyday-life of everyone.

With my idea and your support we can do together exceptionally things. Develop a really genius and innovative product.

Utilize today the opportunity to purchase the smartest bag of the word - D'ON's bag.

The bag will change everything, will change the rules…!

Follow us on our destination…

 
many thanks!
 
D'ON's team

story:
I’m interested in creating products which combine function and beauty and don’t make compromises on either.  I'm inspired a lot by natural forms, which often leads me into playing with asymmetry and balance.  Below are renders of the digital models.  The actual finish appearance may vary from images.

The shape of these garden tools was inspired by a scallion, with different layers growing out of each other.

rumble polished                                              mirror polished

The tools will be investment cast in durable CD3MN steel and rumble polished, for a smooth finish which will develop a lovely patina with use. They can be mirror polished for an additional $15 each (display only).

In order to produce these tools economically, I need to make at least 200 sets.  If you become one of my first supporters, you can get your tools for half of retail price!  If your purchase helps put me over my goal, you get 25% off.  If we don’t reach our goal, we can’t make the tools – so spread the word!!!

I also already have so many people to thank!  In roughly chronological order:

Robert Reid, Kristy Smith and Dave Garberg, my teachers at the Design Centre Enmore.  This project originated in a second year industrial design assignment, and they have provided crucial advice at every stage in the process since then.

Raymond Scott and Jytte Laulund at Workshopped, who saw the potential in my work, and included an earlier version of the tools in their 2013 exhibition.

Walter Schellander at the Bronzing Studio in Castle Hill, who chromed my prototypes for the Workshopped exhibition.

Demetre Tryfiatis of Box and Dice, who gave me much needed advice and connections which allowed me to bring this project to the next level.

Bob Wainwright at Hycast Metals who figured out how to transform my models into products which can be manufactured in the real world.

Jacqui Laurenson and Ashley Ling at Studio Popsicle, whose branding workshop clarified my vision and lifted me out of a rut.  It was also a really fun evening, connecting with other small business owners.

story:
So, what's all the fuss about?

 

 

We had to do something...

In face of this tragic reality, we decided some light should be brought to this problem!

We couldn't let things get darker and two years ago we had the idea of increasing the safety of "low-light living creatures", such as runners, cyclists, walkers, trekkers, workers... through illuminated smart clothing.

A multi‑purpose top‑notch illuminated jacket seemed the perfect candidate for the mission and that's how MUSGO was born.

MUSGO cool design incorporates optical fibers that constitute the core of the illumination system and with a dedicated mobile app the smart illumination is controlled.

MUSGO in the media

Please, show me the app!

With the mobile app, your MUSGO jacket will be alive and able to be continuously upgraded with new functionalities.

 

 

 

 

Where is all this light coming from?

MUSGO Light Engine is at the center of the illumination system

 

Yeah, you'll go (coco)nuts when you read this...

MUSGO is made with a fabric that has activated carbon particles made of recycled coconut shells that empowers all adventurers to challenge the sun, the wind, the rain, the heat, and the cold, knowing these elements are part of the game rather than announcing that the game is over.

Products made with this enriched fabric passed with distinction tests conducted in the Sahara desert, in the Antarctic region, as well as with professional athletes and weekend warriors.

 


 

WHERE'S CLOVER?
____

If you're not yet convinced that MUSGO is a winning bet, we still have something for you

We consider ourselves lucky guys (great family, epic friends, good health...) and want to share this happy feeling with you.

Because of that, you'll find your lucky clover hidden inside of an inner pocket, for you to touch it, kiss it, smell it... whenever you feel you need that "extra boost" to put "wind in your favor".

Thinkers & Believers

What do the inventors have to say?

And the partners?

MUSGO Colors

FAQs & Curiosities

What in the h3ll is a "Radiation Block Pocket"?

MUSGO jacket has a pocket specially designed to isolate your body from your phone's radiation.

It consists of a layer built from a special fabric made of silver threads that can attenuate up to 80 dB (in case you don't know, that's A LOT!!! ) the radiation emitted by your phone. It is placed on the chest in front of where your heart is!

Are there any extras available?

Sure!

The following cool extras are available:

  • 3-modes Snood: balaclava; noise cover; scarf
  • Detachable Vest for those chilly days
  • Detachable Hand Stirrups for greater comfort and awesome look
Which colors can I choose for my MUSGO?

MUSGO jacket is available in Indigo Blue and Gray Tan.

How do I know which size fits me better?


How much does MUSGO weight?

Less than 1 kg (35.3 ounces).

Care was taken when choosing MUSGO fabrics and materials to provide the best wearability and comfort.

What is the battery life of MUSGO Light Engine?
  • Solid color mode: 25 hours
  • Flashing color mode (2x/second): 50 hours

MUSGO Light Engine optoelectronic circuits were designed to maximize battery lifetime, while powering intense brightness to the smart illumination system.

Can I still see my safety increased without a smartphone?

The answer is "Yes!".

MUSGO Light Engine allows you to scroll through a set of predefined colors and effects with a push of a button. All you have to do is to squeeze it.

However, without the smartphone, all the smart functionalities derived from the use of the its sensors will not be available and you will not enjoy the full experience.

Will I need to pay for the app?

The app will be available for iOS and Android, completely free to download with no monthly fees or extra costs.

Why are you crowdfunding?

Your precious funding will allow us to:

  • Finish the development and integration of new features in the Lapa app
  • Fabricate the plastic injection mold for the MUSGO Light Engine
  • Bluetooth certification (CE + FCC) of the MUSGO Light Engine
  • Reach the minimum production volume necessary to sustain/achieve the announced campaign price
Why order now?

By backing this project today, you'll get to own a MUSGO at an exclusive price that won’t be offered again commercially.

Can you tell me the soundtrack that was used in your promotional video? I really like it!

Sure! 'be-dom' is the name of the Portuguese Alternative Percussion band that granted us permission to use their track. This band uses recycled materials (like our jacket) to create instruments and scenarios.

"Bigalhona" is the name of the track.

FOLLOW MUSGO    

THANK YOU... Thank you very much!
____

As no man is an island, here it goes our special thank you message for all those that somehow contributed for this project

  • Luís, André and Francisco for believing in us since the first moment
  • All the "Clever" family
  • Ana Luísa for the magnificent photos
  • José Paulo for the 3D modeling of the MUSGO Light Engine
  • Ângelo Vaz for the branding
  • Gonçalo for the video
  • Ângelo Vaz (again) and Joana Oliveira for the graphical design and conception
  • Artur Moreira for the website
  • Joana Oliveira (also again), the model and the dancer, for the constant availability and amazing skills
  • Miguel for the Kung Fu kicks and posing

And of course...

All the MUSGO backers - you're the best! - and Indiegogo for enabling us to launch this campaign.

What you are seeing are prototypes, so we guarantee that the final product will have superior quality in every detail.

story:
In 2016 we created the HAK 360, the best minimalist reversible wallet that change color by flip it over. Since, we have shipped more than 3,000 HAK 360 in the world.


Today, we designed the best HAK 360 we have ever made !

We have chosen a high-quality polyester fabric that is waterproof and extremely tear-resistant. It doesn't fray over time ! Details are important, after many adjustments, we found the perfect combination between thread tension and sewing spacing. We like colors, the all new HAK 360 is available in 5 colors. Even more choices.


After several comparisons, we realized that most of minimalist wallet weren’t adapted to the variability of different cards. Thanks to its elastic band the HAK 360 enable the covering of all your cards delicately. No matter how many cards it contains, the HAK 360 stays resistant and will keep secure every items.


We have created the best reversible wallet in the world. Thanks to its design thought differently from other card holders on the market, you can easily turn it over in 3 seconds. It's simple, funny and useful.


The combining of laser cutting and the use of an innovative fabric enable the HAK 360° to have a clean and clear finish. No fraying for sure ! 


Either way you get 2 secrets pockets.


After having tested a very large number of elastic band, this one, composed of a mixture of 80% polyester and 20% of elastane, offers an ideal extensibility to maintain your cards secure whatever the number.

It doesn't fray over time ! Details are important, after many adjustments, we found the perfect combination between thread tension and sewing spacing. We like colors, the all new HAK 360 is available in 5 colors. Even more choices.After several comparisons, we realized that most of minimalist wallet weren’t adapted to the variability of different cards. Thanks to its elastic band the HAK 360 enable the covering of all your cards delicately. No matter how many cards it contains, the HAK 360 stays resistant and will keep secure every items. We have created the best reversible wallet in the world. Thanks to its design thought differently from other card holders on the market, you can easily turn it over in 3 seconds. It's simple, funny and useful. The combining of laser cutting and the use of an innovative fabric enable the HAK 360° to have a clean and clear finish. No fraying for sure !  Either way you get 2 secrets pockets.     After having tested a very large number of elastic band, this one, composed of a mixture of 80% polyester and 20% of elastane, offers an ideal extensibility to maintain your cards secure whatever the number.    
Shipping Details
All parcels are sent by letter. We usually use LA POSTE to ship our wallets. It normally takes approximately 3-10 working days for arrival in europe. 5-15 working days for USA and canada. Until 25 working days for the reste of the world.
For any other question please send us a messageand we would be more than happy to reply as soon as we can :-)

story:
Who We Are
We are Limited-10, and currently offer the only ATF approved billet 2011 80% receiver.  This style receiver is the most popular form factor for competitive handgun shooting throughout the world from IPSC, USPSA, and IDPA. Our business name is chosen as a reflection for the Limited-10 division of USPSA popular in CA, and to symbolize the large audience in CA and elsewhere that enjoy participating in recreational shooting.

We are a two man team that are also certified 1911 accurizers, armorers, and shooting enthusiasts. Our professional background is in engineering for aerospace and defense, which has helped us develop valuable skillsets for bringing a product out to market from the ground up. Our resources include experts in CAD/CAM, machining, and also gunsmithing.

With your contribution, we will deliver the following:
80% Stainless Steel Long Wide Dustcover 2011
80% Stainless Steel Railed Dustcover 2011 (Full length tactical rail)
Fixtures that can complete either of the 80% frames above.
Detailed instructions on completing your 80% frame with parts recommendations in all major calibers.  We will also include the ATF letter certifying that the 80% is an incomplete firearm receiver.

Why We Need Your Help!
There has been much demand for a stainless steel version of our high quality billet aluminum 2011 80% frame. Our goal is to provide in house manufacturing of stainless steel 2011 80% frames to ensure our high quality standards are met and to keep the development pipeline in constant motion. We spent almost two years on our current design which allow for quick assembly and minimal fitting which we can readily apply to a stainless steel counterpart. Our aluminum version is the easiest to finish on the market and only requires two holes to be drilled as well as the frame rails to be cut.

With your help, we can develop these in house which ensures that quality stays with us and ends with us!


Note: We will be getting setup with your help and it will take some time after the project has completed.


Our pledge
To deliver the highest quality stainless steel 80% 2011 frames on the market at a heavily discounted price to those that help fund our project. This will be a great choice for all of you homebuilders out there! 

What is an 80% receiver?
An 80% Receiver is a partially completed piece of material that requires special tooling and skills to be completed and considered a firearm. Unlike a firearm receiver it is not required to be transferred through a Federal Firearms Licensed holder (FFL), and can be shipped directly to your house.

Do I need an FFL to make a firearm?
In a short answer, no. As long as you can legally own the firearm in the state, county and city you reside in you are allowed to manufacture a firearm for your own personal use. No serial number is required however it is suggested to engrave a serial number, model and manufacturer on your receiver in case it is lost or stolen.  You must also follow all federal regulations and those for the state, county, and city you live in.


Note: The images shown here of completed firearms are for illustration purposes only.  They depict what is possible to make after completing your 80%, but we will not be selling, manufacturing, or shipping completed firearms or completed firearm receivers. Sorry, but we can't ship fixtures or 80% receivers outside of the USA.

story:
Scroll down to see watch options / colors!

*TO ORDER -- Perks to choose will be at the bottom of page for mobile, and right side of the page from a desktop computer.*

Our Story:

I've been collecting watches for years and always dreamed of designing one of my own. I realized that I couldn't find a bamboo watch anywhere quite like the one I wanted, so I decided to design several models just as I imagined the perfect bamboo watch would be. However, we want this to be more than a business. We want this to build a sense of community and a force for good. Check out our Facebook page, website, and instagram to see more of what we're doing and who supports us already. Please share and tell your friends!

First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

1. Decide how many / which Tunnel Club Watches you would like then click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."

2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.

Currently, if you want to buy more than one watch, you'll need to purchase them here one at a time. The $2 shipping cost per watch is mostly to cover the cost of shipping them from China to the U.S, so we need the $2 shipping paid for every watch, even if you order multiple. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

(If we don't reach our goal of $20,000, you'll be refunded and no watches will be made. Help us reach our goal my sharing this campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram!)

Risks / Challenges:

In full disclosure, our manufacturer is in China and this is our first time going through them. We have no reason to doubt them, but are unable to control delays in them shipping the bulk order to us. It should take about 2 months from when we place the bulk order until we receive it. The prototypes they made are great and we've been more than satisfied with their service thus far.

Questions? Email us at "support@tunnelclubproducts.com" OR message us on our Facebook page, "Tunnel Club Products".

Here are pictures of the watches below:

 

  Small Face Brown Suede Leather 

 

         Small Face White Smooth Leather

 

  Small Face Red Smooth Leather

 

  Large Face Brown Suede Leather

 

  Large Face Grey Smooth Leather

 

  Large Navy Blue Smooth Leather

Please note:

**Please note that that this campaign will NOT raise money to donate to The Younique Foundation. The campaign is merely to help us raise enough money to place our first order and get our business started. AFTER this campaign campaign is over, 10% of all profits from then on will be donated to The Younique Foundation.**

story:
Risks and challenges

Delivery time: In manufacturing there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfil on time. We work with high end suppliers, for whom quality and timing is of equal importance to ensure you will get your product as promised

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster.

Updates: We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!

REMEMBER: To ensure you receive your goods in time you MUST remember to do respond to us when we reach out to you!

REFUNDS: Your support in the process allows us to pay for production (fabric acquisition + labour) and in return we offer generous reductions. This is not a profit focused campaign for us but a kickstart for our company. So please be aware we cannot offer refunds but we can offer exchanges. Exchanges could take time if we don't have your preference in stock. I hope you can understand.

story:
Hi there,


My name is Emily and I am embarking on an exciting new venture and would LOVE for you to get involved and join me on the journey.

I am a costume and prop maker, and have been working in the film, theatre and tv industry for the last 12 years. I am happiest when being creative and making things with my own hands.
I have an unbridled passion for footwear, and have decided to meld my craft and my passion to create a brand new footwear company. However, as anyone in the costume business will tell you, the pay isn't brilliant; I have already used all of my meagre savings in starting the set-up, and now I need YOUR help!

Peau De Soie will create footwear that will not only be beautiful, whimsical and playful, but practical too. My knowledge of creating costumes and props will allow me to create sculptural, but wearable pieces of art.

What your contribution will mean...

This funding will help me to do a number of things:

1: Set up a website with E-Commerce capabilites

2: Purchase the shoe lasts:-
This is by far the most expensive part of the set-up costs. Shoes cannot be made without lasts, they are the mould on which the shoes are created. In order to be able to offer customers a reasonable choice of designs, I will need to buy approximately 18 pairs of lasts. Each pair is handmade and take around 2 weeks to make.

3: Buy raw materials:-
An average pair of shoes has 12 seperate components. Each of these components needs to be sourced and purchased. As the footwear industry in this country is tiny compared to times gone by, I will need to purchase the components in bulk. Again, I need funds to do that.

I have decided to go with Fixed Funding, as I want you to be confident that the money I raise will go 100% towards the business. If I do not raise the full amount, you will get back your investment in full.

Peau De Soie - Not just another footwear brand

Peau De Soie will be 100% British.

Every supplier will be UK-based, and all materials will be traceable, from ethically conscious sources.
I also have plans to use recycled materials as much as possible.

If you can't contribute, no worries. Please share this campaign with friends, family and anyone who may be able to help.
story_txt:

My name is Emily and I am embarking on an exciting new venture and would LOVE for you to get involved and join me on the journey.
I am a costume and prop maker, and have been working in the film, theatre and tv industry for the last 12 years.
