story:
Thanks for checking out Gemalli sunglasses!  We've been working on this project for the past 3 years and are very excited to share it with you.  Please consider partnering with us to shake-up the eyewear industry with these amazing new sunglasses.

With your support we'll be able to bring these polarized, unique and stylish shades into production and you'll be the first to own a pair.  There is nothing else like them!

-Graham & Andrew

 

 

 

Gemalli started a few years ago when Andrew and Graham were hanging out and discussing cool new product ideas. They realized that there hasn't been any big shake-ups in the eyewear industry for a long time.  After lots of talk and a simple napkin sketch, Gemalli was born. As they talked more about the concept they realized that it was something worth pursuing and so they spent the next couple years perfecting the style, testing tons of different materials for the lenses and arms, fitting prototype after prototype and designing the ideal sunglasses case.  It has been a long process but the result is even better than expected.  These are not your ordinary sunglasses!

Gemalli sunglasses feature high quality polarized lenses, 3 finishes on the cast aluminum frames and 3 different handcrafted exotic wood arms.   The perfect blend of raw materials, great design, and modern technology creates a distinct look that won't go unnoticed!

 

Everything about the design highlights the versatility of the materials, including the strength and lightness of the aluminum frames, the optics of the shield lens, the laser engraved logo, and the integrated fork hinge; signature of Gemalli sunglasses.

 

 

 

 

With the 3 aluminum frame finishes and the 3 types of exotic wooden arms, you can choose 1 of 9 different combinations.

If your perk is a pair of sunglasses or a t-shirt, we will be contacting you once the campaign is over to find out which combination you would like.

All supporters will get the chance to submit a name for this sunglasses style and will receive an invitation to the launch party.  The person who provides the winning name will receive one pair of Gemalli sunglasses with a customized engraving! 

In order to keep the cost down, we need to meet minimum order quantities. Your pledge helps us create these first Gemalli sunglasses at the lowest possible price.

Thanks again for all of your support!  We're looking forward to completing the project and getting the first pairs out to you this summer!

If you like the idea please show your support by pledging any amount, sharing this link with a friend, or both!

 

___________________________________________________________________________

 

Challenges

The biggest challenge to this project is facilitating and timing the production of different parts coming from different manufacturers. Even though we've been working with a few different vendors and built strong relationships with them; there are often small unforeseen changes when shifting from samples to final production. We will make sure that in the end, the best possible product is delivered.

This means that if small changes are necessary there could be short delays but we will keep you updated on the process and work hard to get the shades to you as soon as possible!

 

___________________________________________________________________________

 

Featured on

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

___________________________________________________________________________

 

FAQ

 

1. Do you provide prescription lenses?

We currently don't do prescription lenses however it is something that we are looking into for the future.

 

2. When do I give my name suggestion for this sunglasses style?

We will be contacting you at the end of the campaign to get your name suggestion, material choices, and shipping information.

 

___________________________________________________________________________

Why Indiegogo?

We feel that this is the perfect spot to partner with people from all over the world in order to make this product a reality.  Supporters get to join us right from the begining and have the opportunity to receive a pair of sunglasses at a lower price than future retail prices.   It's also a great way to get feedback on the campaign, and suggestions as we move forward.

___________________________________________________________________________

 

Giving Back

Gemalli feels that all businesses should be managed sustainably and that includes giving back to the local and global community.  A portion of profits will be designated to charities and non-profit organizations.  These organizations will be chosen at the end of each year with the help of anyone who has purchased Gemalli products.

___________________________________________________________________________
Why Indiegogo?
We feel that this is the perfect spot to partner with people from all over the world in order to make this product a reality.  Supporters get to join us right from the begining and have the opportunity to receive a pair of sunglasses at a lower price than future retail prices.   It's also a great way to get feedback on the campaign, and suggestions as we move forward.

story:
"Winning hearts and minds was never quite so cool or so stylish."

"[Combat Flip Flops'] idea was to design a manufacturing technique using local resources and manpower to create a product that could be made in-country and sold to first-world markets

~The Huffington Post

" Working with a group of marketers, supply line specialists, and craftsmen CFF is poised to change the way we pick up the pieces of violent conflict." 

~Mission.TV


Mission


Combat Flip Flops creates peaceful, forward-thinking opportunities for self-determined entrepreneurs affected by conflict.  Our willingness to take bold risks, community connection, and distinct designs communicate, "Business, Not Bullets"--flipping the view on how wars are won.  Through persistence, respect, and creativity, we empower the mindful consumer to manufacture peace through trade.

History


The journey began with the 75th Ranger Regiment. Lee and Griff made their first trip to Afghanistan in the Winter of 2003.  After several deployments and reality of a growing families, they separated from the military in 2006 and continued to support troops through other avenues.  In 2010, Griff returned to Afghanistan to assist the growing Afghan National Army.  On that trip, he toured an Afghan-owned boot manufacturing plant and saw where a factory worker punched a flip flop thong through a combat boot sole.  The idea was born.



Combat Flip Flops Campaign Video of the Day 25 October 2013

Combat Boot Factory in Kabul, Afghanistan September 2012.  This factory is now closed.  Let's put 'em back to work with this campaign!



Expeditionary Production Facility

After multiple factory closures due to the international withdrawal from Afghanistan in 2014, the Combat Flip Flops team had to design a factory, build a production line, and knock out flip flops for paid orders on a shoestring budget in the good ol' USA.  The result was a highly efficient, reduced footprint, easily maintained factory operated with little to no training.  

Trust us--we had zero training and made over 3,000 pair of flip flops over the course of two months.

The thought occured to us, "Why can't we put this model in Afghanistan?"  So we went to the drawing board and designed our factory to be placed in Afghanistan.  The result is a flip flop factory shipped in a 40' shipping container--The Expeditionary Production Facility.

What We Need

The Team needs $500,000 to build the EPF, ship the EPF, install the EPF, Hire and traing workers, and purchase raw materials for ONE YEAR OF PRODUCTION. We're an open book, so here's the breakdown.


Enlistment Perks

With a donation, you'll be enlisting in our unarmed forces.  Perks include full offering of CFF products, unique donations from other brands, CFF commercial roles and yes... possibly flip flops for life.  Check them out.


The ISAFF (I Support Afghan Flip Flops) Patch

With any donation of $25 or more, you'll get to wear the badge that says you support abrupt change in Afghanistan.  Enlist, join our unarmed forces, and work toward something better. 

Other Perks

Check out the perks from other forward thinking companies in the Campaign Gallery


"All in.  All the Time" ~ Tommy V

THIS IS AN ALL OR NOTHING CAMPAIGN. 

The Impact

Combat Flip Flops is a veteran-owned, small business.  Our goal is to employ people in Afghanistan and other post-conflict areas all over the world.  In addition to making cool stuff in dangerous places, we help veteran organizations, sponsor medical missions ot the most remote regions of the world, and work to make sure you feel included.  


When this campaign is funded, you will have done the following:

-Prove that businesses have more impact than bullets

-Employ 25 Afghans to manage and run the EPF

-Build 60,000 pair of flip flops in Afghanistan

-Become the #1 Footwear and #1 Textile Exporter of Afghanistan

-Create paid employment for five Americans on the CFF Staff

-Hell man, you got to put a flippin' flip flop factory in Afghanistan.  Who does that?



Other Ways You Can Help

We understand times are tight.  If you don't have the ability to contribute, please just send a word of support, tell your friends, and encourage them to share/donate.

Karma goes a long way.  Everything helps.

See you on the Objective.

Peace.

Combat Flip Flops.


Frequently Asked Questions


FAQ-Afghanistan

OK, we could answer all the pertinent facts about Afghanistan here, but I hope you would appreciate the efficiency of us posting the following link below.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afghanistan

What news sources should I read regarding current events in Afghanistan?  We like Afghanistan News Center.  It congregates daily worldwide articles that discuss Afghanistan.

http://afghanistannewscenter.com/

Where are you producing in Afghanistan?  Currently, we are producing Sarongs in Kabul, Afghanistan.  Our goal with the Expeditionary Production Facility is to put a factory in Herat, Afghanistan and then to other areas as the concept grows.

Does Afghanistan and the European Union have a Free Trade Agreement?  Yes.  There is 0% Value Added Tax (VAT) for any products made in Afghanistan imported into the EU.

Does Afghanistan and the United States have a Free Trade Agreement?  No.  Wouldn't it be awesome if they did though?  Write your local representative (www.whoismyrepresentative.com) and politely ask for them to do something about that.

If I were to read a book about the history of Afghanistan, what should I read?  Afghanistan: A Modern History.  Great read without any twists as a result of current events.  Alexander the Great, Ghengis Khan, Russia, The U.S.... Thousands of years of strife in under 200 pages.  

Why do you like Afghanistan?  We love mountains and mountain people.  Afghanistan, without the context of war, is a truly amazing place with natural beauty.  Unfortunately, we haven't found any rockin' ski lodges or mountain bike trails... yet.


FAQ-Production Locations

Where are CFF products currently produced?  CFF products are made in the following locations:

Footwear- Bogota, Colombia

Bags- Lakewood, Washington USA

Shirts-Spokane, Washington USA

Longboards-Denver, Colorado USA

Jewelry- Laos

Sarongs- Kabul, Afghanistan

Hats- USA


FAQ-CFF Products

Your company is named "Combat Flip Flops."  Why are you making products other than footwear?  If you haven't picked up on it yet, most of our messaging is tongue-in-cheek.   A "flip flop" is a piece of footwear, but it also refers to a change in position or belief.  We once believed that serving our nation required us to be in a uniform and carry a rifle.  Now we understand that promoting a positive image of the U.S. through business is the best thing we can do for our country.  So, in all senses... we're flip flops.  If you don't get it, no worries.  If you do, you can be a flip flop too.

Why are Combat Flip Flops so freaking awesome? We don't know.  They just are.  All kidding aside, we try to bridge the gap between functionality, fashion, and durability.  CFF outsoles are made from military grade combat boot rubber, not thermopastic resin, EVA, or other materials that wear out in a matter of months.  The design team has a condition that ends in "retentive" and doesn't sleep until they've figured out the exact durometer of EVA that breaks in under a Wookie after a month of wear.  We're all married, so we understand that not only does a piece of footwear have too look good, but it has to feel good against the skin.  And lastly, we have the, "I'd rock that" Factor.  Nothing is released until the CFF team unanimously agrees, "Hell yeah, I'd rock that."  

Why are your products so expensive?  Believe it or not, there are a lot of costs that go into developing new products with the criteria of "post-conflict" production.  Shipping is the big one.  Have you ever bought 2,000 pairs of flip flop parts, stuffed them into a container, and shipped them into a war zone?  Probably not.  We did.  It's ridiculously expensive.  On the other hand, the raised eyebrows by customs agents are worth the pain of writing the check.  Other than that, we have to pay duties for raw materials going to most manufacturing locations, duties for finished products leaving the country, and import duties into the EU and U.S..  The bills rack up.  If you're able to help with less expensive (reliable) shipping and a reduction in duties, please contact us at info@combatflipflops.com.

What next?  It's up to you.


Campaign Gratitude:  Thanks for Making This Happen.

Scott Graebke, Evil Genius behind the EPF

Believe it or not, we have a mad scientist.  This guy makes Bill Nye the science guy envious.  Using years of experience in the sporting goods and aviation industry, Scott designed a low maintenance, low cost, reliable platform to change lives in war torn areas.  He's humble, hard working, and we're thankful he's on the team.

You, The Enabler

You're a person that says, "I don't care what conventional wisdom says.  I like underdogs, extreme [whatever], and I bring people together for good causes."  You're O.K. with accepting the loss of cash as long as you have a good story to go along with it.  And you're definitely somebody that says, "I told you it was possible," without it being heard as, "I told you so."

story:
Pitbull Wallet


Simple. Elegant. Secure.

No Apps required. No internet connection necessary. No chance of remote exploiting it.


Checkout this Podcast by Consider This! a very cool bitcoin podcast. Skip to 18:20 if you are in a hurry to see what is said about the Pitbull!


What is the Pitbull Wallet?

The Pitbull Wallet is a credit card sized device for you to safely store your passwords, cryptocoin wallets and other sets of public/private keys. It is NOT a credit or debit card. You will be able to store multiple wallets for multiple types of cryptocoins - Bitcoin, Litecoin, Peercoin, Novacoin, Feathercoin, ... even Dogecoin... (Wow... much safe... very crypto). You can also store passwords so you only have to remember one of them. And it is so simple to use! You don't need any special app to manage it or anything. For more detailed information, please visit the official project page.

Using it

Your public address is easily reachable. You just have to navigate through the addresses stored. The private keys will be locked using one single password that can be entered using the embedded keyboard when needed.
8
>> 		OK
>>

You can use it with your smartphone, tablet, webcam or with a QR-Code scanner.

You can use it to store your own wallets, make reusable gift cards, store public and private keys for other uses, and even to store passwords. Then, you can keep it in your pocket, in your wallet, in your vault, or in a safe deposit box at a bank.
You can use it as a primary store or as a backup. You can Make them SAFE by SAVING them in a SAFE.

Why the Pitbull Wallet?

For many reasons. If you have cryptocurrency, you need it. It's a safe and versatile way to store your digital wallets. It is also a practical way to store other types of public/private key pairs as well as passwords.

You can keep it anywhere and make it inaccessible from less trustworthy individuals.

The safest digital wallet is the one that is kept offline. Instead of printing it in fragile piece of paper or using an offline computer, just "pitbull it". It's more convenient and practical, it's stored digitally as well, but accessible and safe at the same time.

Why "Pitbull"?

Dogs are always thought of as the "man's best friend" and Pitbulls are the usual iconic representation of their protective nature.

We are helping protect someone's property, so why not Pitbull?

The technology

This device has an e-paper screen to display your addresses and keys. The keyboard below the screen allows you to control the card - adding wallets, browsing your wallets, and maybe - if funding allows - even perform some quick calculations or conversions.

The embedded battery lasts for a long time, after which your card needs replacing - the battery cannot be replaced separately. But don't worry, you won't lose your data, you will only lose the ability to use the card's screen without external power supply. And you don't need to (or should) throw away your old card.

If the battery dies, you can still access your data by using a very simple external power supply. Soon after we start shipping the cards, we will also make available a simple and cheap connector for that.

Project status

The design is not yet final and features may still change a little. At the moment we are negotiating with the factory but, to do so, we need to have a clearer picture of the market.

I want one!

Just choose your perk on the right!

Get yours at our campaign page above and if you're feeling generous, you can leave extra tips as well.

If you prefer to contribute by sending Bitcoin, please do so to the following address: 1M6PivBJyRUJQ8JZC31H1Nj4qyTjb3933Q. Please remember that such contributions don't get reverted into the IndieGoGo goal. In order for the project to go ahead, the IndieGoGo funding goal must be met regardless of any contributions made by any other means. You still get in line to get your Pitbull Wallet, but only if the goal is met.

Getting Personal

"Great news, everyone!", a character dear of us all would say. Yes, you can personalize your card. Later, after the campaign is finished, you will be able to send us a picture that we'll put on the back your card.
You can also put your company logo or anything reasonable you like.

Costs, manufacturing and shipping

Is it expensive?

We don't think so. Most of us who have debit cards pay about $15-$25 per year just for that privilege and up to twice as much for a VISA or MasterCard credit card, depending on your bank and limit. We are asking for $25 for a card with a battery which lasts for three to five years and that can still be used even if the internal battery is depleted.

In order for the card manufacturing to go ahead, we need to achieve a minimum order volume defined by our manufacturing partner, as well as to pay for the initial R&D costs and all the logistics behind this project. We cannot order just a few dozens and, besides, the bigger the order, the cheaper it will be for everyone.

And if the goal is not met?

If the IndieGoGo funding goal is not met, well, in that case, you will not get your card. But you will also get your money back. So, no harm there. There are a lot of things that can go wrong at any time, we will not paint a pretty picture telling you everything will be ok. A meteor might hit the factory. Someone may steal the idea and flood the market. But not meeting the funding goal is the least of our concerns. We're more concerned on, if we do meet the goal, providing you with the best product possible.

Funding stages

The base $150k will allow us to order an initial batch of cards and pay for all associated costs. We need to order a minimum of 6000 cards in the initial batch or manufacturing will not go ahead.

An additional $50k will allow us to invest more of our and the manufacturer's time in R&D to improve the card and give it additional functionalities (in-card calculator and currency conversion, better interface, additional means to exchange data with the card, etc) and possibly offer the shipping fee.

Manufacturing is expected to begin May or June 2014 and shipping August 2014. Delays are possible, but we'll do our best to ship your gift to you as soon as possible.

Shipping

At the moment we can't promise free shipping as the cost per card depends heavily on the order volume. If the initial batch is big enough and drives the price down sufficiently, we will offer the shipping fee. If that goal is achieved, we will warn you on our website, Facebook, Blog, Twitter...

What else will the funding be used for? Any surplus funds will first be used to offer shipping if possible and the remainder to boost other research projects at our institution, which includes future generations of the Pitbull Wallet. Some of them might even get to be here on IndieGoGo as well, when they are mature enough.

This project is the product of the work of a team of very dedicated volunteers at the Onda Technology Institute.

A project of the
Onda Technology Institute

And please, DON'T FORGET TO SHARE!
story_txt:
Pitbull Wallet



Simple. Elegant. Secure.No Apps required. No internet connection necessary. No chance of remote exploiting it.
Checkout this Podcast by Consider This! a very cool bitcoin podcast. Skip to 18:20 if you are in a hurry to see what is said about the Pitbull!

What is the Pitbull Wallet?
The Pitbull Wallet is a credit card sized device for you to safely store your passwords, cryptocoin wallets and other sets of public/private keys. It is NOT a credit or debit card. You will be able to store multiple wallets for multiple types of cryptocoins - Bitcoin, Litecoin, Peercoin, Novacoin, Feathercoin, ... even Dogecoin... (Wow... much safe... very crypto). You can also store passwords so you only have to remember one of them.
And it is so simple to use! You don't need any special app to manage it or anything. For more detailed information, please visit the official project page.
Using it
Your public address is easily reachable. You just have to navigate through the addresses stored. The private keys will be locked
using one single password that can be entered using the embedded keyboard when needed.




        8
        >>
      


        OK
        >>
      




You can use it with your smartphone, tablet, webcam or with a QR-Code scanner.




You can use it to store your own wallets, make reusable gift cards, store public and private keys for other uses, and even to store passwords. Then, you can keep it in your pocket, in your wallet, in your vault, or in a safe deposit box at a bank.

story:
A different style everyday with just one sandal!

 

Everyone has their own meaning for travelling, whether it is to see certain trademarks, an attraction point or even just to have a break from reality! But regardless of what we do or where we go there is one thing we cannot travel without, your luggage. 

 

 

After packing for hours on what to wear or what to bring there seems to never be enough space for everything! You may have noticed but the last thing most people pack is there shoes. You either wear it or bring one extra pair at most. 

 

 

 

We decided to separate the soles and straps in order to let you decide your own unique look. It can be difficult sometimes to decide on which color you want and buying both pairs just seems like too much. 

 

It is an item that can produce light and comfortable fit and shoes that suit various fashion. Many people are already traveling with Todus Sandal and re-styling their daily lives.

 


Various styles to choose from! Try creating your own unique style with various knots! Although the strap can be used as a different design, the string alone can form various patterns! Stay tuned for updated tutorials on creating different styles.

 

 

 

Click Here FOR MORE VIDEOS

 

 

These shoes are optimized for traveling as they are easy to carry when moving around.  With its light weight and compact volume. You can try a variety of straps which can be worn to suit your outfit when you travel, and don’t forget that you can add accessories or apply other knot methods to create a different look every day to show bring out your best looks!

 

 

The sandal that comfortably wraps your feet to distribute the force. Todus M securely connects your feet so the sandal does not come off easily. Proper height gently wraps the soles of your feet against the ground. 

 

NYLON STRING STRAP 

The soft but weak and loose cotton rope strap has been changed to a string strap made of nylon that is stronger, smoother, and more dry. The finishing touch has been changed from basic plastic film tips to more robust and luxurious silicone tips. I tried to reduce foreign body and pain by giving volume to the inner part of the strap.

 

WIDE STRAP

It is a wide-strap dedicated to Todus Sandal M that was not available for conventional Todus Sandal. It uses nylon material as a string strap and wagon branch and has strong and fast drying characteristics. We've made it as smooth and smooth as possible, considering many users' skin loss. The logo is woven in both sides, giving it a firmer, more luxurious feel, and the knot can be knotted using buckles that are not conventional binding methods.

 

 

 

The hole on the sole is not your ordinarily “o” shape and it is a side ways “I shape which allows your to strap your laces at an direction expands your possibility with different knows and styles!

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

It's made of soft and flexible materials. With just a little push, it's soft and has a quick recovery.

To make the soles of the feet feel more comfortable, the leather pattern is placed on the surface to reduce friction. When your feet sweat in the summer, you can feel more comfortable by relieving the slippery feeling and smoothing the soles of your feet.


  Our ESTODUS. logo is embedded on the bottom of each shoe along with striped patterns to help great a better grip when travelling.

story:
As featured: Dark Brown TG Travel Case.

“Out of clutter, find simplicity.

From discord, find harmony.

In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.”  - Albert Einstein


After launching and successfully delivering on several campaigns, we set out to find a versatile travel case that can easily store your passport, bills, coins and other valuables. We wanted something that is simple yet elegant, and can easily be carried from the classroom to the boardroom, and to wherever in the world your next adventure leads you.

As featured: Black TG Travel Case.

 

We need your support Indiegogo!

As featured: Tan TG Travel Case.

As Featured: Green TG Travel Case.

Having successfully completed and delivered several campaigns, we have first-hand experience in executing a campaign from start to finish. We have tested several manufacturers, and have selected a manufacturer with whom we've worked with in several of our designs. The inherent risks of this project include maintaining the quality of the product from the first item to the last one sold. That said, we will be personally in charge of assembling and dispatching our pledge rewards, and in so doing identify items that are not up to par. Another risk pertains to shipping or production delays. Although every project comes with its own risks and challenges, our familiarity with our manufacturer coupled with our knowledge of the production process serve to mitigate this.

story:
We, at MOVA, are dreamers and doers. Our mission is to make every bicycle ride a perfect experience.

Our 2 first Kickstarters permitted us to create a worldwide family of people believing in the same things. 

So yes, we stick with crowdfunding, we stick with high-quality standards and local production in Colombia. 

Thanks for supporting us, you are awesome. <3

NEW FEATURE #1 !
THIS HAPPENS THANK FOR FOR YOUR SUPPORT 

NEW FEATURE #2 !
MAGNET LIGHTS (+29$ as an add on)
THANK FOR FOR YOUR SUPPORT

Magnet Lights will only be available on for backers who add an extra $29 USD as an add on via Backerkit after the campaign.

 

 

 

  

 

We are more than a brand! We are a family. We organize tons of local event around bicycle here in Bogotá and sometime in Paris. We love taking care of you!

 The Freedom Ride Jacket will protect you from the rain!

 You will look awesome!

 


Need support ? Feel free to ask, Contact MOVA directly !
1. Click "Back this project now!"
2. Select a reward 
3. That's it ! You are part of the family.

At the end of the campaign, your will receive a survey asking for your size, color and shipping address. Your jacket is delivered in April at home.

¿Te podemos ayudar con algo?

  • Here is a short link to ask us something on Facebook Messenger
  • Click here (only on your mobile phone) and ask us on WhatsApp: +57 319 329 92 39. 
  • Shoot us an email at family@movacycling.com

    Support: English / Français / Español /Deutsch


 

Under-the-arms zippers or Pit Zips allow you to receive some fresh air and cool down when riding your bicycle.

 

 Stay organized during your day! 3 large pockets make it perfect to carry all your stuff all day long.

 

 

 

REDEFINING YOUR CYCLING EXPERIENCE SO THAT YOU ENJOY EVERY RIDE.

We believe in a simple life where clothes are a tool that protects you from a though environment. Our mission is to enable everyday heroes to enjoy their daily commuting. We want everyone on a bike, ALWAYS.

 

  

 

 

 

 

                                                       

Need support ? Contact MOVA directly !

Shoot us an email at family@movacycling.com, or ask us on WhatsApp: +57 319 329 92 39. We can talk in English, French, Spanish & German. Feel free to ask in your favorite language.

story:
PAST:  What are the chances? A designer with too many ideas meets an engineer who can fabricate anything: a match made in mechanical heaven. The designer needs glasses with rotating lenses. The engineer thinks about it and figures out how to make them.  They hack a pair of glasses for the nosepiece, use a copper strip for the frame, and have the lenses cut to fit. Tada. They fall in love. Pictured: the first pair of Lunai eyewear with etched copper frame. 

PRESENT: The designer is wearing the glasses all the time. On the street, people seem to like them. The designer and the engineer figure, what the heck, let's give it a try on Indiegogo.

FUTURE:  The 3D printed, interchangeable nosepieces and no hinge frame allow for endless design possibilities including, eventually, the option of prescription lenses. We expect that people will hack them and make their own nosepiece. Why not?  

Phil designed and machined two jigs: one for drilling the lenses and one for drilling the frame.

HOW WE MAKE THEM: The copper frame is cut on a Waterjet machine at S&B Machine Works in Westbury. We have the nosepiece 3D printed by Shapeways in Long Island City. Then we drill the lenses and frame by hand and put them together for you.The rubber o-rings fit the nosepiece and the frame (at the ears).

                                         Change the nosepiece with a screwdriver. 

 

 Kemi and Christian are wearing sunglasses with interchangeable 1" (short style) nosepieces.

 

​

Everyday Cosplay. These are 1.5" (tall style) 3D printed nosepieces. Also shown are the rubber o-rings included with your sunglasses. 

 

FlyWings by our friend Chang Yu.  Originally designed so he wouldn't have to take his glasses off when he looked through a microscope.

story:
Who I Am:

My name is Michael Eacrett and I am a finance student at York University in Toronto with additional post-secondary accreditation in New Venture Development and New Product Innovation and Management. I have developed several different product ideas of varying complexity that I am now ready to start bringing to market. The only catch is, in order to pull the trigger on the action plans I need to raise certain levels of funding. Of all the ideas, I have progressed GamePants the furthest in having had samples produced, distribution established, manufacturing secured and a patent pending on my enhancement.

Product Description:

Now you're asking, "what are GamePants?". GamePants are the most comfortable sweatpants that have ever graced the human body with an enhancement that will forever change your lounging, outdoor recreation, sport playing, tailgating, Barbequing, camping, studying and TV watching experience.

I have developed a pocket (GameTech Pocket) that has been inserted into the lower portion of the front crotch seam that when open provides the most convenient place ever to accommodate your beverage in-between sips. I know at first the idea may come across as silly or even as a novelty product; but, while conducting my market research I found people loved the product and provided me with many more scenarios for its use then I had originally thought.

 

 

Specs:

Fabric:

-      77% Cotton/23% Polyester

-      320 gsm material(High quality weight)

-      Pockets on the sides

Colours:

-      Black

-      Dark Grey

 

Sizes:

The pants are based on male sizes but scaled so that women should order 1 size smaller than they normally would (ie. If a female usually wears a small they should order a XS pair of GamePants).

-      Extra Large (XL)

-      Large (L)

-      Medium (M)

-      Small (S)

-      Extra Small (XS)

-      Extra Extra Small (XXS)

The pocket is closed by a hidden zipper that is inset in the seam so when closed it is completely undistinguishable.

Features:

-     GameTech pocket in the in-seam

-     Pockets on the sides

-     Drawstring and elastic waistband

-     Drawstrings at the ankle to tighten if desired

 

GameTech Pocket:


The GameTech Pocket has been created to serve as a utility pocket, be it for holding beverages or any other use you deem it fit for. 

Features of the GameTech Pocket:

-     Stretches to accommodate different size drinking vessels

-     Built in elastic to snuggly hold the contents

-     Closed by a hidden zipper

-     *May be treated to provide a level water resistance* (have not yet decided if this is necessary or feasible).


What makes this innovation so special is not the technology behind it (as that’s pretty simple) but the convenience it provides the user. It is so obvious that I'm amazed that I have the privilege to bring it to the world.

Rest assured that the positioning of the GameTech Pocket does not interfere with the anatomy of any user. 

Inspiration:

I came up with this idea 2 years ago while taking in my first tailgating experience. Thousands of people were jumping from camp to camp in what is one of the largest ongoing social communities in the US. Regardless of whether or not we (my 2 brothers and I) knew any of the people, we were invited into many camps and given beverages. While there were ample places to sit (lawn/lounge chairs, tailgates, benches, etc...) there was nowhere for me to set my drink aside from the ground or in my hand. I figured there had to be some simple answer. I also noticed the most common type of pants being worn were sweatpants. I let those observations sit in the back of my mind to see what I could come up with. Shortly after, I was camping with some buddies and again noticed the same problem.

It wasn't until sitting on my couch watching TV, while leaning forwards to get my drink off the coffee table and being frustrated by the condensation ring it left on the glass, that it hit me. There is a lot of extra room in the build of sweatpants to house a hidden pocket that will not affect the users comfort when in use or not in use.

Solving the Problem:

First, I measured the height and diameter of cans (355ml), bottles (473ml and 500ml), as well as sport drink bottles and the stereotypical plastic red drinking cup.

Second, I created a fabric pouch that would fit all these vessels with an elastic band stitched in to hold all containers snugly. In order to ensure proper installation in a manner that wouldn't cause any discomfort, I enlisted the help of a professional costume maker/seamstress.

Third, I sourced out a patent lawyer to advise me on protecting my innovation and began the patent process.

Fourth, I used industry websites, like Alibaba, to solicit manufacturing quotes. After having received more than 15 responses I devised a list of general industry questions along with some product specific ones that would provide me with a source of screening. After finding a good match I progressed to having samples made.

Fifth, I used these samples to conduct two studies, the 'User Needs and Wants' study and 'Concept Test'. I conducted these studies with random people to further define my target market. These studies helped me determine the degree to which the market would/would not accept the GamePants product. 

Some Interesting Study findings:

- While initially I thought this product would primarily appeal to the male population, the studies showed that females share an equal interest.

- Our product appeals to a broad age group (18-55); however, the different age demographics interest in the product were for different thus requiring modified marketing approaches for the different age segments.

- The studies confirmed that a $40 retail price is safely within the expected price range of respondents.

Product Progress:

To date I have accomplished the following:

  • Patent pending status (provisional patent).
  • Prototypes produced.
  • Marketing plan developed.
  • Conducted a 'User Needs and Wants' study.
  • Conducted a 'Concept Test' study that resulted in uncovering this product has a 73% acceptance rate amongst our target market with an identified intent to purchase.
  • Full cost analysis.
  • Detailed action plan with logical and achievable deadlines. If the funding goal is achieved the target launch date is July 21, 2013.

As well as a lot more.

GamePants is now at the phase where all I need to do is reach my funding goals and then I can implement my action plan that will have GamePants manufactured and available online within 2.5 months. 

In helping me achieve my funding goals you will be bringing purpose to what I have been building towards for nearly a decade while introducing the world to a great innovation in personal comfort. Additionally, I just received notice from  my manufacturer that they

Why the $35K 

After 2 year of navigating regulations, securing provisional patents, R&D, testing countless closures (Velcro, hidden zipper, etc..), numerous sewing lessons and fights with the machines, dealing with customs and certifying agencies, prototyping, and test dummies I need $35,000 to get GamePants to the next phase of development.   

By reaching the $35,000 goal I will be able to pay for all of the advanced manufacturing costs and back end business development. This in turn will allow me to create the best product, at the best price, with the best performance and the best chance of success. If I am unable to reach the entire funding goal, the process will be slowed drastically. The manufacturing costs will skyrocket as my manufacturing contract will expire if not used, driving up the estimated retail price, potentially pricing it out of the market and delaying the release of GamePants inevitably. 

Production Plan

Once the $35K is raised, it will take approx 85 days to take the GamePants from sample/prototype to full manufacturing run (this includes a test run to ensure all the bugs are worked out). During this time I will fully develop the back-end of the business. Once all of the aspects of the business have been assembled the GamePants will undergo a final round of inspection and then shipped to your door! I already have my distribution method in place along with my incorporation underway and my intellectual property protected. At the point of pulling the trigger on the final phase but I just need the ammo.  

Risks and Challenges

My highest priority before bringing GamePants and the Gamezee to the Indiegogo community was to ensure, to the best of my ability, every aspect of production was accounted for. This would allow me to give an accurate expectation as to when GamePants and the Gamezee would be delivered. I took the number of days that my vendors promised me and added 30%, allowing a buffer, in case I encounter unplanned production delays.  But like all things in this world, nothing is certain. I do believe I have accounted for all variables but should obstacles arise I will be completely open and upfront, keeping my supporters informed of all pertinent information. 

GAMEZEE:

My manufacturer has informed me that they can add the GameTech Pocket to a full body jump-suite (Gamezee), similar to a 'Onezie". To be clear I am not launching this product yet but I have included it for different levels of support to get some market feedback. Please note that the pictures are taken from the manufacturers website and are being used for illustrative purposes.

PERKS for our BACKERS, the gift of giving to those that give to us

The Gatekeepers ($15 Perk)

There is an undeniable value in having an engaged honest feedback group when developing new products. Such a group saves money, time and can provide insights that myself or any creator would never realize on our own. For this level of support you will have the option to be just that. I will put together a group of willing backers to use as my initial focus group for screening my ideas (and I have some good ones).

 

 

Super Early Birds ($42 Perk) Get Your GamePants on!

This one is for those who want to be the first to wear GamePants. Backers of this level will have their choice of size (XXS-XL) and either black or dark Grey. I will be doing a special run for my backers to ensure they are the first to fully enjoy the benefits this fine product will bring to the lives of many. There is a cost to shipping ($12 Canada/US) that has been added ($30 for GamePants, $12 for shipping in Canada and the US. Outside Canada and the US add another $12). In addition to the GamePants you will also have the opportunity to be part of my screening group for my other product ideas.

 

The Not so Earliest of Birds ($47 Perk) Still Getting Your GamePants on!

Again, for those who want to be some of the first to wear GamePants. Backers of this level will have their choice of size (XXS-XL) and either black or dark Grey. I will be doing a special run for my backers to ensure they are the first to fully enjoy the benefits this fine product will bring to the lives of many. There is a cost to shipping ($12 Canada/US) that has been added ($35 for GamePants, $12 for shipping in Canada and the US. Outside Canada and the US add another $12). In addition to the GamePants you will also have the opportunity to be part of my screening group for my other product ideas.

  

Don’t choose a colour, get both ($87 Perk)

Couldn’t decide which of the 2 initial colours you wanted? Don’t worry; at this level you’ll get 1-black and 1-dark grey in the size of your choice. The $87 dollars includes $17 for shipping to Canada or the US. If shipping outside of Canada or the US pleas add another $17 to cover shipping. In addition to the GamePants you will also have the opportunity to be part of my screening group for my other product ideas.

 

The GamePants Party ($175 Perk)

Tell 3 of your friends to bring the drinks and you’ll supply the pants. Supporters at this level will get 4 pairs of GamePants to give as gifts or do with as they please. You can choose between black and dark grey for each colour and any size between XXS-XL that you want. The $175 dollars includes $35 for shipping to Canada or the US. If shipping outside of Canada or the US pleas add another $35 to cover shipping. In addition to the GamePants you will also have the opportunity to be part of my screening group for my other product ideas.

 

Get GamePants and be the First Ever Test Group for the Gamezee ($210 Perk)

I just got confirmation from my manufacturer that they can add my patent pending modification to a full body jump-suite (Gamezee). Be the first to try the Gamezee, yes you read it right; I am testing a ‘Onezie’ that has the GameTech pocket added. With the patent pending protection, I am the only one who can have this product produced and I want your feedback; so, choose between Black or Pink in the size you choose. Also, get 2 pairs of GamePants, 1-Black and 1-Dark Grey in the sizes you choose. In this price there is $40 included for shipping in Canada or the US. If shipping outside Canada or the US, please include an extra $30. In addition to the GamePants and Gamezee, you will also have the opportunity to be part of my screening group for my other product ideas.

 

 

The Complete Couple ($330 Perk)

For this amazing level of support you will get 2 GamePants and 2 Gamezee’s. Again, you can be the first to try the Gamezee, the ‘Onezie’ that has the GameTech pocket added. I want your feedback; so, choose between Black or Pink in the size’s you choose. Also, get 2 pairs of GamePants, 1-Black and 1-Dark Grey in the sizes you choose. In this price there is $57 included for shipping in Canada or the US. If shipping outside Canada or the US, please include an extra $40. In addition to the GamePants and Gamezee, you will also have the opportunity to be part of my screening group for my other product ideas.

 

Quattro Squared ($670 Perk) 4 Gamezee’s and 4 GamePants

Just as the title says, supporters at this level get 4 of each. 4-Gamezee’s in either Black or Pink and the sizes you choose and 4-GamePants in your choice of Black or Dark Grey and in the sizes you choose. This total includes shipping to Canada or the US, if shipping elsewhere please include an additional $110. In addition to the GamePants and Gamezee’s, you will also have the opportunity to be part of my screening group for my other product ideas.

 

 

The Big Gift Giver!!! 6+6 ($980)

This is for the big gift giver or the family that plays together, supporters at this level get 6 of each. 6-Gamezee’s in either Black or Pink and the sizes you choose and 6-GamePants in your choice of Black or Dark Grey and in the sizes you choose. This total includes shipping to Canada or the US, if shipping elsewhere please include an additional $150. In addition to the GamePants and Gamezee’s, you will also have the opportunity to be part of my screening group for my other product ideas.

 

 

 Life is better in GamePants....

 

 What you are doing by helping….

After two years, I have finally designed, tested, retested (sigh of relief), and at last arrived at my destination, a perfect marriage of comfort and utility. GamePants are an extremely well made piece of clothing using only high quality materials. I believe this is a great addition to the comfort clothing market and will provide the user with the ultimate comfort experience. 

By supporting this campaign now, you have the opportunity of getting one of the first GamePants, Gamezee's or just helping to ensure they are available down the road when you choose to maximize your comfort. Additionally, by backing this campaign you will be helping bring other products, like the Gamezee, to the market.  

You are also helping to bring into existence a novel new product, one that will reduce the loss of great beverages to unnecessary spillage. Additionally, GamePants opens the door to all kind of social games. I believe this is the best comfort product since the Snuggy. 

Please, please, get the word out there to any of your friends and family you think might be able to benefit from GamePants, or if you just think it’s a fun novel idea. All contributions, be it time or money are greatly appreciated.  I couldn't make this adventure happen without the willingness of my backers and I will be forever grateful to all of you!!! 

Let others know to share the campaign to others!

 FAQs:

  • I will email you as to which color and size GamePants and or Gamezee you would prefer!!!
  • This Campaign is to launch GamePants, introducing the Gamezee as a perk to supporting me is so I may gain some feedback on determining if there is enough interest to bring it to production as well.
  • I have provided some specifics about the products and I fully intend to keep them the way described; however, should an alteration be deemed necessary in the final de-bugging process, I will make the necessary changes while informing all backers of the change.
story_txt:
Who I Am:
My name is Michael Eacrett and I am a finance student at York University in Toronto with additional post-secondary accreditation in New Venture Development and New Product Innovation and Management. I have developed several different product ideas of varying complexity that I am now ready to start bringing to market. The only catch is, in order to pull the trigger on the action plans I need to raise certain levels of funding. Of all the ideas, I have progressed GamePants the furthest in having had samples produced, distribution established, manufacturing secured and a patent pending on my enhancement.

Product Description:
Now you're asking, "what are GamePants?". GamePants are the most comfortable sweatpants that have ever graced the human body with an enhancement that will forever change your lounging, outdoor recreation, sport playing, tailgating, Barbequing, camping, studying and TV watching experience.
I have developed a pocket (GameTech Pocket) that has been inserted into the lower portion of the front crotch seam that when open provides the most convenient place ever to accommodate your beverage in-between sips. I know at first the idea may come across as silly or even as a novelty product; but, while conducting my market research I found people loved the product and provided me with many more scenarios for its use then I had originally thought.
 
 
Specs:
Fabric:
-      77% Cotton/23% Polyester
-      320 gsm material(High quality weight)
-      Pockets on the sides
Colours:
-      Black
-      Dark Grey
 
Sizes:
The pants are based on male sizes but scaled so that women should order 1 size smaller than they normally would (ie. If a female usually wears a small they should order a XS pair of GamePants).
-      Extra Large (XL)
-      Large (L)
-      Medium (M)
-      Small (S)
-      Extra Small (XS)
-      Extra Extra Small (XXS)
The pocket is closed by a hidden zipper that is inset in the seam so when closed it is completely undistinguishable.
Features:
-     GameTech pocket in the in-seam
-     Pockets on the sides
-     Drawstring and elastic waistband
-     Drawstrings at the ankle to tighten if desired
 
GameTech Pocket:
The GameTech Pocket has been created to serve as a utility pocket, be it for holding beverages or any other use you deem it fit for. 
Features of the GameTech Pocket:
-     Stretches to accommodate different size drinking vessels
-     Built in elastic to snuggly hold the contents
-     Closed by a hidden zipper

story:
Join us on  Kickstarter instead - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/278031457/...

Short Summary

Dismayed with the lack of uniqueness in the jewelry market, we decided to create something different. Three years ago, we bought a poor quality miniature wooden ring on the internet. We did not receive what we ordered, totally different than the pictures. 

We knew we could do something better and we decided to create a range of our rings. After working 2-3 years on perfectioning rings, we discovered the secret of making these rings 

We worked hard to create a ring more unique and of better quality than anything else on the market. 
We knew we were on to something when we put up on Facebook a batch of six rings we created by hand. We sold them all
In fact, one man was so stunned by the way the ring looked in the photographs that he bought one and used it to propose to his girlfriend. The beauty of the ring knocked her socks off and, of course, she said yes.

Each ring is carefully created by hand and imparted with natural materials such as flowers, wood, moss, amber, corals, etc. The result makes each jewel look as if it contains its own hidden world. 

 

Development

 

Sketches

 

Our Designs

You can select from these six designs or you can place a custom order. Note - During the campaign, we will be sending out a survey to all of our backers. This survey is where you will specify things like ring size, ring of your selection, your custom ring specifications, etc.

 

 

Want to feel more Special? Then, order a Custom Ring

Order a custom request and we are sure we won't disappoint you.

 

What makes us Unique?

After 2-3 years of experiment...Together, we’ve created our own ultra-clear epoxy resin formula tailored for the brand. This cures much more slowly than other epoxy blends and so seals the wood perfectly. It won’t yellow with time or when under sunlight. It’s also tougher than market resins and smooths better during sanding.

we’ve also created our own coloring agents to work with this specific type of epoxy. These won’t fade after a few months and so the rings will look vibrant for years to come.

Take a look at the high detailing below....

 

Sizing Guide

Note - After the campaign, we will be sending out a survey to all of our backers. This survey is where you will specify things like ring size, ring of your selection, etc.

If you're unsure of your ring size, you can use the website below to calculate it for free. All you'll need is something the same size as a  credit card (library card, grocery store club card, etc., or of course a credit card will do) to hold up to the screen to calibrate the size of how images will show up on your monitor. Once you do that, it will give you a chart of circles. Just hold a ring that you knows fits you up to the screen and find the circle it matches with. Or, you can go to a jewelry store and they'll be able to tell you your size for free. But do not worry if you get your size wrong we will be happy to exchange it for you with no extra cost.

Here's the link to find your ring size: http://findmyringsize.com/

 

Timeline

 

Return Policy

Our rings come with a 30-day return policy. If it breaks, scratches, or needs to be resized then feel free to send it back and we'll take care of it for you.

 

The Impact

This will allow us to bulk order supplies so we can provide you these beautiful rings at a very low price and we would like everyone to feel different with the custom order option where you can send us an image or inspiration and we will create a ring just for you. So why wait? Pre-order your favorite ring now or get a custom ring.

 

Risks & Challenges

The main challenge with this campaign will be delivering the custom made rings on time. Because each ring is will be designed separately and a significant amount of time and care is put into every one, which could take longer than our estimated timeframe for a large number of custom rings. However, our dedicated team has been perfecting this process for several years and we feel confident about our ability to deliver everything on time.

There’s also the challenge of acquiring enough materials, but we’ve established a strong relationship with our chosen supplier and we will be able to overcome that as well.

 

Share these beautiful rings with your friends and family!

We would like to get our name out. Please do not forget to share these rings with your friends and family. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have been working on these rings for the last 2-3 years and we've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to bulk order supplies so we can make these rings available to you and others at a very low price and make you stand out from the crowd.

Be the first one to access these beautiful rings at a very low cost. 

 

For queries, Kindly drop us an email at chirag@myenchantedsoul.com

 

Press Kit

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Where I can select my ring size?
A : After the campaign, we will be sending out a survey to all of our backers. This survey is where you will specify things like ring size, ring of your selection, etc.

Q: Do you make men's ring?
A : Our green ring which is made from coral is a Unisex ring. However, you can also place a custom order.

Q: What do you mean by the custom ring? Does it mean backers can send you photos/images that they would like to have in the ring?
A :  Yes exactly, we will be collecting this information during the survey later.

Q: What if you do not reach your goal?
A : If we do not reach our goal, Indiegogo automatically refunds your money.

Q: What if I order a wrong size even after following the sizing guide?
A: Do not worry if you get your size wrong we will be happy to exchange it for you with no extra cost.

Q: Do you have any other collections?
A: We are only offering six collections for this campaign. However, if you want to order a custom made ring you will have the option to do it. 

Q: What if I am unhappy with my custom order?
A: We will be sending pictures before we send you the ring. If you do not like the ring you will have an option to get a refund.
story_txt:
Join us on  Kickstarter instead - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/278031457/...

Short Summary
Dismayed with the lack of uniqueness in the jewelry market, we decided to create something different. Three years ago, we bought a poor quality miniature wooden ring on the internet. We did not receive what we ordered, totally different than the pictures. 
We knew we could do something better and we decided to create a range of our rings. After working 2-3 years on perfectioning rings, we discovered the secret of making these rings 
We worked hard to create a ring more unique and of better quality than anything else on the market. We knew we were on to something when we put up on Facebook a batch of six rings we created by hand. We sold them allIn fact, one man was so stunned by the way the ring looked in the photographs that he bought one and used it to propose to his girlfriend. The beauty of the ring knocked her socks off and, of course, she said yes.
Each ring is carefully created by hand and imparted with natural materials such as flowers, wood, moss, amber, corals, etc. The result makes each jewel look as if it contains its own hidden world. 
 
Development

 
Sketches

 
Our Designs
You can select from these six designs or you can place a custom order. Note - During the campaign, we will be sending out a survey to all of our backers. This survey is where you will specify things like ring size, ring of your selection, your custom ring specifications, etc.

 





 
Want to feel more Special? Then, order a Custom Ring
Order a custom request and we are sure we won't disappoint you.
 
What makes us Unique?
After 2-3 years of experiment...Together, we’ve created our own ultra-clear epoxy resin formula tailored for the brand. This cures much more slowly than other epoxy blends and so seals the wood perfectly. It won’t yellow with time or when under sunlight. It’s also tougher than market resins and smooths better during sanding.
we’ve also created our own coloring agents to work with this specific type of epoxy. These won’t fade after a few months and so the rings will look vibrant for years to come.
Take a look at the high detailing below....

Here's the link to find your ring size: http://findmyringsize.com/

story:
The beginning of new era

High levels of unemployment, Gun & Knife crime and teen pregnancy are amongst a few things that affect my borough. Welcome to Lambeth, listed by IMD in 2007 as one of the most deprived boroughs in London.

Growing up in these conditions as a child isn't easy and often times can hinder the progression of some. However, we me, it always gave me the passion and determination to help change my community. I knew something had to be done.

It dawned on me while doing research on what made some people successful in their chosen field while others could spend their whole lives just chasing a dream........EUREKA MOMENT

Thus Dream Catchers was born!!!

Dream Catchers is an innovative clothing line with a social message. A message that says 'Change the status quo' 'Be the change you want to see' 'Don't just chase your dreams, catch them'

 

#StopChasingStartCatching

www.facebook.com/dreamcatchersuniverse

http://instagram.com/dreamcatcherworld 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order for Dream Catchers to be released early 2014 I am asking for £5,500

This will enable me to secure the following:

  • A state of the art screen printing machine - £2495 -
  • A two day screen printing course for two young people hired by Dream Catchers - £390.00x2 -
  • Adobe Illustrator CS6 windows full edition for in house graphic designs - £329.00
  • In house photo production  - Canon EOS 600D camera - £399 / Canon Telephoto lens - £826 / Elinchrom lighting kit - £629

As this is a fixed funding campaign, if we do not reach our target all monies will be refunded.

What you get - The Perks!

  • £1 - Personal thank you on our Facebook page
  • £10 - Personal thank you on our Facebook page + Limited addition Dream Catcher badge 
  • £25 - Dream Catcher snapback or t-shirt which retails at £30 + above perks
  • £35 -  Dream Catcher Sweatshirt retailing at £45
  • £50 - Dream Catcher Sweatshirt + T-shirt
  • £75 - Dream Catcher Hoodie + snapback + Mixtape
  • 150 - Dream Catcher Hoodie, Sweatshirt, Reglan shirt, Snapback 
  • £500 - Receive all Dream Catcher clothing and be listed as a benefactor on the official website.

 

The Impact your support will make.

As explained above, the high rate of unemployment is one of problems in my community but as you will see is limited to only my community.

In November 2011 youth unemployment reached an all time high with 1.02 million young people out of work. The high levels of youth unemployment in the United Kingdom have led some politicians and media commentators to talk of a "lost generation".

The Prince's Trust (A charity set up by the Prince of Wales) says if nothing is done, the UK could be on the brink of a youth jobs crisis. The World Health Organisation has warned youth unemployment in the UK is a "public health time bomb waiting to explode"

(Here is a link to a recent study about the effects unemployment has on young people: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-25559089#?utm_source=twitterfeed&utm_medium=twitter)

So With all that said, I would like to be apart of the re-emergence of youth employment in the UK. With your help, I want to make Dream Catchers into a sustainable business that can employ young people.

Also to tackle some of the other issues that effect deprived areas such as Gun & Knife crime, I am training to become a youth mentor. The goal is to Work with at risk, High risk and detached youth to help mould them back into positive contributing members of society.
So I will use a percentage of the profits to create community cohesion events and projects to aid in the development of young people and deprived boroughs.

 

 

#StopChasingStartCatching

www.facebook.com/dreamcatchersuniverse

http://instagram.com/dreamcatcherworld

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

So please people get involved anyway you can. Just because you can't donate doesn't mean you can't help. spread the word as far as you can! Find this campaign on the links below and share it all over your social media sites and tell your family and friends to do the same.

Also if you know of any magazines/blogs or radio station that would be interested in doing an interview with me please contact: Officialdreamcatchers@gmail.com.

And remember

IT'S TIME TO STOP CHASING AND START CATCHING!!!!!

story:
Jacopo Ridolfi Shoes is a new proposal, based on ancient Italian traditions.

We make shoes: every day we create unique products, made in Italy with premium quality materials, handmade and hand-painted with care. Ridolfi is our family name, our story: we are working to grow and turn a family business into a new brand, in order to offer high quality products crafted by the last artisans and shoemakers of our country.

We care a lot about art, craft and comfort. We believe in making unique products, for those who want to live as individuals and stop existing as consumers, moved only by the imposed fashion of the moment. We are excited and we dream to make shoes as unique as the people who are going to wear them. 

Our brand looks after the whole production, from leathers selection, through model design and hand paint operations, to the sale of an authentic Italian handmade product. Each shoe is unique and tells many stories: that of Italian fine materials used to create it, together with the craftsmanship and the inspiration that leads to the combination of bold colors. Above all, it tells the taste of those who choose it.

Get yours and walk with us!

 

 

We are artisans. Our main inspirations come from art and nature. It’s not just about the shape, we strongly believe that hand-painted color makes every shoe a distinguished and unique piece, looking back to the great tradition of Italian art. 

We make our shoes with absolute care and we like to explore the infinite range of creative possibilities, paying serious attention to the research and the quality of top level materials, together with care of comfort (i.e. wide fit and high toe). Our classic Oxford and Derby models are handmade, with a personal touch: unique combinations of materials (leather and suede, gloss and matte finish) and colors. 

 

 

Our shoes are extraordinarily comfortable, breathable (yes, your feet are really safe) and long-lasting. Colors and materials make these products quite polished, but also wearable for an original touch in everyday life.

Wood is our great inspiration for this collection, so why should we use a normal box? "Take care" also means pack our shoes in a wooden box, handmade by other local artisans, where we always put a little mid-soft brush and a jar of delicate conditioning cream. 

 

Long story short: because of the industrial process, all the leather shoes of the world are made with leathers already colored in tannery. Leathers usually go inside an automatic spraying paint machine, a big tunnel where they get painted by airbrush and then dried inside an oven. Shoemakers normally buy colored leather from tanneries and then they work it (cutting and assembling, making the shoes).

We start from a completely different concept. We buy white leather from tannery, then we cut it, hand paint it (yes, one by one) and assemble it. In our method the color follows the shape of the shoe and the line (not the opposite), creating a design which is unique and impossible to realize in any other industrial way. It's a process that requires more time and more craftsmanship: the final result is stunning, and unique. Then, selling directly to our backers and customers, with no retail increase, we are able to keep affordable prices.

Have you ever felt the difference?

 

 

(At the present time we are able to produce a maximum of 30 pieces per day, so we set the delivery timeline according to this productive capacity).

 

First of all, we guarantee a product entirely handmade and crafted in Italy, step by step. This is our commitment and our cultural challenge. For us, the brand “Made in Italy” is a promise of beauty and high quality. Italy is inspiring. We see centuries of history, art and culture all over the land, in each beautiful city and little town. We enjoy unique colors, shapes, flavors and views. 

Wouldn’t it be nice to be part of it?

Since every foot is different, we will send to all our backers a simple chart and ask for 2 measurements (in addition to the request of the usual shoe size): this little check will provide the best fit. All our shoes are true to size and very comfortable (with wide fit).

ACCESSORIES

We want to do more and give you a world of different and unique possibilities. We like the details and we know you all need beautiful accessories, so we offer our collection of premium quality leather belts, handmade and hand-painted one by one, as our shoes are! 

We can do something special: paint shoes and belts together, in the same phase of the making process, to obtain unique matching products. The possibilities are endless and this is why we like our work: have you already chosen your style?

Take a look and choose yours!

 

We also would be so glad to include in each order another beautiful match: the unique bracelets made by our artisan friends of Lasko Lifestyle. We are proud to introduce you this exclusive opportunity: more products really made in Italy, one by one, with great care.

Lasko Lifestyle is a small handcrafting studio based near Verona, as we are: they offer stylish bracelets, inspired by an original, sophisticated and creative lifestyle, perfect for travelers and outdoor enthusiasts. Each bracelet is handmade with quality materials and comes with a great packaging. Both their collections look great with our shoes: "Materia", made with colored leather laces, inspired to a dynamic and original lifestyle; and "Porto", made with paracord, inspired to outdoor lifestyle and action sport. Each Lasko bracelet comes with a handmade stamp rough cotton bag. There's more! For this occasion, Lasko offer a little preview of the next leather collection, "Terra", even more sophisticated.

We strongly believe in this artisanal local combo, could be a great match and an exclusive opportunity for you. Take the chance and share the news, we are waiting for you!

Good things come to those who wait. At the present time we are able to produce a maximum of 30 pieces per day, so we set the delivery timeline according to this productive capacity. We always put a strong effort in order to satisfy all our customers, but please consider that every piece is handmade and hand-painted (so, it's worth a little waiting for).

 

1957: My mother, Nicoletta, begin her adventure working in the shoe district of Verona, discovering how to choose the best materials, to be familiar with shapes and models. She learn a precious handmade tradition, that turns into passion and family business. As all stories are, this is made of experiences, inspirations, encounters. 

2016: From a family business to a new local brand, hopefully. Join our campaign and be a part of this artisanal dream! 

 

We make unique shoes because we think that every person is truly unique and different. You will find updates and daily inspirations on our Facebook page: we will be so glad if you decide to share our work.

Facebook @jacoporidolfishoes

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Our challenge is to introduce a new production process, a company of painters, who paint the shoes one by one. We have a long experience in high quality manufacturing and we are prepared to confront any new situation, included this one. We are sure about every step and we know what to do.

The most common risk in our work is production delays. The manufacturing process relies on several components and cooperations with other parts (mostly with our suppliers). There is always the possibility of a slight delay.

However, we will be providing updates every step of the way.

We are sure about every step and we know what to do.The most common risk in our work is production delays. The manufacturing process relies on several components and cooperations with other parts (mostly with our suppliers). There is always the possibility of a slight delay.However, we will be providing updates every step of the way.

story:
-As seen on the Front Page of CNBC News!-


Help fund NEF's first American factory and return footwear production to the USA!

Buy a pair of our XT Comp Trailrunners (pictured right) and support our technology innovation, smart manufacturing, and groundbreaking design.

Every pair of XT Comps we sell will help fund our first factory. Choose from Mens and Womens!

Table of Contents: Click to Jump!

1. Who is New England Footwear?
2. Our "Made in the USA" Approach
3. The Factory is the Future
4. How far does $150,000 go?
5. How can you help?

Who is New England Footwear?

Based in Newmarket, NH, New England Footwear disrupts the footwear market by leveraging innovation, challenging conventional thinking, and meeting real human needs in non-obvious ways.

NEF's premiere footwear collection is GoLite Footwear, which includes a range of outdoor footwear from casual to trailrunning.

Doug Clark is the founder and CEO of New England Footwear. He leads a team of footwear industry experts in designing, marketing, and distributing GoLite and other collections to more than 250 retailers across the U.S.

Doug is a 30 year industry veteran. Prior to establishing NEF, he served as the Chief Innovation Officer at The Timberland Company and as leader of its award-winning Invention Factory. Clark led business and product teams at Timberland for 14 years from 1994 to 2008.

Prior to joining Timberland, Clark was a Senior Product Engineer in the Advanced Concepts Group at Reebok and before that spent six years as a researcher in footwear biomechanics labs.

When Doug began his career at Nike in the late seventies, the company still produced shoes in the historic mills of New England.

But within a few years of joining the industry, he watched helplessly as thousands of footwear factories closed all around New England, taking tens of thousands of jobs overseas.

Many of Doug's close friends lost their livelihood, while U.S.-based product teams began making countless trips to Korea, Taiwan, and then China to get shoes made.

Although Doug was resigned to the industry's drive toward lower-cost labor, it was then that he committed himself to someday find a way to return shoe making back to New England and America.

^Back to Table of Contents^

Our "Made in the USA" Approach

After nearly 30 years of producing in Asia, we have now developed new techniques that allow for a better way to make innovative, high-quality footwear at a competitive price, closer to home.

In 2011, NEF won a prestigous Green Launching Pad Award from the University of New Hampshire.

The grant allowed NEF to explore technology ideas and manufacturing techniques that would exponentially increase the productivity of a production line, and remove 70% of the labor from the process currently used in conventional "cut, glue, and stitch" Asian factories.

After two years of innovating on designs, processes, and materials, we now know we can make the same or better shoe for less money - in the USA. And we're ready to take this novel approach to scale.

We believe we can make the same or better shoe for the same or better price- in the USA, not in Asia.

Our approach means less glue, less material, less waste, higher quality, and breakthrough designs never before seen by the consumer.

^Back to Table of Contents^

Buy a Pair and Fund Our Factory

The Factory is the Future

A multi-billion dollar market can be reshored and restored, bringing thousands of jobs home with it.

With your help, we will build our first factory here in New Hampshire, one capable of producing two million pairs a year.

Though the plan is promising and praised by industry veterans, the high cost of building a factory requires creative approaches to raising money.

We're asking the wisdom of the crowd to prove that Americans want footwear made with passion, innovation, and American hands, right here in New Hampshire.

Vote with your wallet!

Buy a pair, change the game. And we'll start making our shoes right here in New England.

^Back to Table of Contents^

Buy a Pair and Fund Our Factory

How Far Does $150,000 Go?

NEF's first two production lines will cost over $1.5 million to build and staff.

Much of the cost can be borrowed through traditional bank loans and economic development programs to help us fund both equipment and the building.

NEF needs your pledge (and hundreds more) to show potential investors and/or lenders that there is a market and a passion for great footwear Made in the USA.

Many marketers and researchers believe that "Made in the USA" is not that important or motivating to the American consumer.

We aim to prove them wrong, one pair at a time.

With thousands of pairs pre-sold through this campaign and your money in hand, we believe we can leverage, cajole, and hustle the additional funding we need to turn on the production line in 2014.

^Back to Table of Contents^

Buy a Pair and Fund Our Factory

How Can You Help?

1. Pledge any amount you can!

2. Spread the word via social media, email, or even (gasp) word of mouth!

3. Contact your local media and ask them to pay attention to our campaign!

^Back to Table of Contents^

Copyright 2013 New England Footwear Manufacturing LLC

Campaign copywriting and web content development by:

We aim to prove them wrong, one pair at a time.
With thousands of pairs pre-sold through this campaign and your money in hand, we believe we can leverage, cajole, and hustle the additional funding we need to turn on the production line in 2014.^Back to Table of Contents^

How Can You Help?

story:
Hi do you have a few minutes?

My name is Trinity Aragon, and I’m the founder of eco aesthetic. What we are is a values driven retail company that is reinventing the way you consume clothing. Now what’s the most simple item of clothing you can think of? What’s something that you and most people on the planet own? A tee shirt. Everyone buys, wears, and gets rid of t-shirts. Now there’s one problem with that and that’s the last part. What we are seeing right now is a shift in the textile market towards being more eco-friendly. With stores like H&M set to have textile recycling bins in all retail stores the change is clear. Today’s consumers care about what happens before and after the purchase of their clothes.  We’ve been to world textile shows, with organizations right on the precipice but not quite pushing this one simple thing- the solution to this social, environmental, and economics crisis- user centered design and data driven corporate sustainability. We propose to you a simple line of clothing, things everyone consumes; t-shirts, hoodies, socks, underwear, and so on. What makes us different than everyone else out there is this unbelieveably small consideration costing almost nothing. A QR code sewn into each and every one of our products. By doing this we can have complete supply chain transparency, the creation and growth of a new kind of eco-capitalism, and gain insights into the market we’ve never seen before. We’ve done our research, we know how to guarantee this is a success and have a market hungry for our products, now all we need is your support.

Are you in?
