story:
Meet the Wallette

Tired of lugging around a purse or clutch every time you leave the house? The Wallette by Wild & Free is the first wallet designed with you in mind. 

Crossing over from the world of bulky handbags and bland bra stashes, the Wallette simply clips to whatever you’re wearing and adds a splash of style. 3 out of the 5 versions come with genuine Swarovski crystals.

Free Shipping for US backers. International backers, please follow the instructions listed with each perk.
_______________________________________________________________________

You don’t have to hide it
Guaranteed to work with any style of bra, we see no reason to limit its application to just that - you don’t have to hide it; and if you are in the habit of stuffing things in your bra, the Wallette means you don’t have to be embarrassed to strip down to your lingerie anymore!

_______________________________________________________________

Buy a little peace of mind
With the Wallette, here’s a few of the things you will never have to worry about again:

  • Accidentally drinking away your cab money

  • Not being able to buy coconut water after a jog because you left your wallet at home

  • Ruining your cute cocktail dress by wearing the wrong clutch

  • The panic attacks that typically ensue when you think you lost your purse

  • Having some sketchy dude rob you just because you instinctively squeezed your purse tighter as you walked past him

_______________________________________________________________

Everything you need

While being as slim as possible, the Wallette accommodates everything you would need for a night out - upto 3 cards and a handful of bills.

_______________________________________________________________

The right Wallette for you

Available in a variety of styles ranging from minimalist to flashy, you’re sure to find a Wallette that works with your look. If you’re not one to be tied down to a particular look, you could even have a variety to go with whatever you’re in the mood for! Note: We welcome your feedback on what styles appeal to you the most, so we can better understand the production ratios.

_______________________________________________________________

Your involvement

We’re counting on your support to help get production for the Wallette up and running. Having secured manufacturers for the product & packaging, its just a matter of raising the necessary funds to place the minimum production order and take care of warehousing and logistics - thats where this Indiegogo campaign comes in.

_______________________________________________________________

Manufacturing

The Wallette will be made from a unique combination of Stainless Steel, Leather, Brass* and genuine Swarovski crystals*.

We have a wide network of manufacturers we have worked with in the past, and are positive we can guarantee the highest possible quality to match, and hopefully exceed, your expectations. Our mission statement captures this sentiment the best - we aim to create high-quality crowdfunded products that cater to the well informed, proactive consumer.

*Not applicable to all styles

_______________________________________________________________

Project Status & Timeline

Being a relatively simple idea to execute, we don’t expect any major hiccups in our road to production. That being said, we are still in the process of getting samples made and ironing out some of the functional & production details. We anticipate about 90 days between our funding goal being met and actually shipping orders out.

_______________________________________________________________

Spread the word
As with any new product launch, the biggest challenge is getting the word out. For our part, we are working on an extensive launch campaign to get Wallette featured on as many blogs, websites, and magazines as possible. Given the lack of anything quite like it on the market, we hope the idea resonates with you enough to share it with your friends and family.

story:
Gery Beach 

The Gery Beach will bring comfort and luxury to the beach thanks to its aluminium design, its 13 positions, a foam of great quality and a fabric made for all kinds of uses : The Gery Beach will make your reading becomes a pleasure.

Due to its light weight (less than 3 kilos), you will be able to bring your Gery Beach anywhere : At the beach, at a park or even to lie down around your swimming pool.

   

4 colors, especially 4 you !

Make your choice...


We need your help !


I'm Gery, the inventor of the Gery Beach. My partners Philippe, soufian and I have been working hard on this project. The product is ready but we need your help to get the necessary funds to start the production. 
Next spring, be among the lucky ones using your Gery Beach ! Thank you so much !

story:
⭐️ we are just students from Ukraine with a cool idea.
⭐️ we have put a lot of love and inspiration into this project. 
⭐️ we want to show people that things and accessories from eco materials can be stylish, functional and comfortable at the same time.
⭐️ for the implementation of the project, we need 500$
⭐️ if for some reason (it’s hardly possible) the project will not be implemented, all the funds raised will be spent on recycling (http://www.best-trash.com/)
⭐️ The main goal of the Unibag project is to “promote” things from eco-materials. After all, today the problem of ecology♻️ is a global problem of the entire population of the planet.
⭐️ Every year more than 100 thousand whales, seals, turtles die from plastic bags. ❌More than a million seabirds and mammals die annually from ingesting plastic debris.
⭐️ But even if a plastic bag does not harm any of the animals - it will harm nature☹️, because it decomposes for at least 100 years!⚠️
⭐️ The solution to the problem - things from eco materials.♻️
⭐️ If each of us tries to minimize plastic emissions to the environment, through the use of recycled materials✅, perhaps the solution to this problem will be one step closer.

story:
NAPOSPY are the most advanced leather gloves for men ever made. Equipped with tracking technology, permanent touchscreen functionality and highest quality leather. You will never want to have another pair of gloves!

 

 

 

NAPOSPY are equipped with most advanced, abrasion resistant touchscreen technology. It works with all fingers and is not visible! It's compatible with all devices such as smartphones, tablets, but also with ATMs, vending machines and car navigation systems.
story_txt:

NAPOSPY are equipped with most advanced, abrasion resistant touchscreen technology. It works with all fingers and is not visible! It's compatible with all devices such as smartphones, tablets, but also with ATMs, vending machines and car navigation systems.

story:
What is the one single ingredient common to all quality cocktails? Premium Ice!

Premium Ice is distinguished by its crystal-clear transparency. Because its perfectly-formed lattice structure is devoid of air bubbles & other impurities, it melts slowly.Research shows clear ice melts up to 5 times slower.

To us, that‘s the difference between an enjoyable cocktail, good to the last sip; versus a hastily-withering pool of watery booze, a pitiful waste!

With the aspiration to provide proper companion to your top-shelf liquors and lovingly-executed concoctions, we introduce IceQimo Clear Ice Maker – a simple & flexible way to making Clear Ice in your home fridge.

How Does It Work?

Thanks to the physics of “directional freezing”, the ice made by IceQimo is crystal-clear. 

By introducing temperature delta, liquid freezes into ice in a controlled fashion, all air bubbles & impurities are pushed to the bottom of the thermal isolator as the controlled freezing starts from the top, leaving only clean & structured ice formation within the mold.  This visual transparency makes your drinks even more inviting.

Designed with flexibility & versatility in mind, IceQimo provides you with a full arsenal of clear ice form-factors (3 Shapes), allowing you to exercise full control over your tipple. Each IceQimo kit consists of --

  • One Thermal Isolator
  • One Ice Mold
  • Two Shaping Dividers - for 1/6 Wedges & 1/8 Pellets 
  • One Base Tray 

Different Shapes for Different Mix

■ Spheres - for Single Malts, Bourbons, and other sippers On The Rocks. Minimal contact area causes minimal dilution.

■ 1/6 Wedges - for Stirring & maintaining chill.

■ 1/8 Pellets - for Shaking & quick chilling.

Simple to Use

To make Clear Ice, simply insert the food-grade silicon mold into the custom thermal isolator, and fill water to the brim. Place in freezer, and in 14~18 hours, voila! Your drinks are ready for a refreshing upgrade.

To enhance user-convenience, a thoughtful Base Tray is included. The Base Tray employs an interlocking design, which easily combines, Lego-style, to hold multiple IceQimo together.

Practically, it helps keep your ice-making procedure spillage-free, and doubles as a holder for Sphere Ices after extraction -- so that you can make more ice for seconds : )

A tray in multiple way for holding your IceQimo & Sphere Ices !

The tray with Interlocking design for both Horizontal & Vertical free-combination.

The Details

■ Ice Mold -- 

  • Material: food-grade silicon
  • Size: outer diameter - 82mm ; height - 70mm ; Sphere Ice diameter - 60mm
  • Color: foggy-white & black

■ Thermal Isolator --

  • Material: stainless steel
  • Size: outer diameter - 82mm ; height - 113mm
  • Color: stainless steel original

■ Base Tray --

  • Material: food-grade silicon
  • Size: 92 (L) x 92 (W) x 44 (H) mm
  • Color: foggy-white & black

Coaster Design - It comes in a set of six, and provides the ideal back-drop to showcase your crystal-clear ice.

Progress & Schedule

Over the past five months, we have been running lots of experiments, designs prototyped & tested, tools paid for, and sample for verification. We have executed two iterations of silicon tools, and these sample molds have enabled the beautiful Sphere Ice. The Dividers are currently done by CNC, and verified to work; and we see no problem for them to ramp via injection molding. In short, IceQimo works & works beautifully.

To ensure that we are truly making the best clear ice, we have a few more ideas for optimization, and thus plan to execute 2~3 pilot-run molds to test them out. As such, we still have more work to do. If we find sufficient funds, our schedule is to conclude on Design Finalized by Jan, 2014, and ship by Apr, 2014.  Our goal is to make it in time to chill your summer cocktails !

The Final IceQimo may or may not change in design from pictures & specification above. But, you can be certain -- that you are getting the BEST clear ice maker for home.

Your Perks

Parts List

If you'd like to have more items for spare parts, please choose your needs and add up the amount on your perk:

* Thermal Isolator - $15 per

* Ice Mold - $12 per

* Shaping Dividers - $8 per (a set of both 1/6 Wedges & 1/8 Pellets )

* Base Tray - $5 per

* Coaster Set (6 pcs) - $10 per

We’ll confirm your add-on requirements via survey and ship them with your perks all together.

About Us

We are Team ISHUJA -- three guys banding together & sharing each expertise to realize our Make Better Designs dream. Up to now, we have successfully developed a beautiful bamboo-stylus pen (Eco-Essential Pen), and won an iF 2013 Product Design Award for Kitchen Tools !

For this project, our vendor-base includes an ISO-certified silicon products factory with10+ years of experience based in Taiwan, and a thermal-cup manufacturer who’s been supplying multiple customers for 15 years. This is not to say that our execution will be guaranteed perfect, but we’ll do our best to demonstrate by accumulating credibility (please reference our Backer’s comment on prior projects).  Thus we shall work very very hard, driven by pride in ourselves & in the reputation of Excellence-Made-In-Taiwan ! 

We Aim to Please. Thank you very much for your support !!

transparency makes your drinks even more inviting.
Designed
with flexibility & versatility in mind, IceQimo provides you with a full arsenal of clear ice form-factors (3 Shapes), allowing you to exercise full control over your tipple. Each IceQimo kit consists of --


One Thermal Isolator
One Ice Mold
Two Shaping Dividers - for 1/6 Wedges & 1/8 Pellets 
One Base Tray 


Different Shapes for Different Mix

■ Spheres - for Single Malts, Bourbons, and other sippers On The Rocks. Minimal contact area causes minimal dilution.



■ 1/6 Wedges - for Stirring & maintaining chill.



■ 1/8 Pellets - for Shaking & quick chilling.


Simple to Use
To make Clear Ice, simply insert the food-grade silicon mold into the custom thermal isolator, and fill water to the brim. Place in freezer, and in 14~18 hours, voila! Your drinks are ready for a refreshing upgrade.
To enhance user-convenience, a thoughtful Base Tray is included. The Base Tray employs an interlocking design, which easily combines, Lego-style, to hold multiple IceQimo together.
Practically, it helps keep your ice-making procedure spillage-free, and doubles as a holder for Sphere Ices after extraction -- so that you can make more ice for seconds : )

A tray in multiple way for holding your IceQimo & Sphere Ices !

The tray with Interlocking design for both Horizontal & Vertical free-combination.

The Details
■ Ice Mold -- 

Material: food-grade silicon
Size: outer diameter - 82mm ; height - 70mm ; Sphere Ice diameter - 60mm
Color: foggy-white & black

■ Thermal Isolator --

Material: stainless steel
Size: outer diameter - 82mm ; height - 113mm
Color: stainless steel original

■ Base Tray --

Material: food-grade silicon
Size: 92 (L) x 92 (W) x 44 (H) mm
Color: foggy-white & black





Coaster Design - It comes in a set of six, and provides the ideal back-drop to showcase your crystal-clear ice.

Progress & Schedule
Over the past five months, we have been running lots of experiments, designs prototyped & tested, tools paid for, and sample for verification. We have executed two iterations of silicon tools, and these sample molds have enabled the beautiful Sphere Ice. The Dividers are currently done by CNC, and verified to work; and we see no problem for them to ramp via injection molding. In short, IceQimo works & works beautifully.To ensure that we are truly making the best clear ice, we have a few more ideas for optimization, and thus plan to execute 2~3 pilot-run molds to test them out. As such, we still have more work to do. If we find sufficient funds, our schedule is to conclude on Design Finalized by Jan, 2014, and ship by Apr, 2014.  Our goal is to make it in time to chill your summer cocktails !The Final IceQimo may or may not change in design from pictures & specification above. But, you can be certain -- that you are getting the BEST clear ice maker for home.

Your Perks





Parts List

If you'd like to have more items for spare parts, please choose your needs and add up the amount on your perk:
* Thermal Isolator - $15 per
* Ice Mold - $12 per
* Shaping Dividers - $8 per (a set of both 1/6 Wedges & 1/8 Pellets )
* Base Tray - $5 per
* Coaster Set (6 pcs) - $10 per
We’ll confirm your add-on requirements via survey and ship them with your perks all together.
About Us
We are Team ISHUJA -- three guys banding together & sharing each expertise to realize our Make Better Designs dream. Up to now, we have successfully developed a beautiful bamboo-stylus pen (Eco-Essential Pen), and won an iF 2013 Product Design Award for Kitchen Tools !
For this project, our vendor-base includes an ISO-certified silicon products factory with10+ years of experience based in Taiwan, and a thermal-cup manufacturer who’s been supplying multiple customers for 15 years. This is not to say that our execution will be guaranteed perfect, but we’ll do our best to demonstrate by accumulating credibility (please reference our Backer’s comment on prior projects).  Thus we shall work very very hard, driven by pride in ourselves & in the reputation of Excellence-Made-In-Taiwan ! 
We Aim to Please. Thank you very much for your support !!

story:
To whom it may concern,

First of all, we want to thank you for all the emails we received.

Through this letter, we want to keep the people that didn’t email us updated.

In all the emails we kept getting the same comments and question, if we maybe have a better representation of our product. The quality and execution of our product didn’t give a good enough image of the end result. That’s why people were reluctant to buy it, and we understand that. A lot of people told us they loved the product and would buy the product if it was of higher quality, and even pay more for it.

We indicated that the final product would be of much higher quality, but we failed to show this in our prototype. We are always open to suggestions and comments because the customer is always right. Because of this we regretfully announce after long deliberation with our investors, we are pulling the product of the market for now.

We want to bring you the best product possible, so we are pulling the product of the market to enhance and modify the product for the better. Better quality and better advertisement is our goal, to implement all your wishes will take a while. But we hope to have the product back as soon as possible. 
Keep following us at https://www.facebook.com/Walkenazshoesofficialp... to be updated about the latest news and when our Indiegogo campagne will resume.

story:
Hi! I've been hooked to 3D in general since before I can remember, be it for 3DCG, 3D printing and for, lately, VR. I have printed over 15 kg of filament (more than 6,000 meters or for 1224 continuous hours) with my trusted Prusa i3 Mk2S to make anything from C-Clamps to Desktop cases.

Get the colour you want thanks to 3D printing!

With this project I want to highlight the strengths of 3D printing as a mass production solution. As the logistical manager of this project, I have developed means to operate a fleet of 3D printers 24/7, and with a flawless print quality.

With your help, I will acquire three Prusa I3 MK3s and launch a full scale production of the Vive System Blocker, a must-have device for anyone playing intense VR games.

The naturally layered surface improves grip.

To setup a well fed fleet of I3 Prusa I3 MK3s, the bare minimum initial investment stands at 3,000$ USD. Any funding past this point will go towards the innumerable fees that go into setting up this kind of enterprise (believe me, there are many).

Easily install/remove the System Blocker with its simple clip mechanism

Can't participate in the funding? Make some noise about the project! Tell anyone that you know is cursed by accidentally hitting the system button!

story:
• Realized that wallets either always lack something or have it too much?
  • Sometimes getting an idea to make your own one?

We've got you covered! Meet Walldram! 

The Walldram has been completely redesigned!
The surface is made of high-quality carbon fiber leather with special woven texture, which is durable, slippery and waterproof. Learn more @

https://www.walldram.com

 

Combine different accessories with the main wallet according to your needs

or use them standalone

 

 

 

from Bifold to minimalist one and beyond. Use it your way!

 

Choose accessories to match your needs

 

neck lanyard included

 

9 Roomy Card Slots & 2 Roomy Slots For Folded Bills and Cards

 

Be a creator of your own wallet and let the Walldram express your uniqueness!

 

 

Everything you would expect from a great wallet

 

 

Personalize it with your name or make the wallet a unique special gift with a free engraving.

 

 

 

 

 

It's What Your Instagram and Facebook Could Look Like

Great 5 in 1 Wallet at affordable price

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For bulk orders, please contact us at: hello@walldram.com

 

Share #Walldram

Share Walldram by the one of the ways below and tag a friend who needs this.

 

 

Affiliate Program

Earn 10% commission for every purchase made on links shared by you!

3 simple steps:

  1. Click on LEARN MORE and register as a Booster.
  2. Share your unique Booster link on your Facebook, Twitter, Website, or wherever you'd like!
  3. Refer to your Kickbooster dashboard and watch your commissions roll in!

     

    Risks & Challenges

    We are happy to introduce you that the product you see on the campaign is the final production sample.

    We spent over 1 year of prototyping and testing to make such a great wallet, and now we've concluded the complete production line, all the way through to the packing and shipping.

    We understand that crowdfunding process can bring up unexpected issues, but we minimized the risks and we've been covered every eventually raised obstacles.

    As our CEO & Founder says: Doing business it is critical for you to have a Plan B, it may be better than your Plan A!

    Based on this we have two backups for each step of the manufacturing process up to shipping - happily we'll definitely deliver on time.

    As the honesty and transparency is the huge value for our company, we will keep in touch with our backers by sharing every step about the process of the way through Indiegogo updates and comments to ensure you're always in the loop.

story:
Hello, I am Nadya - designer and owner of Gareth&Queen swimwear. 

This story began when I couldn’t find the swimwear I like - Some were not elegant, some too revealing some were made of the very strong and heavy fabric which was not very comfortable on the body. Thats why I decided to make swimwear by myself.

My idea was to make the new interpretation of retro swimwear and combine it with innovative fabric. The inspiration for the collection is italian movies of 50’s. Why retro? Because of it’s feminine lines, elegance and sophistication.

Gareth and Queen swimwear is minimalistic cut and interesting decorative elements. The beauty of geometry and shapes creates our design esthetics. We define our style as sophisticated sexuality. We want to create special athmosphere for you. We want you to feel special.

We use an innovative italian fabric specially created for professional sports. The fabric is very soft and light, it’s almost weightless - you don’t feel it on your body.

We are making a small collection, concentrating on the quality of every element - from cut and fit to fabric.

We found a team of talented people, we choose the best fabric, we made patterns and samples - we corrected them many times until we get perfect silhouette and fit, we found the factory in beautiful Barcelona.  Now we need your help to produce the first collection. Be beautiful, be unique, be elegant in our swimwear.

I put so much love and energy into this collection. I hope you like it.

I appreciate your help, thank you. 



Perk 1 (bottom) and Perk 4 (top)


Perk 2 (bottom) and Perk 3 (top)


Perk 5


Perk 6


Perk 7


Perk 8


IMPORTANT: As soon as the campaign will be finished, we will contact you to know your size.

story:
We are still in the race!!


Check out the new LifeTip Project Website

www.lifetip.co.uk


Jump to: Functions Versions User interface App&Cloud
Hardware Developers Team FAQ

Cardiac arrest, is the abrupt loss of heart function in a person who may or may not have been diagnosed with heart disease. Each year, nearly 360,000 emergency medical services-assessed out-of-hospital cardiac arrests occur in the US alone. Cardiac arrest is caused by abnormal, or irregular, heart rhythms (called arrhythmias). Death occurs within minutes after the heart stops.

"Cardiac arrest strikes immediately and without warning"

Sudden cardiac arrest may be caused by almost any known heart condition.

"Cardiac arrest is reversible in most victims if treated within a few minutes if CPR (cardiopulmonary resuscitation) is performed and a defibrillator is used to shock the heart and restore a normal heart rhythm"

Unfortunately victims of cardiac arrest fall unconscious and their chances of survival rely on quick reacting bystanders and their ability to rapidly recognize the problem and to instantly call for emergency medical services.


"LifeTip is an advanced technology designed to make you feel good and give you and your loved ones peace-of-mind"

Our device, tracks and analyzing your electrical heart activity (ECG), is able to promptly recognize deadly arrhythmias with an immediate call for emergency medical services while you are unconscious. Moreover it can prompt and guide people who are near you to start Cardiopulmonary resuscitation with appropriate messages.

Furthermore, our device has the ability to analyze your ECG giving you the opportunity to seek medical advice in the case of atrial fibrillation (AF).

"AF is the most common cause of ischemic stroke. Indeed most of people with atrial fibrillation are unaware of it and if left untreated can pose a great risk of stroke"

Our device is able to recognize this arrhythmia and prompt you to seek medical attention and dramatically lower your risk of stroke.


Here are some real life stories of patients whom we asked to comment on LifeTip. The names are fictitious to protect their privacy.

***

Henry at just 24 years old had already won a number of cross country races. However, suddenly during one of his races he started to complain of palpitations in the chest area and fainted, falling to the ground. He subsequently underwent an electrophysiological study, which confirmed the presence of a conduction pathway. Through minor surgery the circuit has now been deleted and Henry resumes his promising athletic activities.

"Using LifeTip whilst training or during my normal daily activities would have detected an abnormal heart beat earlier because of the ECG functionality"

***

Edward 45 has participated in many cycling events from a young age.  Suddenly he begin experiencing onsets of palpitations which forced him to cease all activities.

An electrocardiogram showed atrial fibrillation. Then he decided to seek treatment and eliminate the root of the arrhythmias with ablation. Now, Edward has been able to return to cycling and participates in races of many tens of kilometers without any disturbance what so ever.

"If I had a LifeTip device the arrhythmias would have been perceived by the ECG function and message sent directly to my doctor"

***

Mike at the age of 36 visited the ER after a suffering another serious panic attack. With his blood pressure at 210/110 and heart rate close to 190.

He was quickly treated for atrial fibrillation and his heart was reset using a defibrillator. He had absolutely no idea, he'd often felt a light discomfort in the chest area, but put down to stress, and a number of check-ups showed no signs of any underlying issues.

"If I had had the opportunity to wear a LifeTip device the AF would have been picked-up and I could have seeked medical advice and avoided a very unnerving trip to the hospital"


Jump to: Functions Versions User interface App&Cloud
Hardware Developers Team FAQ





LifeTip is ideal for anyone who likes to look after themselves or wants to improve their lifestyle. The numerous functions performed by the device accompany and support you in your daily routine.

Children, Adults and the Aged can benefit from LifeTip without even realizing it.

It goes without saying that for anyone who is susceptible or suffering from a heart condition - LifeTip is a must have.

Attached to your shirt or your bra, it gives you serenity, monitoring your daily activities and certifying that everything is going well or warning you if not.


However you choose to wear LifeTip you can be sure its continuously monitoring your well-being.


LifeTip provides all the basic functions that similar products on the market have but, thanks to:

  • The position of the device
  • Advanced capacitive technology
  • Direct connectivity to caregiver/doctor/family member
  • More accurate data through the Electrocardiography function.

LifeTip is the special one in wearable devices:

  • The only one positioned in the center of the chest
  • The very first integrating state-of-the-art no-contact capacitive electrodes in a personal device
  • Uniquely designed for women and men
  • The first one to have authentic ECG monitoring capabilities

LifeTip is not an ordinary wearable device, it is something that you can choose to show, light-up in the center of your chest, or hide under your t-shirt.


Jump to: Functions Versions User interface App&Cloud
Hardware Developers Team FAQ

LifeTip comes in two versions for both men & women with or without the ECG function.

Gender, in terms of trend and style, can be a watershed. For this reason we prototyped two main versions: women and men.

The women's version was designed to be smaller, extremely handy, stylish and perfectly complementary to your bra. The simple and secure magnetic clip ensures you to feel the device as part of the same bra.

In order to satisfy women's fashion needs, we thought of 3 colours.



On the other hand, the men's version has been specifically designed to be shown, hooked on a T-shirt.

It is a little bigger than the women's version and available in 3 different colours.







Jump to: Functions Versions User interface App&Cloud
Hardware Developers Team FAQ

Really, only one button? Yes, as Apple taught us, there are a number of actions you can trigger with a single button.

Here are just a few of the actions you can trigger from the device. But, we truly believe that other programmers can add more and more functionalities in the future.

For example, with a single button press you can:

  • Take a picture
  • Start/stop smartphone video recording
  • Post your vital parameters on Facebook 

With a double button press you can:

  • Set/Reset do-not disturb mode
  • Start/Stop ambient audio recording
  • Refuse an incoming call
  • Mark your position on Facebook (or any other Social Network)

Finally, with a triple button press you can:

  • Request your caregiver assistance
  • Activate  a silenced call or hands-free call to a given number
  • Activate an immediate rescue / stalker procedure


Talking about the immediate rescue / stalker procedure, we are working to give you a cloud service able to make parallel phone calls to friends or parents numbers you set up, sending them a warning message with your exact local position.

We understand perfectly that we cannot change the world and have a answer for every dangerous situation. Nevertheless, our aim is to provide a device and a service which could accelerate the rescue process, making an immediate call to the person you know could help you. This could make the difference between having just a bad time and a tragic event.

Jump to: Functions Versions User interface App&Cloud
Hardware Developers Team FAQ

A wearable device is nothing without an app. The LifeTip App is the bridge between your smartphone and your device. The App is running in background to receive commands and compute the data your body is generating.

At any given moment you can start the LifeTip App and display your information, search for a particular time   in your daily life, display your ECG and, if you want, email your doctor the ECG.




The LifeTip App lets you configure the button events: what to do when a single press is recognized, what to do for a double or a triple press. Also the app let’s you configure the behavior in case of a fall, crash or a severe heart problem.

Running in the background, the app is able to elaborate the signals coming from the LifeTip Device and taking the appropriate decisions in fraction of a second.

LifeTip App can be integrated in a complete cloud infrastructure, letting you store and analyze your data. With the cloud infrastructure the device potentially grows adding additional feature like:

  • Social Network integration
  • Illimitate data recording and storage
  • Vital signs comparison
  • IFTTT recipes
  • Mapping analysis




The cloud infrastructure and services will be available as a subscription. Indiegogo backers will receive a 1 year subscription included with the device.


Jump to: Functions Versions User interface App&Cloud
Hardware Developers Team FAQ

If you really want all the hardware specifications

  • Three contactless capacitive electrodes for maximum performance
  • Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy connection
  • Advanced noise filtering
  • Advanced ECG dedicated microcontroller
  • Three axial accelerometers
  • Temperature sensor
  • Multicolor programmable “corona” status led
  • Programmable single button user interface
  • Removable coin battery with three months of life expectancy
  • And yes, a little beeper


Jump to: Functions Versions User interface App&Cloud
Hardware Developers Team FAQ

For developers LifeTip is an ideal device for implementing in their software. The unique position in the center of the chest feeds the device with usable data on body position, recording any movement made directly from the center of the body.

Steps duration and symmetricity (or eventually asymmetricity) of walking, body posture, on axis rotations, push-ups, sitting, standing, lie flat are just some of the information you can find in the device data feed.

We will release the whole connection API as open source software, letting you develop any kind of mobile software with the LifeTip device. Don’t wait to order the pre-release software and accompanying devices to be ready when shipment starts.

Moreover, the LifeTip is also a great device for your desktop/console game developing. Integrate your game with emotional feelings with happiness, fear, surprise reading your user at heart.

Applying as a developer entitles you to receive pre-release devices for testing and developing and a priority shipment of your bunch of ready devices.







Jump to: Functions Versions User interface App&Cloud
Hardware Developers Team FAQ


Gianni Alessandroni: Software Architect

I’m a business executive with experience in administrative and financial management, business planning and personnel management. Experience in design and management of 24/7 systems for emergency care, radio broadcasting control, data acquisition systems with Anoto digital pens and multichannel audio recorders, military and industrial software control systems. Within the LifeTip team I'm directing the device and software design and I my best as team motivator :)

it.linkedin.com/in/giannialessandroni

Giacomo Carozza: Project Manager
Being passionate about hi-tech and startup, innovation and management I found myself involved in many different projects and communities. I'm now an MSc Business Administration student with past experiences in startup, coworking, project and event management. I have been Student Ambassador for Google, English teacher in China and I am now the Project Manager for LifeTip being accountable for the general supervisory of the whole processes and the team.

it.linkedin.com/in/giacomocarozza

Emanuele Bonanni: Hardware and microcontrollers Engineer

Project Manager and Founder of Your Electronics Open Source and Elettronica Open Source. Electronics designer, microcontrollers freak and pcb maker. Experience in avionics, military, industrial and consumer sectors. My role in the Lifetip project is CTO

it.linkedin.com/in/emanuelebonanni

Patrizia Danese: Business Development

Visionary thinker with socioeconomic background, specializing in media. Startupper for passion. Key strengths include: organize local and international events and collaborate with TV and film festivals. Love everything that revolves around health, cinema, environment, travel, music and reading. As the Business Developer at LifeTip she wants to transform this project into reality and improve people's lives.

it.linkedin.com/in/patriziadanese

Miguel Carrasco: Business Development

Miguel is part of the LifeTip business development team.  He's a high‐performing, strategic‐thinking professional with more than 12 years' experience in the corporate communications industry and has personally advised companies such as Nokia, Tieto Corporation and Oriola-KD HealthCare. Adept at assessing needs, generating options, and implementing solutions he brings his knowledge to the LifeTip Team. Miguel is an avid health fanatic and keen help others understand the all-round benefits of LifeTip

uk.linkedin.com/in/proxycensus


Ilaria Molinari: Marketing and communications

I have studied Foreign languages at the University of Genova and than Languages and Communication at the University of Modena. My past experiences include being Marketing and Social Media strategist, Sales executive and I am now Marketing and Sales manager at Elettronica Open Source. I will take care of Marketing and Communication strategies for LifeTip, loving to communicate all over the world about this awesome device.

it.linkedin.com/pub/ilaria-molinari/88/400/9a
Pierfrancesco Corvo: Cardiologist - interventional cardiologist

I have always been passionate about Internal Medicine and in 2001 I received my degree as Consultant in Interventional Cardiology. Later on, in 2005, I got my Phd in Cardiovascular and Respiratory Diseases. 

My past experiences include the European Hospital and Aurelia Hospital in Rome, the London Chest Hospital and Thoraxcenter in Rotterdam. I am now Medical supervisor of the revolutionary wearable project which will improve people's healthcare.

it.linkedin.com/pub/pierfrancesco-corvo/34/742/172



Simone Nanni: Software Developer

Technology is my passion, my job, my life. I like to design and create electronic items, using platforms like Arduino and Raspberry.

I've been an IT Developer in the Healthcare industry since 2001 for various hospitals in Italy and since 2013 I've been involved in some cardiology clinical trials in Kampala (Uganda) for an international cooperation program.

Now I'm in the process of developing the software side for the LifeTip project by creating a simple but powerful user interface.

http://it.linkedin.com/pub/simone-nanni/34/174/1a3


Jump to: Functions Versions User interface App&Cloud
Hardware Developers Team FAQ


It's a medical device?

LifeTip is not a medical device! LifeTip can't be used for medical purposes and doesn't substitute in any way a medical certified Electrocardiograph. It's a personal device that can record important life signals, in your daily life, to produce a data feed that your MD can evaluate. If your MD deems necessary they can then decide to request further investigations made with medically certified instruments.

How long will the battery last?

In our experiments with laboratory devices, the power consumption is really low. We can calculate that, with a normal device usage (14 hrs/day, low led usage, no beeper usage) the coin cell battery will last for three months. Also remember that changing the battery is matter of seconds at a costs of only 2/3$.

Why is the battery not rechargeable?

Because the LifeTip device is sealed and waterproof. A rechargeable battery needs a power connector and that means humidity and water could enter. Sure an induction charge could be a solution, but that would increase the project complexity and, of course, costs.  

Which mobile OS are supported?

LifeTip App will be available for iOS 6+, Android 4+ and Windows Phone 8+.

Please note that some of the functionalities can be blocked or be unavailable by your smartphone operating system.

Which smartphone are supported?

LifeTip is a Bluetooth 4.0 Low Emission device, so it's able to connect only to Smartphones that implements the same connection. Don't worry, the BT4 is already available in a multitude of devices: iPhone 4, 4S, 5, 5S and upcoming 6; Google Nexus 4 and 5, Samsung Galaxy Series, Sony Xperia Series and a lot more. Check your device if it implements Bluetooth 4 LE.

How can I choose my Device?

We will send you an e-mail with your credentials to access our website. Inside the website you can choose your device color.

In the case you have ordered multiple quantities, you will found all your items in the website.

Where are the devices made?

All our products are designed and made in Italy. The LifeTip device hardware is assembled near Rome and the final device assembly and testing is made in Rome.

Can I find the device outside Indiegogo?

No, we are here on Indiegogo to finance our project with a all-or-nothing formula. This ensures you that, if financed, we will have enough funds to complete and deliver the project. Indiegogo backers will be the first to receive and dress the LifeTip device.

Proximity risks of Bluetooth?

LifeTip uses a low power Bluetooth 4.0 connection which uses a much less energy than your Bluetooth earphone (usually 1.1 or 2.0). But for us this in not enough: the entire  rear shell of the device is totally shielded to avoid any kind of electromagnetic wave reaching your body.

Will LifeTip be certified?

The device will be CE certificated, due to European regulations. The certification process involves intensive testing on every single component and a trip in an anechoic chamber for a precise electronic emission testing and a massive electromagnetic supporting test.

This assures the device is safe for any human usage and the electronic equipment will be secure.


Let's be completely transparent: as in any project made using cutting-edge technologies there are challenges that must be faced. We conducted extensive research and laboratory tests before publishing the project in order to minimize any risk.

Nonetheless, the capacitive sensors no-contact technology is a challenge and we will need to perform some additional tests on different kinds of textiles, skin humidity, bodies with the final form factor.

To ensure a safe and reliable prototype - since the initiation of the project we have been shadowed by a cardiologist for continual advice and prototype testing.  

What we can assure you is our determination, skill set and experience to provide you with the best product we can.

FAQ

Cardiac arrest, is the abrupt loss of heart function in a person who may or may not have been diagnosed with heart disease. Each year, nearly 360,000 emergency medical services-assessed out-of-hospital cardiac arrests occur in the US alone. Cardiac arrest is caused by abnormal, or irregular, heart rhythms (called arrhythmias). Death occurs within minutes after the heart stops."Cardiac arrest strikes immediately and without warning"Sudden cardiac arrest may be caused by almost any known heart condition."Cardiac arrest is reversible in most victims if treated within a few minutes if CPR (cardiopulmonary resuscitation) is performed and a defibrillator is used to shock the heart and restore a normal heart rhythm"Unfortunately victims of cardiac arrest fall unconscious and their chances of survival rely on quick reacting bystanders and their ability to rapidly recognize the problem and to instantly call for emergency medical services."LifeTip is an advanced technology designed to make you feel good and give you and your loved ones peace-of-mind"Our device, tracks and analyzing your electrical heart activity (ECG), is able to promptly recognize deadly arrhythmias with an immediate call for emergency medical services while you are unconscious. Moreover it can prompt and guide people who are near you to start Cardiopulmonary resuscitation with appropriate messages.Furthermore, our device has the ability to analyze your ECG giving you the opportunity to seek medical advice in the case of atrial fibrillation (AF)."AF is the most common cause of ischemic stroke. Indeed most of people with atrial fibrillation are unaware of it and if left untreated can pose a great risk of stroke"
Our device is able to recognize this arrhythmia and prompt you to seek medical attention and dramatically lower your risk of stroke.Here are some real life stories of patients whom we asked to comment on LifeTip. The names are fictitious to protect their privacy.***Henry at just 24 years old had already won a number of cross country races. However, suddenly during one of his races he started to complain of palpitations in the chest area and fainted, falling to the ground. He subsequently underwent an electrophysiological study, which confirmed the presence of a conduction pathway. Through minor surgery the circuit has now been deleted and Henry resumes his promising athletic activities."Using LifeTip whilst training or during my normal daily activities would have detected an abnormal heart beat earlier because of the ECG functionality"***Edward 45 has participated in many cycling events from a young age.  Suddenly he begin experiencing onsets of palpitations which forced him to cease all activities.An electrocardiogram showed atrial fibrillation. Then he decided to seek treatment and eliminate the root of the arrhythmias with ablation. Now, Edward has been able to return to cycling and participates in races of many tens of kilometers without any disturbance what so ever."If I had a LifeTip device the arrhythmias would have been perceived by the ECG function and message sent directly to my doctor"***Mike at the age of 36 visited the ER after a suffering another serious panic attack. With his blood pressure at 210/110 and heart rate close to 190.He was quickly treated for atrial fibrillation and his heart was reset using a defibrillator. He had absolutely no idea, he'd often felt a light discomfort in the chest area, but put down to stress, and a number of check-ups showed no signs of any underlying issues."If I had had the opportunity to wear a LifeTip device the AF would have been picked-up and I could have seeked medical advice and avoided a very unnerving trip to the hospital"

LifeTip is ideal for anyone who likes to look after themselves or wants to improve their lifestyle. The numerous functions performed by the device accompany and support you in your daily routine.Children, Adults and the Aged can benefit from LifeTip without even realizing it.It goes without saying that for anyone who is susceptible or suffering from a heart condition - LifeTip is a must have.Attached to your shirt or your bra, it gives you serenity, monitoring your daily activities and certifying that everything is going well or warning you if not.However you choose to wear LifeTip you can be sure its continuously monitoring your well-being.LifeTip provides all the basic functions that similar products on the market have but, thanks to:
The position of the device
Advanced capacitive technology
Direct connectivity to caregiver/doctor/family member
More accurate data through the Electrocardiography function.
LifeTip is the special one in wearable devices:
The only one positioned in the center of the chest
The very first integrating state-of-the-art no-contact capacitive electrodes in a personal device
Uniquely designed for women and men
The first one to have authentic ECG monitoring capabilities
LifeTip is not an ordinary wearable device, it is something that you can choose to show, light-up in the center of your chest, or hide under your t-shirt.

LifeTip comes in two versions for both men & women with or without the ECG function.Gender, in terms of trend and style, can be a watershed. For this reason we prototyped two main versions: women and men.The women's version was designed to be smaller, extremely handy, stylish and perfectly complementary to your bra. The simple and secure magnetic clip ensures you to feel the device as part of the same bra.In order to satisfy women's fashion needs, we thought of 3 colours.On the other hand, the men's version has been specifically designed to be shown, hooked on a 
T-shirt. It is a little bigger than the women's version and available in 3
 different colours.

Really, only one button? Yes, as Apple taught us, there are a number of actions you can trigger with a single button. Here are just a few of the actions you can trigger from the device. But, we truly believe that other programmers can add more and more functionalities in the future.For example, with a single button press you can:
Take a picture 
Start/stop smartphone video recording
Post your vital parameters on Facebook 
With a double button press you can:
Set/Reset do-not disturb mode
Start/Stop ambient audio recording
Refuse an incoming call
Mark your position on Facebook (or any other Social Network)
Finally, with a triple button press you can:
Request your caregiver assistance
Activate  a silenced call or hands-free call to a given number
Activate an immediate rescue / stalker procedure
Talking about the immediate rescue / stalker procedure, we are working to give you a cloud service able to make parallel phone calls to friends or parents numbers you set up, sending them a warning message with your exact local position.We understand perfectly that we cannot change the world and have a answer for every dangerous situation. Nevertheless, our aim is to provide a device and a service which could accelerate the rescue process, making an immediate call to the person you know could help you. This could make the difference between having just a bad time and a tragic event.

A wearable device is nothing without an app. The LifeTip App is the bridge between your smartphone and your device. The App is running in background to receive commands and compute the data your body is generating.At any given moment you can start the LifeTip App and display your information, search for a particular time   in your daily life, display your ECG and, if you want, email your doctor the ECG.The LifeTip App lets you configure the button events: what to do when a single press is recognized, what to do for a double or a triple press. Also the app let’s you configure the behavior in case of a fall, crash or a severe heart problem.Running in the background, the app is able to elaborate the signals coming from the LifeTip Device and taking the appropriate decisions in fraction of a second. LifeTip App can be integrated in a complete cloud infrastructure, letting you store and analyze your data. With the cloud infrastructure the device potentially grows adding additional feature like:
Social Network integration
Illimitate data recording and storage
Vital signs comparison
IFTTT recipes
Mapping analysis
The cloud infrastructure and services will be available as a subscription. Indiegogo backers will receive a 1 year subscription included with the device.

For developers LifeTip is an ideal device for implementing in their software. The unique position in the center of the chest feeds the device with usable data on body position, recording any movement made directly from the center of the body. Steps duration and symmetricity (or eventually asymmetricity) of walking, body posture, on axis rotations, push-ups, sitting, standing, lie flat are just some of the information you can find in the device data feed.We will release the whole connection API as open source software, letting you develop any kind of mobile software with the LifeTip device. Don’t wait to order the pre-release software and accompanying devices to be ready when shipment starts.Moreover, the LifeTip is also a great device for your desktop/console game developing. Integrate your game with emotional feelings with happiness, fear, surprise reading your user at heart.Applying as a developer entitles you to receive pre-release devices for testing and developing and a priority shipment of your bunch of ready devices.

If your MD deems necessary they can then decide to request further investigations made with medically certified instruments.How long will the battery last?In our experiments with laboratory devices, the power consumption is really low. story:
First Impressions Color Profile App for Smart Phones

Our goal is to create 15 Color Direction Profile Apps and 1 Universal Color App that are smart-phone friendly. Your contribution to our indiegogo project will help fund our full spectrum of 16 color profile Apps which will be so beneficial for anyone who need to select colors for business and personal use.

Why Does It Matter?

Imagine being able to use color to look as vibrant and attractive as possible. Imagine seeing at a glance the exact shades and tints of color that make you look dazzling, elegant and relaxed. Each Color Directional App (15x) has specific colors that suit specific skin-tones/haircolor/eye color. The Universal Color App (1x) has colors that suit everyone.

When people are advised as to which one of these Color Apps work for their personal color pattern, they will be able to:

  • Choose clothes and accessories to suit their unique color pattern
  • Wear Color creatively and confidently
  • Save money by buying only those things that suit them
  • Project a healthy appearance (the colors enhance their skin-tone)
  • Coordinate their closets with ease, knowing that ‘this goes with that’
  • Be more resourceful with what they already have in their closets

 

The Convenience of having a Smart Phone Color App

Your Color App is always with you (unless you leave your phone at home). A hard-copy color profile, although very tactile, eventually wears out and can be left in a store, or forgotten at home.

 FAQ

1) When can I expect to see my perk packages?

We will respond to your pledge immediately after the funding campaign ends by contacting you to honor your perk package. Please note that you will have access to the actual Apps (for pledges $20; $75 and $150) once they have been created and uploaded.

2)  Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we do ship internationally! For the $150 pledge, we will ship your personalized hard-copy color profile to Mars if we have to :-)

FREE SHIPPING INCLUDED IN ALL PERK PACKAGES! Yes, we’re so cool.

story:
Every idea starts with a problem. Ours was straight-forward -- thoughtfully sourced products are not affordable.

Our first project is our attempt to find a solution: An affordable, heavyweight hoodie that is hand-made from the best materials and is thoughtfully sourced to have a positive impact throughout the supply-chain.

By circumventing traditional supply chains, designing in-house and engaging with customers directly, we are able to provide higher quality and timeless pieces at an affordable price.

Both of our fabrics are knitted in-house at the same factory, so that we have 100% control andtransparency throughout the process. We use 13.4OZ french-terry cotton for our hoodie, pre-washed and shrunk to fit and provide a rugged, yet tailored look. Our printed polyester lining on the inside gives the hoodie a luxe feel while making it more comfortable to layer.

By circumventing traditional supply chains, designing in-house and engaging with customers directly, we are able to provide higher quality and timeless pieces at an affordable price.  




Both of our fabrics are knitted in-house at the same factory, so that we have 100% control andtransparency throughout the process. story:
The Creators.

Dillon, left and Mike, right. Two guys with a great idea.


The Purpose.

We’ve researched deeply into the sunglasses market and noticed its missing something big, FLOATING Sunglasses. There are many other companies out there that sell floating sunglasses, but they are extremely expensive, cheaply designed and have "add-ons" to make them float. Our new sunglasses are not only inexpensive, but are constructed to float within the frame itself. No Add-Ons necessary. A big bonus? They look really good on anyone and everyone.


The Frame.

  • Made -  from an ultra light NASA grade poly-carbonate plastic that is so light, you wont even notice yourself wearing them.
  • High gloss finish – Keeps your sunglasses in place when wet and don't wear down your face when drenched in sweat. 
  • Unique Design - We have studied the sunglasses market closely and noticed everyone has the same old "wayfarer" design, we wanted to offer something different, something fresh. 


Our Lenses

The lenses begins with a polarized poly-carbonate film (2), which is then blended to four additional layers. A gradiant tint film further reduces glare and acts as a one-way-mirror (3,4). Then finally, two scratch resistant films that keep everything protected and looking good (1,5).


The Options.

The colored lenses didn't arrive for our photo shoot but they WILL make it to production. So this is what they will look like. (actual product may vary)


Why we need, YOU!

We have been working very hard over the last 7 months, prepping, planning, building, testing, and perfecting how we could build the ULTIMATE sunglasses. Ones that will never get lost in the water on vacation, at the lake, the pool, surfing, jet-skiing, on the boat or floating on an inner-tube. We are very excited about creating a Product this industry desperately needs and we are certain you will too.

story:
What is this?

This smart dispensing system consists of a smart medication dispenser and a smart medication tracker mobile application. 

The system is more than mere automation; it is a comprehensive system that could help a patient, a senior or even someone with special needs to follow complex medication regimens and ensure medication adherence. 

The cost of existing products range from $500 to more than $2000. The low end ones aren't smart devices at all, while the high end ones are ridiculously expensive. We believe it's possible to make a smart device that can be a little cheaper and a lot smarter!

This project will also be presented on a few smart product-making competitions that we are participating in. By pledging even a dollar, you can help us win the competition! We will then be in a better position to seek venture funding to bring this product to market. So please give us your support!

What can the smart medication dispenser do?

1) Dispense the right medication each time based on configurations set and the time of day.

2) Ability to operate independently of the mobile application. The user can set the reminder alarm and pill configuration on the dispenser itself.

3) Has a buzzer and warning light to capture the user's attention when it is time to take the medication or when supplies are low.

4) If used with a mobile application, the dispenser automatically and magically dispenses medication as the user approaches without user intervention.

The Badass Dispenser Prototype

This is just a proof of concept prototype. We will be engaging the services of a product designer to make this look absolutely cool!

What can the smart medication tracker mobile application do?

1) Configure the smart medication dispenser using an interactive graphical user interface.

2) Quick treatment import / export function using QR codes.



3) Easily view current treatment plan and exact dosage needed based on the time of the day.



4) Reminder alarm (with snooze) when it is time to take medication.

5) Text notifications to emergency contacts on missed dose or low supply.


6) History tracking, which can be useful for doctors to monitor the user's progress as well as past treatment plans.


7) Detailed information on medication in treatment plan powered by established medical databases (we do not always understand what each medication does to our body. I'm sure it's always good to know this).

The Problem

Cognitive impairment may play a major role in drug-related problems in the elderly, making it challenging to follow directions of prescribed medications. Other factors include the lack of care provider help with medication management; financial considerations that affect the purchase and regular use of medications. Poor medication adherence could critically endanger the patient and lead to unnecessary hospital visits, illness and even death. 

Research has shown that approximately 1 out of 10 hospital admissions are the result of the incorrect use of medications among elderly.The main customer need is medication compliance. In order for compliance to occur, medication needs to be more easily organized and administered. 

Our Smart Medication Dispensing System addresses this need.

Existing Products

Manual Pill Dispensers

Cost: $8 ( just pill boxes), $80 (with digital alarm - Really? $72 for an alarm?)

The user has to sort the right dose on each refill (extremely mistake prone!)

No notifications to mobile phone, which means if the user is far from device, the user is going to miss that dose (Dangerous!)

Smart Pill Dispensers

Cost:   $595 (E-Pill) , $600 / yr.  (Philips) [Not even available for sale]

The user does not have to sort on each refill

No communication with mobile phone and no remote notifications or other perks that we are offering. So it's still not very smart, and costs more.

Our Solution

With the smart medication dispenser and tracker, the user is relieved from the hassle of carrying out the trivial and mundane task of assembling pills according to the prescribed treatment plan. You simply fill up each chamber with the right pill, and not worry about the prescription.

Advanced remote notifications serve as an emergency red flags to caregivers or loved ones in case of missed doses due to unforeseen circumstances (such as an accident which causes the user to miss the dose). 

With the smart medication dispenser and tracker, you can be assured that your sick dependents are safe at all times.

Tentative Specifications

3 channel dispenser: 

  1. Designed to fit 4 different medication *
  2. Approximately 90 pill chambers**

4 channel dispenser: 

  1. Designed to fit 6 different medication *
  2. Approximately 150 pill  chambers**

5 channel dispenser:

  1. Designed to fit 8 different medication *
  2. Approximately 250 pill chambers**

*You can always get smart and combine 2 pills with the same prescription within the same pill chamber to add more medication.

** Tentative. Final product may vary.



The funds will be used for:

Medication dispenser product design ( we want to give you a well-designed and aesthetically looking dispenser )

Mobile app user interface and user experience design

Development of mobile applications (Android & iOS)

Further refinement of hardware prototype ( to make sure it does what it's supposed to do)

Material cost of product

Manufacturing costs

Logistics costs

Various marketing costs


Timeline / Milestones 

April 2015: Finalize product design with functional prototype

Sep 2015: Resolve manufacturing requirements, distribution and logistics

Dec 2015: Ship Products to Backers. Accepting pre-orders.

March 2016: Ship Products to Stores


Our Priorities

You, the backers of this campaign, are our priority. We have all heard about the unfortunate stories of successful campaigns that failed to deliver due to various production issues. Here, we believe a promise is something that should be kept as long as it is within our abilities. We place your pledged rewards before manufacturing complications.

This means that even if our product is called off due to complicated mass manufacturing or distribution issues, we will still create and deliver the products to you using the campaign funds before we close the project. Of course, we do not expect the project to be called off as the required parts are easy to manufacture and assemble.

How you can help

1) Pledge a dollar to support us in our smart product-making competitions or pledge to get your preferred dispenser unit!

2) Share this project on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and LinkedIn!

3) Download our Smart Medication Tracker Mobile Application (Android)

4) LIKE our Facebook Page!

About The Team

The core team consists of 3 dedicated individuals.

1) Pan Y. Ng - He's our hardware guru who has over 10 years of experience with hardware electronics and Arduino.

2) Ling J. Wong - He's our software guru who has 7 years of software experience and has developed over 10 web and mobile applications.

3) Carmen Lu - She's our marketing and business expert who has successfully launched and marketed a number of products and mobile applications.

story:
APELVIKEN GMT SUMMER

Yellow, mint green and pink

Case: 40 mm

Band widht: 20 mm

RONDA CALIBER 515.24H. GMT function.

Swiss quartz movement

Sapphire glass

20 ATM

Lumed hands

Watch case stainless steel 316l

Mesh band stainless steel 316l

Design process:

The goal with Apelviken GMT is to create the ultimate summer watch.
Words that guided: Backpacker, globetrotter, international business man(or woman), beach, kite surfer.

 


 

About me

During my teenage years I started collecting unusual, unique, watches. It could be from exclusive brands but also from smaller microbrands. The most important thing for me was that the watches would arouse a feeling in me and that they offered something unusual, such as a unique feature or unusual design.

  In 2016 I decided to start my own brand. I sold off my watch collection to enable the project. The goal was to be able to share my interest in stylish, original watches with others. Now I am 38 years old but my childish enthusiasm for watches is, oddly enough, still growing every year.

story:
(Note: We are no longer taking orders for this campaign.)

BACKGROUND

We are two brothers (Mark & Josh), and the project we present to you today is the first watch for our new lifestyle brand Jermyn + Co. My brother and I are from the Los Angeles area and are avid watch enthusiasts who have an admiration for high-end watches.

AN IDEA IS BORN

With higher-end watches, we appreciated not only their elegant designs but also the mechanical movements inside. The common trait we found in these luxury watches was that they utilized automatic movements. In this day of technology we were inspired by watches that did not require batteries or electric charge, but instead were powered by the movement of the wearer.

As watch enthusiasts, we found that there were not many good choices if you wanted to buy a quality mechanical watch unless you wanted to pay four or even five figure sums of money. This idea and our love for watches, led us to creating a watch brand with four specific components:

  • Great Design
  • Quality Build
  • Mechanical Movements
  • Affordable Price

This is how Jermyn + Co. was born and what better way to present our first watch than through the wonderful Indiegogo community!

OUR FIRST WATCH

The limited edition Hendrix Aviation Watch is the first product to be released by Jermyn + Co. This watch is our take on the popular "Pilot" style watch developed by many high-end brands.

The expected retail price of this watch is $249 USD. Considering that watches of this caliber can easily range upwards of $1,000 USD or more, we believe that this retail price is extremely competitive. The watch will be limited to 500 individually numbered units and will have the following detailed statistics:

WATCH SPECIFICATIONS

  • MSRP: $249 USD
  • Case Diameter: 41mm
  • Case Thickness: 11mm
  • Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel (with Matte Black - PVD finish)
  • Case Cover: Sapphire Crystal
  • Case Back: Sapphire Crystal (with view of movement) & Stainless Steel outer edge (with individually numbered engraving, i.e. 001/500, 002/500, etc.)
  • Strap: Genuine Black Leather
  • Movement: Japanese Automatic - Miyota 8215
  • Dial Color: Black
  • Dial Markers & Numbers: White with Luminescent Coating
  • Functions: Hours, Minutes, Seconds, Date
  • Water Resistance: 100m

MANUFACTURING (LOCATIONS)

  • ASSEMBLY (Case & Strap): Shenzhen, China
  • MOVEMENT: Japan
  • DESIGN: Los Angeles, California, USA

The following are pics of our watch prototype on black strap:

Hendrix Aviation - Front (Strap Wrapped)

Hendrix Aviation - Back (Strap Wrapped)

Hendrix Aviation - Globe in Background

Hendrix Aviation - Map in Background

Hendrix Aviation - Map in Background (#2)

WATCH IN ACTION 

The Hendrix Aviation Watch can be worn in various settings and looks great whether dressed up for work or casual on the weekends. The following pictures show the watch in action, with our model Mike wearing the watch in various scenes showing it's versatility:

Watch ready for wear in the morning

Watch worn first thing in the morning

In the subway headed to work

Checking the time on the streets of Downtown LA

Close up shot of watch (#1)

Walking the streets of Downtown LA

Hanging on the streets of Downtown LA

Grabbing an iced coffee

At the Santa Monica Pier in California

Hanging at the Santa Monica Pier​

Checking the time at the Pier​

Close up shot of watch (#2)

Checking the time at the Pier​ (#2)

Close up shot of watch (#3)

Close up shot of watch (#4)

Watching the sunset at Santa Monica Pier

OUR BRAND NAME

During Mark's recent trip to London for his honeymoon, he visited "Jermyn Street", a famous street known for gentlemen's luxury apparel and accessories. The street is most notably known for bespoke clothing that is made by some of the world's best tailors. "Jermyn Street" represents a timeless style where quality, details, and simplicity are paramount. We were inspired by this and have adopted these fundamental tenets in every design we will produce.

For reference, here is a link to the wikipedia article on "Jermyn Street" located in London, England: (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jermyn_Street)

WATCH DESIGN

In creating an original design for our first watch, we decided to use the "Pilot" style watch as an inspiration. The Pilot style is an iconic watch type that has been utilized by many of the top watch brands.

DIAL

The triangle at the 12 o'clock symbolizes the Pilot watch. In our design it is a white triangle with a red outline. For our watch hands, we gave them a propellor look. The outer rim of the dial has markings for up to 1/5 of a second, and includes the 15, 30, & 45 second marked intervals. The hashes that mark the hours, the seconds hand, and the triangle at 12 o'clock all have a luminescent material which emits a green glow for time reading in the dark. In addition, we have included a date window at 6 o'clock.

CASE

For the case we chose 316L Stainless Steel, which is commonly used by luxury watch brands. It is a strong durable steel and works extremely well for watch casings. Additionally, since this is a limited edition piece we took it a step further and coated the steel case in a matte black PVD finish. Both the front of the watch and the back are enclosed in Sapphire Crystal. The back of the watch showcases the mechanical movement and also has an outer rim engraving with watch specs, including the number of each individual piece out of 500 (i.e. 001/500, 002/500, etc).

STRAP

The watch strap is made from premium genuine leather and includes our logo on the back. The strap buckle is also coated in a matte black PVD finish to complement the look of the watch casing.

CROWN

The crown of the watch is coated in a matte black PVD finish and includes the "+" from our logo engraved in the center.

The following are pics from the watch design process:

Computer Aided Design (CAD) Rendering

Dial Design Schematics

WATCH BOX

Each Hendrix Aviation Watch comes with a black leather box. The box is crafted from premium leather and has the Jermyn + Co. logo on the outside. The inside of the box is plush and includes a pouch, Jermyn + Co. logo, and soft cushion insert to hold the watch. In addition, an outer cover with Jermyn + Co. logo is included to hold the black leather box when in storage.

The following are pics showing the box design along with the prototype watch box and outer cover:

Watch Box (CAD Rendering)

Watch Box

Watch Box & Outer Cover

Watch Box (Inside Outer Cover)

WATCH MOVEMENT

For our first watch we decided to use a Japanese made mechanical movement, the Miyota 8215. This movement was chosen due to it's durability and accuracy.

The Miyota 8215 is an automatic mechanical movement made by the Japanese watch company, Citizen. Here are the movement specifications:

  • Height: 5.67mm
  • Diameter: 26mm
  • Vibration Frequency: 12,600 vph (vibrations per hour)
  • Jewels: 21
  • Power Reserve: 40 hours
  • Accuracy -20, +40 seconds per day

For those that are unfamiliar with automatic mechanical movements, once the watch is fully wound (by turning the crown several rotations), the watch will run for it's power reserve time (the power reserve for this watch is 40 hours). When the watch is worn, energy from wrist movement will keep the watch running. If the watch stops, all that is needed is to fully wind the watch to get it running again. Batteries or electrical charge are never required when using mechanical watches.

One defining characteristic of a mechanical watch versus a quartz (or battery) powered watch is the "sweeping" movement of the second-hand on a mechanical as opposed to the "ticking" movement of the second-hand on a quartz watch.

For specifics on this movement, please refer to the following links from the Citizen/Miyota website:

  • Specifications
  • Drawing
  • Parts List
  • Instructions

STRETCH GOALS

Initial Goal: $25,000

Stretch Goal: $75,000 (If met, we will also include an additional brown leather strap for each watch ordered.)

Here is a pic and short video of the Hendrix Aviation Watch on brown leather strap:

YOUR SUPPORT

We have two prototype watches made, but we need your help to build the additional 500 watches. Please see our Indiegogo Perks and if you feel that we have earned your support, please choose one of the options. The money that is contributed will be used specifically to build the 500 watches and also will help in the launching of this new brand.

Thanks for taking the time to view our Indiegogo project & much thanks for your support!

TIMELINE

AUGUST 2016: Indeigogo Campaign

SEPTEMBER 2016 - DECEMBER 2016: Manufacture and import of 500 watches and boxes

JANUARY 2017: Watches shipped to backers

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Manufacturing: Our manufacturer is located in Shenzhen, China. Once our campaign has been concluded, they will be contacted immediately to begin production of the 500 watches and boxes. We have been told that this process can take 3-4 months. We do not expect any delays in this process, but as with any project unforeseen circumstances can arise. We will do our best to make sure we are on time with the manufacturing schedule and inform our Indiegogo backers timely of updates on the manufacturing process.

Shipping: We have engaged DHL to help with the importing of our product into the USA. Sometimes there can be delays in the import of new items into the United States, but in working directly with DHL we do not foresee any issues here. Once the manufacturing process is completed, we will move our focus to making sure that the product moves safely into the country and we will keep our Indiegogo backers timely informed of any updates.

Thanks for taking the time to view our Indiegogo project & much thanks for your support!
TIMELINE
AUGUST 2016: Indeigogo Campaign
SEPTEMBER 2016 - DECEMBER 2016: Manufacture and import of 500 watches and boxes
JANUARY 2017: Watches shipped to backers
RISKS & CHALLENGES
Manufacturing: Our manufacturer is located in Shenzhen, China. Once our campaign has been concluded, they will be contacted immediately to begin production of the 500 watches and boxes. We have been told that this process can take 3-4 months. We do not expect any delays in this process, but as with any project unforeseen circumstances can arise. We will do our best to make sure we are on time with the manufacturing schedule and inform our Indiegogo backers timely of updates on the manufacturing process.
Shipping: We have engaged DHL to help with the importing of our product into the USA. Sometimes there can be delays in the import of new items into the United States, but in working directly with DHL we do not foresee any issues here. Once the manufacturing process is completed, we will move our focus to making sure that the product moves safely into the country and we will keep our Indiegogo backers timely informed of any updates.

story:
Short Summary

London commuters are upset with the Tube Strikes. While we understand that tube workers need leverage to negotiate their points, we believe this MUST NOT be done at the expense of us, the customers, the commuters. 

All we want is public transportation we can rely on.

What Is The Money Used For?

Full automation of the London Underground network will come sooner or later. We, the commuters, want this to happen across all lines as soon as possible. We don't want to put up with more strikes any longer. We are frustrated that we are being taken hostage by the ASLEF, RMT, Unite and TSSA Unions.

If we reach the goal, 100% of money raised in this campaign will be given to the TFL (Transport For London) under the condition that all of it will be used to accelerate and implement the automation roll-out within the next 2-3 years. If we don't reach the goal, the money you pledged will be fully refunded to you.

Even though £500m seems like a large amount, we don't believe it's enough to fully automate the entire system to Grade of Automation 4 (GoA4). But it's certainly enough to make a significant impact. To put it in context: "The overall budget for modernisation of [...] four lines is [...] £5·54bn" according to the Railway Gazette.

The TFL 2014/2015 budget lists an income of £10.9bn (of which 40% was from fares).

£500m would therefore be roughly 5% of the annual income of TFL. 

If you agree that:

  • Strikes damage the wrong people (i.e. the commuters) and unions should find other ways to leverage their negotiation
  • Reliability of the Tube can be improved using automated systems 
  • Automation is the future and will come anyways
  • Pledging money here helps making a point, independent of whether the goal is reached oder not
This project is for you.

The Impact

As a result of an automated London Underground, disruption will be prevented, the system will be more reliable, possibly even cheaper to run. This may help keeping the prices lower.

Investing in the Automated London Underground is also an investment in the future. 

Depending on the source, every single day the tube is not running costs the economy between £10m to £300m!

Risks & Challenges

Modern connected technology is disruptive in many ways. Music labels and the analog photography businesses fell victim to it. It is revolutionising the Taxi business as we speak. And it will disrupt many other businesses. The London Underground is not excluded. But as with any big changes, there will be friction. People will unfortunately lose their jobs, people will have to adapt to new technologies and some will fail to do so. This development is driven by technology advancements and cannot be stopped. It can be delayed at best - which is not sustainable.

Also, Bob Crow, general secretary of the RMT, said: "The RMT will not allow Tube safety to be sacrificed on the altar of driverless operation and we are geared up and ready to go to war on this one."

Mick Whelan, leader of the drivers union Aslef, said introducing driverless Tube trains would lead to "all-out war".

But the Google car has already shown that automated, driverless cars are causing less disruption, danger and harm than "human operated" cars. They don't get tired, they don't drink and drive, they don't text and drive, they don't get silly.

And the Economist even takes this a step further: They predict that in the future, "human operated cars" will no longer be allowed in crowded cities due to "safety concerns".

Note

This campaign is not officially endorsed by the TFL. This campaign was set up on behalf of the commuters of London who are no longer willing to accept the strikes.
