story:
The support you need so you can get on with your life.

We were tired of searching for an easy to wear, comfortable shoe that we could wear anywhere. The SOAK slide is the first American-made slide sandal, ergonomically designed to provide comfort and arch support.

All women need easy-to-wear, stylish shoes, to run around in during their hectic daily schedule and we saw the need for a comfortable yet chic, casual shoe, for the socially-concious woman on-the-go.

Soak are made using BPA-free/Non Phalate PVC, a recyclable material that also classifies as vegan.

We’ll be running full sizes between Women’s 5 through 10


So what is it you’re funding anyway?

Every dollar pledged will be put towards the cost of our first production run. We’ve finalized the design elements, having recently completed our first prototype, and are now ready to move into the production phase. 

Your funding will help us cut the mold we need to produce the Sandals and their packaging (read more about that in the rewards section).

Made in America. Manufactured in Maine.

We wanted to figure out a way to make an affordable product in the United States that any woman could wear.  When we were deciding where in the US to produce the shoes, we learned about Maine’s history as a thriving hub of the industry.

This project will allow hundreds of Mainers to get back to work and, and as we grow, possibly thousands of Americans across the country.

We chose to work with a factory called G&G Products because the owner has a strong knowledge of shoe construction and worked with Unico, one of the last shoe manufacturers in Maine.  When Unico closed their operations, Gary bought some of the equipment with the same hope that we have of reviving Maine's shoe industry. He's extremely enthusiastic about Soak!

What Happens Once The Project Gets Funded?

  •   December-February- Create all of the molds we need for production, one for every size
  • February-March: Production, Packaging and Shipping

Who Is Behind SOAK?

We’re two friends with a big vision of bringing an affordable, high-quality American made product that any woman can purchase and feel great in. That's genuine and we have chosen to launch with Kickstarter because we believe there are people out there that want that, too.

Thank you to everybody that helped us launch this project:

Wes Hutchinson for providing us the rights to his song More than Today of his latest album All the Plans have Changed; Christian Carter for Producing and DIrecting our video; and Splashlight Studios, for graciously providing us with a set to film our video...

...and an even bigger Thank You to all of our supporters (if you haven’t yet, scroll up to the top of the page and click the green button!)

story:
Hero HoodieZ is back!

This time we are reaching out for help to kickstart our latest Hero HoodieZ : Santa. 

  

Click GALLERY tab at the top of the campaign for more images.

 

Hero HoodieZ : Santa Features

This new design is the first Hero HoodieZ to feature faux fur!  The hood lining, hood edging, ball at the tip of the hood, and the front strip of the hoodie are all made out of machine washable white faux fur!

 

 

Why we need your pledge

Hero Hoodiez : Santa can't go into production without your help. We need to raise funds to purchase materials, get patterns made, have size grading done, and hire help to manufacture these awesome pieces.  Help us make this hoodie a reality!

 

Pledging today saves you money tomorrow.

Hero HoodieZ retail for a minimum of $89  ($79 + $10 US shipping / $15 Canada / $25 International).

As an Indiegogo supporter you save big time!  Check out the offers on the right.  The sooner you order, the more you save!

 

How to Order

Select a perk found at the right. All sizes are Men's US.  The hoodie will only be going into production if we meet our goal!  If the goal isn't met Indiegogo refunds your money and this awesome hoodie is never made.

REMINDER: After funding ends we'll be contacting you for your size. Delays in responses lead to delays in delivery for everyone.  Production cannot start until all preferences are returned.

 

Sizing & Care

Hero HoodieZ:Santa will be available in US Men's sizes XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, and 4XL. Check out our sizing chart below. We recommend washing in cold water and laying flat to dry.  If dryer is your only option, put on LOW heat and do not over dry.

 

  

Delivery of Goods

We expect to be shipping out goods around December 5th. All US orders will arrive in time for Christmas.  While we expect international orders to make it by Dec 25th, there is no guarantee with standard shipping.

 

REMINDER: After funding ends we'll be contacting you for your size. Delays in responses lead to delays in delivery for everyone.  Production cannot start until all preferences are returned.


= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = 

You Can Help Us Get Funded!

We can't do this without your help.  Every dollar pledged will go towards the production of Hero HoodieZ : Santa, creating limited additional stock, and resources to develop and release the next Hero HoodieZ design.

Whether or not you pick a perk, please SHARE our campaign.

POST IT. TWEET IT. TEXT IT. SHARE IT. SHOW IT. WORK IT.

Thank you!

story:
A Need for NavTags

Roughly 100 million pairs of sunglasses are bought each year...and that's just in the United States alone! Take into account the millions of pairs of prescription eyeglasses and OTC readers as well, and you have a huge market of consumers who all share one probable fate. At one point they will lose their eyewear.

NavTags provides a simple solution for the person who owns a pair of sunglasses or other type of eyewear, and is tired of misplacing or losing them. NavTags will also differ from your standard tracking system, taking a more proactive approach. Instead of relying on tracking the location of an individual’s eyewear, NavTags will alert the user before their eyewear is too far gone. This approach can stop the problem of losing your eyewear before it even happens.

So, stop wasting time searching, and stop wasting your money replacing. Back NavTags today and never lose your eyewear again!

 

NavTags Team

 

The duo behind NavTags development is a team of serial entrepreneurs who have launched ventures across multiple industries including publishing, finance, social media, aviation and more. Our team approached the problem of disappearing eyewear due to the widespread nature of leaving your eyewear behind and, well, because it has happen to them personally a little too often ;)

Visit our blog to learn more about the start-up experience and How To Launch.

 

NavTags Partners

To navigate software development, our team has been working with Chicago-based 8 Bit Studios and Twisted Traces. The two teams began working together in November of 2014 in order to sketch out a process to bring the NavTags technology to market. Over the course of two years, we have worked with a wide array of designers, programmers, client reps and tech experts at the firm to bring our vision to reality.

 

For the past 8 years, 8 Bit has been helping organizations, individuals, and teams serve up high-quality ultra-modern applications for the mobile age. The firm focuses at the intersection of technology and human touch, orchestrating experiences that deliver the kind of value businesses are founded on. Their interdisciplinary team of designers, engineers, and leaders bring enthusiasm and expertise to solving problems and helping entrepreneurs and organizations navigate the modern mobile age.

 

On the hardware front, the team has been working with Twisted Traces. Metro Chicago-based Twisted Traces is a leader in the printed circuit board manufacturing industry, offering unmatched benefits on three fronts: quality, cost, and on-time delivery. As a printed circuit board manufacturer on the cutting edge of innovation, the firm’s 30 years of PCB manufacturing experience is key to bringing ideas to reality.

Twisted Traces has proven helpful through more than a dozen design iterations and new builds. In addition to manufacturing prowess, the firm has been a key partner on the consulting front, highlighting new hardware options that can make the NavTags module a leader in terms of size, performance, and reliability.

 

The Brass Tax

Here's why we're asking you for $50,000:

Investment Part 1 - Software

We're close to finalizing the NavTags app but need additional moneys to support the final stages of software and app development. The NavTags app will feature GPS location, a nifty separation alert, location reminders and a range finder, allowing you to track down your missing eyewear. Below is brief overview of "how it works":

 

The Module works by sending a blue tooth signal to your phone. If the module is out of range of your phone, an alert is sent to your phone. Upon receiving alert, if you didn’t forget the glasses, you may choose to store the location of the glasses. When module breaks out of range, the geographic location is recorded in the app. When user returns to app, it will display the last known geographic location of where glasses are stored.

 

Investment Part 2 - Production

Your backing of NavTags will also help secure the initial materials for the build. Obviously if we want to sell NavTags we need to be able to make them! While we have a final prototype in place we need money to scale production of the final design.

The NavTags module is the world's smallest geo locator and offers a simplistic, minimal design. Roughly the diameter of a nickel, your NavTag will allow you to keep track of your eyewear without anyone (even you!) knowing they're there.

*Go to our photo gallery for a complete progression of the NavTags module and design explorataion.

 

Speaking of Nickels, Let's Take The Dime Tour

1. The NavTags app shows up on your phone’s home screen. Press on the icon to open app.

2. The welcome page gets you started and walks you through the instructions and explains how to properly place the module on your eyewear.

3. The add glasses page allows you to personalize your NavTags experience.

4. The personalization page gives a choice of glasses icons to associate with your own glasses and asks for a name, so that the glasses can be properly tagged. You can also control the push notifications and searching sounds.

 

5. The home page recognizes your glasses icon. At the bottom of the page is a reminder of your last stored location of the glasses for quick and easy reference. If you wish to search for your glasses, you’d press the TAP TO FIND icon at the bottom of the My Glasses circle.

6. If your eyewear are within 10 feet of your phone, a Range Finder graphic on the top of the My Glasses page will show up in green color. At the bottom of the page, it will show the glasses exact location based upon the BLE chip and the geo-locating technology on your phone.

7. As you move away from your eyewear the color on the Range Finder changes to reflect the distance travelled. While green signifies the closest range, yellow signifies a range 10 to 25 feet, orange tells you when the module is 25 to 50 feet away, and red signifies the glasses are more than 50 feet from your phone.

8. When the first range criterion is broken (green to yellow) a warning comes up on your phone. This warning can be an instant reminder to return to your glasses or you can use the technology to remind yourself where you have stored the glasses.

 

Hardware Timeline & Status

 

November 2014: After months of internal discussions, the team engaged the services of 8 Bit Studios to turn the NavTags idea into a reality.

 

1) January 2015: Initial prototypes of the NavTags module were based on off-the-shelf tech solutions with no hardware modifications.

2) Summer 2015: As we were able to move to our own chip design, there was an immediate tradoff concern regarding size and cost. We were able to bring down the cost by building our own design, but the need for sufficient power forced us to increase size. 

3) Winter 2015: We were able to bring down the overall footprint in terms of size, but power questions lingered

4) Spring 2016: The experts were finally able to get the power issue under control, but as more testing was conducted signal strength and interference became an issue

5) Fall 2016: Future iterations were able to solve the interference issues by making adjustments to the board itself.

Today: After more than two years of development, we've put a ton of work into this effort, but we're still a few steps away from a market launch. At this point we need outside help from a crowdfunding campaign in order to finalize production and go-to-market.

Summer 2017: NavTags will be finalized, produced and ready for customer delivery.

*Go to our photo gallery for a complete progression of the NavTags module and design exploration.

 

The Impact of Your Contribution

Revolutionizing the way tracking systems work. The NavTags module will turn searching technology on its head. While existing systems focus on finding an item that has been lost or misplaced, NavTags revolutionizes this process by focusing on tracking items BEFORE they are misplaced.

  • Helping to develop the smallest geo location device in history (insert golf clap here).
  • Helping people save hundreds of dollars per year in lost eyewear replacement
  • Saving users countless hours spent searching for eyewear
  • Alleviating headaches related to lost eyewear

 

Risks & Challenges

As with the development of any new technology there are risks related to both the software and hardware. In order to ensure the best performance related to software, the group has retained the services of a leading software developer, Chicago-based 8 Bit Studios. The developer has been working on software development related to NavTags for over 18 months. This process has resulted in more than 30 iterations of software in order to try to achieve the best user experience. For hardware, the team has retained the services of Twisted Traces, a leading expert on the consultation and fabrication of hardware technology. In addition, the NavTags team has retained an independent hardware consultant in order to ensure that components used are appropriate for the intended use.

The hardware and software team are working together to finalize a go-to-market version of the technology that tackles the problem of losing an individual’s eyewear. Funds raised through the crowdfunding campaign will go to further development and refinement as well as real world stress testing to ensure the best possible performance.

Individual product performance will vary based upon signal strength, reception, and battery power. While efforts have been made to ensure a universal product experience, performance may vary based on location.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a monetary contribution to our campaign, no worries! You can still be a champion of NavTags by spreading the word about our revolutionary technology and encouraging others in your network to make a contribution towards our goal. So feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools and help NavTags find your BFF's eyewear!

2. The welcome page gets you started and walks you through the instructions and explains how to properly place the module on your eyewear.
3. The add glasses page allows you to personalize your NavTags experience.
4. The personalization page gives a choice of glasses icons to associate with your own glasses and asks for a name, so that the glasses can be properly tagged. You can also control the push notifications and searching sounds.

 
5. The home page recognizes your glasses icon. At the bottom of the page is a reminder of your last stored location of the glasses for quick and easy reference. If you wish to search for your glasses, you’d press the TAP TO FIND icon at the bottom of the My Glasses circle.
6. If your eyewear are within 10 feet of your phone, a Range Finder graphic on the top of the My Glasses page will show up in green color. At the bottom of the page, it will show the glasses exact location based upon the BLE chip and the geo-locating technology on your phone.
7. As you move away from your eyewear the color on the Range Finder changes to reflect the distance travelled. While green signifies the closest range, yellow signifies a range 10 to 25 feet, orange tells you when the module is 25 to 50 feet away, and red signifies the glasses are more than 50 feet from your phone.
8. When the first range criterion is broken (green to yellow) a warning comes up on your phone. This warning can be an instant reminder to return to your glasses or you can use the technology to remind yourself where you have stored the glasses.

 
Hardware Timeline & Status
 
November 2014: After months of internal discussions, the team engaged the services of 8 Bit Studios to turn the NavTags idea into a reality.

 
1) January 2015: Initial prototypes of the NavTags module were based on off-the-shelf tech solutions with no hardware modifications.
2) Summer 2015: As we were able to move to our own chip design, there was an immediate tradoff concern regarding size and cost. We were able to bring down the cost by building our own design, but the need for sufficient power forced us to increase size. 
3) Winter 2015: We were able to bring down the overall footprint in terms of size, but power questions lingered
4) Spring 2016: The experts were finally able to get the power issue under control, but as more testing was conducted signal strength and interference became an issue
5) Fall 2016: Future iterations were able to solve the interference issues by making adjustments to the board itself.
Today: After more than two years of development, we've put a ton of work into this effort, but we're still a few steps away from a market launch. At this point we need outside help from a crowdfunding campaign in order to finalize production and go-to-market.
Summer 2017: NavTags will be finalized, produced and ready for customer delivery.
*Go to our photo gallery for a complete progression of the NavTags module and design exploration.
 
The Impact of Your Contribution
Revolutionizing the way tracking systems work. The NavTags module will turn searching technology on its head. While existing systems focus on finding an item that has been lost or misplaced, NavTags revolutionizes this process by focusing on tracking items BEFORE they are misplaced.

Helping to develop the smallest geo location device in history (insert golf clap here).
Helping people save hundreds of dollars per year in lost eyewear replacement
Saving users countless hours spent searching for eyewear
Alleviating headaches related to lost eyewear


 
Risks & Challenges
As with the development of any new technology there are risks related to both the software and hardware. In order to ensure the best performance related to software, the group has retained the services of a leading software developer, Chicago-based 8 Bit Studios. The developer has been working on software development related to NavTags for over 18 months. This process has resulted in more than 30 iterations of software in order to try to achieve the best user experience. For hardware, the team has retained the services of Twisted Traces, a leading expert on the consultation and fabrication of hardware technology. In addition, the NavTags team has retained an independent hardware consultant in order to ensure that components used are appropriate for the intended use.
The hardware and software team are working together to finalize a go-to-market version of the technology that tackles the problem of losing an individual’s eyewear. Funds raised through the crowdfunding campaign will go to further development and refinement as well as real world stress testing to ensure the best possible performance.
Individual product performance will vary based upon signal strength, reception, and battery power. While efforts have been made to ensure a universal product experience, performance may vary based on location.
 

Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't make a monetary contribution to our campaign, no worries! You can still be a champion of NavTags by spreading the word about our revolutionary technology and encouraging others in your network to make a contribution towards our goal. So feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools and help NavTags find your BFF's eyewear!

story:
The aim of this campaign is to allow me to put these cufflinks into production. I have been making cufflinks using watches for just over 3 years now, however in order to attach the watch movements to the cufflinks I have been using industrial strength epoxy resin. Whilst the epoxy is extremely strong the cufflinks look much more professional with the covered rear.

New Style cufflinks on the left Old style on the right.

The Cufflinks

When the watch movements arrive with me they are normally in poor condition, having been left in storage or at the bottom of a pile of watches for a number of years. Firstly I remove the fingers, face and winding stem from the watch movements and then set about cleaning and polishing each of the movements. As you can see from the photo of a watch as it arrives with me in comparison to a cleaned watch, the cleaning process makes a big difference!

Front of watch movements before and after cleaning
Rear of cufflinks before and after cleaning

After the watch movements have been cleaned and polished they are glued into place inside the cufflinks. The glue is industrial strength glue, none of which can be seen on the finished articles.

Close up of a finished cufflink

The cufflinks are made from brass that is then coated to give the required colour. Each pair of cufflinks is then placed into a small metal cufflink gift box and are ready for posting.

Finished cufflinks in their gift box
Closed gift box

The Movements

Type A    -   Type B    -    Type C
 
 Timescales

After the project ends on Monday 8th July 2013 there will be a two week period for the payments to be processed.

The payments should all be processed for Monday 22nd July 2013 and the cufflink surrounds will then be ordered. There is 6-7 weeks processing time for these and this will be the main delay in making the items.

During the 6 weeks that the cufflink surrounds  are being manufactured I will be cleaning up and stripping down the watches to ensure that they are ready to go into the surrounds. Once the cufflink surrounds have arrived it should take me around two weeks to complete all the orders and get them ready for postage.

I have estimated that packaging of all the cufflinks should take approximately one week to complete. This will give me a total time of 11-12 weeks from the end of the project to the items being posted out to backers. I will be able to condense the time taken to mount the watches into cufflink surrounds and pack all the items by taking on extra help, but this will depend on how successful the project is.

I am therefore hoping to get all items posted out towards the end of September or start of October so that they are with backers well in time for Christmas.

story:
Seedling Footwear

Seedlings grow from darkness in soil upwards to break the surface and reach light. In each our own way, we are all trying to do the same. For EVERY PAIR of shoes purchased, we will plant 5 trees! Help us on our goal to plant 100,000 trees!

Leave a lasting "Footprint" on the environment! 

MANY of our natural forests are in desperate need help! Our forests play an important role in "filtering" our atmosphere. We are cutting down trees for all types of manufacturing more than ever! With the help from everyone, we have set a goal to plant 100,000 trees! Become a contributor today and make your mark!

Our shoes are made out of HEMP and ORGANIC CANVAS and use NO ANIMAL products!

You shouldn't have to chose between style, and the environmental impact, so we have designed a very STYLISH shoe, that rewards the environment!

Even our packaging is made out of recycled cardboard, and is repurposeable.

 

PRODUCT - Seedling Footwear.

Eco-Friendly: Constructed from HEMP and organic canvas. Our packaging uses recycled cardboard and is designed specifically so that after you take your shoes out, you can be repurposed the box as a drawer for misc. item, even stack em!

No Animal Products: Our shoes are Vegetarians! There are no animal products used in the making of our shoes!

Style: Take a look for yourself... these are stylin'!

Original - Green
Original - Red
Original - Blue (*Unlocked if we surpass $25,000*)
Original - Orange (*Unlocked if we surpass $25,000*)


SIZE CHART

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are reaching out to you in need of final funding for this project. 

We have done 100's of drawings, and the final drawing has been decided upon. The manufacture's have been contacted, and we have signed the contracts to lock in our pricing. 

As a contributor you will receive fun and cool rewards with contributions! You will ALSO be listed as a "priority" customer, and receive these shoes 1 month before the public!

For your help, ALL contributors providing $25 or more will be listed on our website as a "member" of Seedling Footwear.

If we do not raise our target goal, you will NOT be charged. ( We hope this is not the case!)

The Impact of Seedling Shoes!

Leave more than just your "footprint" , join forces with Seedling Footwear and help us on our mission to plant 100,000 trees. For every pair of shoes sold, we are going to plant atleast 5 trees!

Seedling shoes are constructed of Organic Canvas, and use NO ANIMAL PRODUCTS. This means our shoes are Vegans! 

We have also chosen to use 100% Recycled cardboard packiging for the shoes, as well as the tissue paper inside the boxes being 100% recycled!

Other Ways You Can Help

Any amount helps! We hope that you are willing to help support our project, and our goal to reduse, reuse, and recycle :).

story:
When nature calls, do you like answering by squatting in the woods?

Me neither. That's why I invented the Strap and Crap™, a simple, Made in the USA strap device that reduces thigh strain and eases your woods waste woes.    

By raising these funds, I'm looking to do a limited production run on the Strap and Crap™ so I can sell it online and in local sporting goods stores. I was able to get a feel for various manufacturers during the prototyping phase and ultimately chose a manufacturer based in Austin, TX. Your generosity will fund materials and manufacturing for the Strap and Crap™, as well as help me bring it to a larger market.

Thanks for supporting a small, local business!

Benefits, Uses and Specs

  • Made in USA
  • Mold and mildew resistant
  • Designed for use by individuals weighing up to 250 lbs.
  • Lightweight and packable - weighs less than 1 lb. and folds neatly
  • Sanitary
  • 9 ft in length
  • No need to remove your pack
  • Great for hiking, backpacking, hunting, camping and many other outdoor activities
  • Loops for add-ons (TP, bear bell, shovel, hand sanitizer, etc.)
  • Useful for securing other gear, hanging food out of reach of hungry bears, or even as a leash for Fido
  • Practical for men, women and children

About Laura

I discovered my love for the outdoors as a young child playing in the creek, climbing trees and "popping wheelies" on my first bike. As an adult, I've been fortunate to live in some of the best cities in the world for outdoor adventures, which is good because I must regularly feed my hunger for hiking, camping, kayaking, skiing and fresh air. 

I invented the Strap and Crap™ after reminiscing about a particularly unpleasant outdoor restroom experience many years ago. Though my professional background is in marketing and social media, I have a true passion for the outdoors and a mind that's constantly problem-solving in "inventor mode." I'm really excited about bringing this to my fellow outdoorsfolk and helping them lessen the chance of messin' their pants!

My Promise

As is the case with most projects of this type, there are risks and challenges associated with completion. Murphy's Law is especially applicable in projects like mine where there are a lot of moving pieces - ordering, sewing, shipping, etc. You never know when a part will be backordered or a sewing machine will need repair. The key when this happens is communication. I value honesty above all else and promise to be 100% transparent in my communication with my backers.

Your support and trust mean a lot to me, and I don't want to let you down. If problems should arise, I won't spend days feeling sorry for myself or wasting my energy on negativity. Instead, I will immediately get to work finding an alternate solution. One advantage of having a brain that is constantly operating in "inventor mode" (see my bio above) is that I generally have a back up plan. In fact, I've learned that sometimes the alternate solution ends up being better than the original!

story:
We know our product can REALLY solve a few problems. Every person sooner or later faces the challenge how to dress weather appropriate. Whether they need to put on a bag bomber when it’s warm outside during the day and cooler during the evening. What to wear on your trip from New York to Punta Cana. It’s +10 in one place and +35 in another. Nobody wants to shiver from cold or sweat in the heat. The problem is solved.

It is really a stylish, functional and modern garment that can be a base for your look in any situation and weather. The main and most interesting feature of our Bag bomber is… transformation! 

Our BAG BOMBER is avalible in three model:

MERAVI BAG BOMBER,  MERAVI BAG BOMBER FOOTER

MERAVI BAG BOMBER FOR WOMAN

Having had some experience in clothing design we formed a team of fashion specialist which can essentially come up with a great value-for-your-money offer! It seems in the past 300 years the only thing that underwent changes was style and, perhaps, ever so slightly - materials. Isn’t in obvious? 

Time has come for functional clothing. Find out your size below.​

 

:: A few words about MERAVI

We are a young team of creative entrepreneurs with an active life style. We love sport and traveling. We came up with the idea while on one of our flights. We suddenly realized time rushed forward and progress takes over the world. Every day, there more and more of new gadgets, flying automobiles and cyber-reality. And while people talk about space exploration it is our everyday clothes that stay the same.

This idea is just a first step towards creation of a brand, or an entire movement of those who love functional clothing that corresponds to modern notions of life. If we can rise enough funds, we will strive to develop our model line further.

Besides Bag bomber, we’ve been already developing new functional garments solving everyday problems of regular people. We keep those a secret… for now.

We ask you to support our project. Perhaps it is you who together will us will push the industry in the right direction.

Let’s create and expand a new fashion trend in the future!

 

 

:: ROAD MAP

:: Q and A

What colors are available?

Meravi Bag Bomber for man is available in 4 colors: blue, dark blue, bordo and black.

Mearvi Bag Bomber for women is available in 4 colors as well: blue, white, rose and green.

What sizes are available? 

We offer XS, S, M, L, XL and 2XL for men and same sizes for women.

To define your size correctly please check the picture with sizes.

From what materials do you make your bombers?

We use high quality, wrinkle-resistant and breathing fabrics for our bombers.

How much does the shipping cost?

Shipping is already included to the final cost. Shipping is provided by postal office.  

How long does it take to change a jacket in a bag and vise versa?

Usually it takes 20 - 30 seconds.

What is the difference between Meravi Bag Bomber and Meravi Bag Bomber Footer?

The main difference is in fabric. Meravi Bag Bomber Footer is made from fabric called footer.

Footer is a natural cotton fabric. Smooth on the outside and soft inside which makes it surprisingly comfortable. What’s more, footer also has the same properties - high quality, wrinkle-resistant and can “breathe” just like  usual fabric.

Tell me which belts are used for meravi bag bomber?

The Meravi bag has a short, non-detachable strap. And a long extra strap is included.

 

With our bomber which transforms into a bag, have your hands free for important moments!

story:
All or Nothing Campaign!

Short Summary

Hi we are the creators of @themoshpotato a tiny business made to sell one of a kind enamel pins and stickers. One of the pins that we have physically produced that people really seem to enjoy is the Pantone themed Gay Pride Enamel Pin.

Although we would really love to make other Pantone Pride Pins, we are unable to do so because making enamel pins is quite expensive and we do not have adequate funds to have multiple designs made.

You can see our enamel pins and stickers in our Instagram page: https://www.instagram.com/themoshpotato/

Etsy page: http://etsy.com/shop/themoshpotato

About the Campaign

We need your help in raising 500 USD so that we can produce additional Pantone Pin designs for the different genders. In return for your pledges, we will give you the pin/s of your choice, free stickers, and free international shipping! 

This campaign is very dear to our hearts because this is the very first time that we will use crowdfunding to finance our pins. At the same time, we also aim to donate some of our proceeds to an LGBTQIA+ community to really show that we truly care.

The Pins

As mentioned before, we need a minimum of 500 USD to deem this campaign successful and start making the designs. Each pledge will be given free vinyl stickers and free international shipping fee.

  • At 500 USD these Pride Pin Designs will be unlocked:

  • Stretch goals will also be unlocked once we exceed 500 USD

Cost Breakdown

Timeline:

  • Campaign period: January 18- February 17 2019
  • Manufacturing period: February 2019
  • Shipping period: March 2019

Risks and Challenges

Pin manufacturing is a handmade process; therefore, estimated manufacturing time may change abruptly and some of the pin's quality may also not be according to standards. It is our duty to ensure that top quality pins are delivered to you. As such, there is a possibility that shipping schedules might get delayed due to production problems. Rest assured, that we will update you every step of the way to ensure transparency and confidence that you will receive your pledges.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people would really love to contribute, but just don't have any means to do so. You can still help us greatly by sharing our campaign to people who are:

  • Your friends and relatives
  • In Social media like Instagram and Facebook
  • Part of the LGBTQIA+ communities and pages
  • Any other people who might be interested

PLEASE DO SPREAD THE WORD!

Thank you very much for your time.

Should you have any questions and queries don't hesitate to email us at: themoshpotato@gmail.com

We understand that some people would really love to contribute, but just don't have any means to do so. You can still help us greatly by sharing our campaign to people who are:

Your friends and relatives
In Social media like Instagram and Facebook
Part of the LGBTQIA+ communities and pages
Any other people who might be interested

PLEASE DO SPREAD THE WORD!Thank you very much for your time.Should you have any questions and queries don't hesitate to email us at: themoshpotato@gmail.com

story:
Summary   

Solklar is a product development project within smartwear. Our mission is to enable adventures through access to green energy while on the move. We use the sun to make outdoor life independent of battery life by harnessing energy to charge your devices. So that you can focus on getting the most out of life.
 

Investor proposal    

We target ambitious outdoors people who wish to tread lightly on our planet and welcome innovative products that makes their lives easier. We are looking for investments to fund a prototype and test our first product before heading into production and market launch. We ask for 5400 EUR to cover materials, production, shipment and fees, and keep costs low by tapping into the expertise and connections within fashion, marketing, design and entrepreneurship of our team.

As a supporter you enable our prototype development to test our product before we enter market in our projected forecast. In extension to our financial pledge we welcome product feedback and test subjects during the prototyping phase. We also welcome interested parties for future collaborations within the outdoors and design segments of online business.


Product

Problem       
Poor battery capacity on smartphones limits extended outdoor use and leaves many of the tools provided useless, for example GPS, planning apps, internet searches, camera and social connections. 

The average user in our target group currently use pre-charged battery packs to extend their smart devices functionality during outdoor activities, relying on continuous recharging. Some have found portable solar panels to better fit their needs. These solutions are however designed to power up during moments of rest, or to be attached to other equipment, which limits their options and freedom of movement by lack of versatility.
 

Solution       
By using solar smartwear, our customers get access to clean energy while on the move, lessen their dependence on energy infrastructure on their more ambitious quests and enable their smart devices to fit their intended purposes.

Our vest is designed for versatility and can be worn by either sex, adjustable in size, or be attached to additional equipments such as backpacks. With comfort and freedom of movement in mind, the vest is also lightweight and waterproof, fabricated out of carefully chosen textiles matched with efficient and removable solar panels for easy maintenance.

We are currently looking at developments in solar tech, and the minimum criteria for our product is to substitute a standard wall charger with sun exposure.


           

Product use        
The vest is ideal for adventurous trips and is well suited for a variety of activities; cycling, kayaking, hiking or alpine sports, where sun exposure is plentiful and energy outlets scarce.

By wearing the vest, or attaching it to any equipment, it is possible to substitute or complement the use of battery packs with a clean source of energy.

 

Market information

Brand positioning    
Although battery packs or power banks offer extended free time in nature, and is growing in demand on the global market, they're fundamentally designed to rely on energy outlets. In most cases this also implies that dirty energy is fuelling the natural refuge, causing a discord of values in our consumer.

Foldable solar panels are great options but not as versatile as our vest. They require mounting that is less applicable to situations where the user would rather go with minimal packing, such as during running.

Another option is solar panel equipped backpacks which share the same faults and come with additional complications when competing with optimized backpacks. We simply provide the same solution in a more user friendly format.
 

Execution plan   

We look to prototype and test our design and features, as well as selecting the right suppliers for our production setup. If the prototype development and testing is successful we will launch a second campaign for raising startup capital and cover production and marketing expenses.
 

Risk analysis      

In order to reach market, we need funding to prototype, develop and set up our supply chain. To mitigate risks of investments we aim to raise money for a prototype as a first step, to refine and test our design in the intended settings.

Dealing with copy cats. While there's always a risk of being copied, we work with small quantities to stay agile and follow recent developments with continuous adjustments of our design upon feedback.

story:
My name is Christian Valentin

A Denmark based independent designer

 

Link to article on: Nora Gouma Magazine

Link to article on: Model On A Mission

Link to article on: Watch Is This

 

 

 

 

 

For some, this project might look a bit familiar.

This isn't the first time I've brought my watch to crowdfunding.

Regrettably, due to some technical issues with the production of the watch, I decided to put the campaign on hold, as I felt it was my responsibility to deliver the best product possible. The support for the project was overwhelming, and the worst thing I could do was to let you all down. So I hit the drawing board to correct all the issues.

The first watch was 100% wood.

Now, with its newly redesigned stainless steel back case, and wooden front case, I am confident that my watch is not only attractive, but durable and worthy of your investment.

While these changes have raised costs since the initial campaign, the new design is worth every penny. 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
With its deep and rich walnut wood with the black dial combined with gold-toned stainless steel backcase, this timepiece offers luxury and convenience, for both him and her.
 
The Walnut Wood Black have a sophisticated and classy look. 
 
A true Scandianavian design icon.
 
Details
  • Sapphire Glass
  • Swiss Made Movement
  • Designed in Denmark
  • Water Resistant 3ATM
  • 2 years warranty worldwide
  • Brown / Black Italian leather strap
  • Walnut wood case with a black dial
  • Gold-toned stainless steel back case
  • Unisex size 40mm for both him and her

 

With its deep and rich walnut wood with the walnut wood dial combined with gold-toned stainless steel backcase, this timepiece offers luxury and convenience, for both him and her.
 
The Walnut Wood have a sophisticated and classy look. 
 
A true Scandianavian design icon.
 
Details
  • Sapphire Glass
  • Swiss Made Movement
  • Designed in Denmark
  • Water Resistant 3ATM
  • 2 years warranty worldwide
  • Brown / Black Italian leather strap
  • Gold-toned stainless steel back case
  • Walnut wood case w. walnut wood dial
  • Unisex size 40mm for both him and her

 
 

 

 
With its bright and rich maple wood with the white dial combined with the silver-toned stainless steel backcase, this timepiece offers luxury and convenience, for both him and her.
 
The Maple Wood White have a sophisticated and classy look. 
 
A true Scandianavian design icon.
 
Details
  • Sapphire Glass
  • Swiss Made Movement
  • Designed in Denmark
  • Water Resistant 3ATM
  • 2 years warranty worldwide
  • Maple wood case with white dial
  • Brown / Black Italian leather strap
  • Silver-toned stainless steel back case
  • Unisex size 40mm for both him and her

 

With its bright and rich maple wood with the maple wood dial combined with the silver-toned stainless steel backcase, this timepiece offers luxury and convenience, for both him and her.
 
The Maple Wood have a sophisticated and classy look. 
 
A true Scandianavian design icon.
 
Details
  • Sapphire Glass
  • Swiss Made Movement
  • Designed in Denmark
  • Water Resistant 3ATM
  • 2 years warranty worldwide
  • Brown / Black Italian leather strap
  • Silver-toned stainless steel back case
  • Maple wood case with maple wood dial
  • Unisex size 40mm for both him and her
 
 
 
 
 

Christian Valentin - A independent designer based in Denmark.

The inspirations for Christian Valentin's designs comes from his own love of sailing.

In Fact, the designs for his first watch collection, The Sailor, would come to him as he would sail along the peaceful coasts of quiet Denmark.

Christian Valentin is confident that the uniqueness of his designs reflects his own uniqueness, who he is, and what he stands for, comfort, simplicity and quality.

 

 

 

A unique limited edition number will be engraved on the backcase of the first 100 watches.

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Sailor has been doubly refined since the last campaign, and we believe this shows our dedication to putting out a product you will love. 

It has successfully undergone stress and water resistance tests, and we are confident we have ironed out any foreseeable nicks.

story:
About Us

ANOMALOUS PARTNERS DESCRIPTION

Anomalous Partners is a USA-based consulting firm prioritizing business development for minority and disadvantaged communities. The company specifically seeks to provide those who want to develop their businesses with various partnerships and support services, such as bookkeeping, accounting, administration, marketing, brand and business development, legal, and editing services. Anomalous Partners also promotes relations between black-owned businesses, their allies in the west, and African businesses in the diaspora.

Askia Christian, President of Anomalous Partners is spearheading the partnership with Super Ghost Distributions, a US-based distributor, to raise capital to expand Hero Collections, an apparel company based out of Accra, Ghana

 

HERO DESCRIPTION

The first African-based company we are promoting is Hero Collections. It is owned and operated by Jamez Attiogbe, a young Ghanaian designer with superhero and social justice passions very similar to our own. His vision is to 1) Africanize well known international superheroes, 2) Internationalize historic African heroes, and then use the platform he has created to 3) Recognize and humanize everyday African heroes, including descendants of the diaspora all over the world. 

 

Hero Collections was founded in 2014, via the flagship store in Accra, Ghana. Soon after development, the company was boosted into international sales through a franchise opportunity at the Ghana airport. Since then, growth stagnated and James began thinking about developing an online presence. Noting that his local economic community was strangulated in the market, due to existing international trade policy and devastating stereotypes regarding African nations (ie: African prince scam chain letters), he knew he had to be proactive.

 

Upon a chance meeting with Khalila Fordham, one of the Anomalous Partners founders, in January of 2020, James took the opportunity to form a US partnership through Super Ghost Distributions to promote and distribute his products. He realized the social capital byproduct of an equitable western partnership would advance his local community and economy.

 

In addition to a US partnership with SuperGhost, he also wanted to give back to his local community through the various higher education institutions in the Accra area. James planned to launch his Campus Heroes Initiative in 2020. The intention was to provide opportunities for local youth to volunteer in their local communities, as well as develop field experience in the textile and trade industries, while earning a college degree. However, these plans were thwarted by the devastation of COVID-19, as trade opportunities waned.

 

About the Campaign

THE CAMPAIGN & WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT

Our goal is to raise funds for the growth and sustainability of Hero Collections. Locally, in Ghana, Hero Collections is in need of numerous upgrades for production and manufacturing spaces. We also need funds for a mobile shop, as the local economy cannot yet respond to an online-based presence. We hope to raise capital to ensure that Hero Collections is robust enough to handle online orders from all over the world. With the projected boost in online sales, there’s an urgent need to hire and train additional staff as well as provide equitable pay and accommodations for team members. 

 

Too often, trade deals with African-based companies lead to an increase in the price of goods in a way that inequitably benefits the western based partner, while leaving the African-based partner with less income and profit. The hope of Anomalous Partners and SuperGhost, as US-based partners of companies like Hero Collections, is to make these exchanges in such a way that it improves the international trade expectations of African-based companies. Our goal is to create as many opportunities as possible for a corresponding increase in quality of life for African-based companies as their sales increase, modeling the policies of the World Fair Trade Organization.

 

WHAT WE NEED:

We are asking for $25,000 to help Hero Collections buy resources to prepare the brand to launch into an international market. We need: 

  • Larger manufacturing space. The current space is a 12 x 12 feet shed that is not fully enclosed. It has a roof and walls, but allows drafts and mosquitos.
  • Modern sewing machines, as Hero Collections is currently using dated machines.
  • Modern screen printing machine
  • Industrial iron
  • Office computers and printer
  • Material and fabric to expand inventory for international launch.
  • Transportation truck for developing products in the local region. 

EXTENDED GOAL:

  • Mobile retail shop from which to sell merchandise and train the Campus Heroes team across the local community.
  • Hero Collections would like to buy and remodel space to accommodate the growing training staff.

 

WHAT YOU GET:

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

We know many may not have the resources to financially support us. We would love for you to help by sharing our campaign within your networks to help us spread the message. You can also support the effort by liking us on social media and following our pages.

story:
THE STORY

The story behind RÔKA is one of passion and entrepreneurship. We started out with a simple idea of creating beautiful accessories with the ambition to do our part in improving the world around us. We don't target men or women but rather people sharing our idea of how things should work. It IS possible to create pieces out of some of the finest materials our world has to offer in a way that not only doesn't hurt our environment but also helps people in need. This is why we work with charities and dedicate each collection to a specific charity. It is also why we are very selective with the materials we use in order to avoiding negative impact on the environment and the people we work with.
The HÔMAGE collection has been dedicated to the amazing Swedish non-profit Föreningen Storasyster (The Big Sister Association) and their work to help people exposed to sexual abuse. 

(Read more about Föreningen Storasyster and why we've asked them to be paired with the HÔMAGE collection below under 'Awareness' )

We have never been in this business to maximize our profits or for the sake of money. We want to feed our passion for creating and doing the right thing and to be able to make a living out of that is more than enough for us. Our passion is as strong as it is genuine and anyone willing to join us on this journey is more than welcome to do so. 

If you have any questions at all, please reach out to us. We are always interested to talk with like minded people. You'll find our contact information under 'Contact' on our website. 

www.rokastonewear.com

THE DESIGN

At first sight, The Hômage collection appears to differ wildly from the prior RÔKA collections. No stone or minerals, no link and no beaded structure. When taking a closer look however, one will discover several similarities that clearly states the RÔKA heritage of this collection. 

First off, you'll notice that the shape of the solid silver band is the same as the RÔKA tab in our beaded pieces. We simply extended the tab and had it envelop the wrist almost completly. The bracelet is a solid 925 Sterling Silver piece made from 100% reused materials. 

Close to the end of the band is the signature off-set RÔKA engraving which is done by hand. Following the engraving is a row of five bands. Each one representing one of the five years RÔKA has been in existence. A single 'Ô' is engraved on the opposite side and this is the sub-brand marking our new style of design. 
Taking a look in the inside of the band you will find four stamps. One marks the guarantee of the silver purity of 92,5% pure silver (industry standard). Following that is the stamp for year of production (2018). Next up is the stamp guaranteeing that the piece is made in Stockholm, Sweden. And lastly is the RÔKA Stone Wear stamp which marks our status as certified jewelry producer. 

The design has been processed for nearly a year and a half. Pen put to paper and paper put to our talented smith who sculpted to original and on through the process until we reached a result that we are happy with. It has been a slow but steady development which has been needed in order to reach the level of quality we always aim for.   

 

THE QUALITY

We had a clear vision from the start with The Hômage, we would be using nothing but Swedish materials and work exclusively with Swedish partners. The 925 Sterling Silver is reused and comes from Swedish mines. We are having less of an environmental impact as no global shipments are required and no new silver ore needs to be mined for our purposes as we reuse silver from old jewlery, cutlery, tools etc. This way we can minimize our Co2 emissions and at the same time have complete and total control over the silver quality as well as the standards for people employed by our partners. 

The boxing is made entirely out of Swedish wood that is grown responsibly and in a sustainable way. The cases are cut to size and then put together by hand using no glue or resin. 

Every single piece of material and every single individual that has worked on this collection comes from Sweden. Simply put: not a single component has crossed Swedish borders. 

This is how we can guarantee the highest possible quality and at the same time make sure that our pieces are produced in a responsible and sustainable way in regards to both people and the environment. Of this we are incredibly proud.

 

THE AWARENESS

As all RÔKA collections The HÔMAGE is connected to a charity we care deeply about. Föreningen Storasyster is a Swedish non-profit working to help people exposed to sexual abuse. They support their clients with everything from therapy to legal advice. Sadly, the need for non-profits like Föreningen Storasyster is profound and we want to help decrease that need. 10% of the profits of The HÔMAGE collection are donated to Föreningen Storasyster in order to help them do their important and though job. 

Learn more about Föreningen Storasyster here: www.foreningenstorasyster.se 

 

THE IMAGES

Boxing - Made out of 100% sustainable Swedish wood and assembled by hand in Sweden

 

The HÔMAGE Mångata

Hand sculpted 925 Sterling silver with a hand polished finish. Made from 100% reused Swedish silver.


The HÔMAGE Rimfrost

Hand sculpted 925 Sterling silver with a coarse and rough finish made through careful flagellation done by hand. Made from 100% reused Swedish silver. 


The HÔMAGE Sot

Hand sculpted 925 Sterling silver with a light oxidation which gives a matte black finish. Made from 100% reused Swedish silver.

THE DESIGN
At first sight, The Hômage collection appears to differ wildly from the prior RÔKA collections. No stone or minerals, no link and no beaded structure. When taking a closer look however, one will discover several similarities that clearly states the RÔKA heritage of this collection. 
First off, you'll notice that the shape of the solid silver band is the same as the RÔKA tab in our beaded pieces. We simply extended the tab and had it envelop the wrist almost completly. The bracelet is a solid 925 Sterling Silver piece made from 100% reused materials. 
Close to the end of the band is the signature off-set RÔKA engraving which is done by hand. Following the engraving is a row of five bands. Each one representing one of the five years RÔKA has been in existence. A single 'Ô' is engraved on the opposite side and this is the sub-brand marking our new style of design. Taking a look in the inside of the band you will find four stamps. One marks the guarantee of the silver purity of 92,5% pure silver (industry standard). Following that is the stamp for year of production (2018). Next up is the stamp guaranteeing that the piece is made in Stockholm, Sweden. And lastly is the RÔKA Stone Wear stamp which marks our status as certified jewelry producer. 
The design has been processed for nearly a year and a half. Pen put to paper and paper put to our talented smith who sculpted to original and on through the process until we reached a result that we are happy with. It has been a slow but steady development which has been needed in order to reach the level of quality we always aim for.   
 
THE QUALITY
We had a clear vision from the start with The Hômage, we would be using nothing but Swedish materials and work exclusively with Swedish partners. The 925 Sterling Silver is reused and comes from Swedish mines. We are having less of an environmental impact as no global shipments are required and no new silver ore needs to be mined for our purposes as we reuse silver from old jewlery, cutlery, tools etc. This way we can minimize our Co2 emissions and at the same time have complete and total control over the silver quality as well as the standards for people employed by our partners. 
The boxing is made entirely out of Swedish wood that is grown responsibly and in a sustainable way. The cases are cut to size and then put together by hand using no glue or resin. 
Every single piece of material and every single individual that has worked on this collection comes from Sweden. Simply put: not a single component has crossed Swedish borders. 
This is how we can guarantee the highest possible quality and at the same time make sure that our pieces are produced in a responsible and sustainable way in regards to both people and the environment. Of this we are incredibly proud.
 
THE AWARENESS
As all RÔKA collections The HÔMAGE is connected to a charity we care deeply about. Föreningen Storasyster is a Swedish non-profit working to help people exposed to sexual abuse. They support their clients with everything from therapy to legal advice. Sadly, the need for non-profits like Föreningen Storasyster is profound and we want to help decrease that need. 10% of the profits of The HÔMAGE collection are donated to Föreningen Storasyster in order to help them do their important and though job. 
Learn more about Föreningen Storasyster here: www.foreningenstorasyster.se 
 
THE IMAGES

Boxing - Made out of 100% sustainable Swedish wood and assembled by hand in Sweden
 
The HÔMAGE Mångata
Hand sculpted 925 Sterling silver with a hand polished finish. Made from 100% reused Swedish silver.



The HÔMAGE Rimfrost
Hand sculpted 925 Sterling silver with a coarse and rough finish made through careful flagellation done by hand. Made from 100% reused Swedish silver. 



The HÔMAGE Sot
Hand sculpted 925 Sterling silver with a light oxidation which gives a matte black finish. Made from 100% reused Swedish silver.

story:
OVERVIEW

You always chose clothes for their looks at the expense of discomfort. For you, we have produced TECHNICAL SUIT.

3W TECHNICAL SUIT, an innovative suit that re-configures your daily life for always comfortable movement, convenient management at any time, and wearing anywhere without worries.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The 3D pattern was applied to the arm and knee joints to give an invisible room and designed for comfort in any movement.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ACTION PLEATS is put in the back part for easy movement without being tight.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The YKK's button on the jacket reduces the inconvenience of daily life with its sturdy durability and easy and quick add/removal. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The hidden pocket with YKK's AUTO-LOCK zipper keeps the exterior compact, allowing you to store important items.

 

 

 

It consists of 8 pockets and can store various items easily. There is the advantage of storing many items without damaging clothes fit, and the zippered side pockets for important items prevent the chances of losing items.

 

 

 

The 3W PANTS waist adjustment system has button which combines lightness and intensity for a waist adjustment by ± 3 inches, allowing waist fit for anyone.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Raincoat's water repellent function reduces dirt and damage to clothing.

 

 

 

We've developed materials for comfort, convenience, and class in everyday life with the flexibility of fabric for sports activities, resilience without wrinkles, and water repellent function of the raincoat.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 It was developed for washing machine and has a structure without a pad for flexibility and resilience.  Washing pack is made just for this promotion and is not sold to customers. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lighting may occur a reflection on the image.

Different screen brightness or resolution may lead to  deviation in color between the real product and the image on the website

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Since special sewing method for a perfect fit we pursue are hard to translate into reality, we could not find a manufacturer to fulfill the required skill.

Nevertheless, we have produced the product made from high quality ingredients with careful considerations since the beginning step in the process of product planning, sticking to our beliefs that we produce the one and only clothes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hello. This is Ecrw Studio, which means a group of technicians specializing in fashion and graphic design.

story:
Rather B - Your Beauty Companion

   

Meet Rather B –  a professional online beauty platform for you to choose a right product. We give you free product samples and provide you only relevant product information before committing to a full size product.

 


Why Rather B?

We all have been in the situation where we are saturated with all the reviews from the Internet. The enormous amount of such reviews will only cloud our decisions in choosing the perfect product for us.  

What if: By simply trying a selection of deluxe samples, you can experience different products before committing to a full size one.  The samples you select will be delivered to your door every month free of charge.

What if: You can filter the reviews based on your skin types to get more relevant information. Also, the reviews are sorted into simple, frequently mentioned terms for you to understand the product more easily.

With us, you will reduce the chance of purchasing an unsuitable product and the search process will be more effective and efficient!


How it works

To fulfil it, we optimise our product review system based on your skin conditions.  Additionally, tokens will be rewarded through simple interaction with our platform, either through logging in to receive the latest beauty news or through writing a review about your favourite product. Tokens can be used in exchange for samples of beauty products from a variety of brands.


What we offer

Optimised Product Review System



1.  Customised Filter

You can filter the reviews by skin types and other conditions to only see the relevant information from people with similar conditions. 

2.   Sorting Tags

Tired of reading all the reviews and finding them all similar? By sorting all the reviews into short and concise tags, your browsing time to look for a relevant review will be significantly decreased!

3.  Where to Buy

Promised to provide you with the best beauty offer available, our price matching system will help you find where and at what price you can get the product of your interest by comparing from several authorised retailer online and offline.


Get FREE product samples with our tokens!




You can use our tokens, official currency on Rather B, to engage in different activities such as getting real product samples or other unregularly activities.


How could we make this happen?

In order to fulfill it, we sincerely need your help. It is calculated that we need a total of £10,000 to brings this platform to live.


Perks


Join our campaign and be a part of our community. Your contribution means the world to us. As a way to show our gratefulness to you, we would like to reward you with your contribution.

Let’s get classy – 5£ perk: We will send you a personalised thank you note. In addition, we will keep you in the loop and constantly update you with the process of platform construction.

Let’s get beautiful– 10£ perk: You will receive a select of stickers from us with a beauty quote that each and every beauty junkie out there can related to. Your name will be listed in our fame wall, featured in our website.


Let’s get Active -25£ perk:  You will receive all of the previous perk plus a designed tote bag –exclusive for Rather B. 



Timeline




Risks & Challenges

 Our team has spent a considerable amount of time to think about all the potential problems that we might have faced in this campaign and have been able to resolve some. However, there are inevitable challenges. The following shows the most obvious ones:

·  Website Construction:  Our team have contacted with several developers to estimate the funds we need to raise, but it is possible that we might not be able to fulfil the high quality of the platform as we expected, so we might need to raise funds for the second time to improve it.

·  Funds: We will not be able to deliver our platform to you as well as the perks as promised if we can’t reach our goal within 30 days. Therefore, if the campaign is not successfully funded, your contribution will be refunded to you within 5-7 days


Meet The Team

We are a group of 5 young entrepreneurs from Cass Business School in London. With different backgrounds, we bonded over our interest in marketing over the last few months.


With our passion and knowledge in beauty industry, we would like to introduce you a new way to experience beauty products and to keep up with the latest beauty trend.  Let us be your personal beauty companion!!


We understand that not everyone would be a contributor. Therefore, it will be much appreciated if you could like, comment, and share your love about our campaign in social media.. To create this perfect platform for you, we need your support in this campaign. It means the world to us!

story:
Design journey

After a rigorous process of sketching, 2D and then 3D design, we concluded that our unisex watches needed to have soft, subtle geometry and exquisite detail. The rolling, cambered surface help take the visual weight out of the product: put an Objest next to another 42mm case and Objest will appear smaller. This also has the added advantage of feeling more balanced on smaller wrists.

Although this is a modern watch design, we nonetheless wanted to draw from the ratios and component relations in older, classical timepieces. Traditionally watch hands used to have proportions of thirds – for example, the hour hand was two-thirds the length of the minute hand. This is a standard we've retained and designed back into the watch.

 

Dial design

Our three-dimensional, numberless dials are made from one piece of metal. Each has a two-tone colouration, giving the dial added character and lustre.

Some of our earlier prototypes show the date window on the right side. The final design will have the date window on the left side. Some of the imagery and the video of consumers reviewing the watch are of the earlier prototype. i.e. window on the right.

During the development process we also asked our suppliers to prototype samples without a date window. These still use an ETA automatic movement but look the same as our Quartz watch. Some of this imagery has been used in the project.

 

Swiss made

Objest watches are hand made in Switzerland and assembled by a master watchmakers. Our unisex timepiece uses an ETA movement: an immensely reliable mechanism from a company with great pedigree within the luxury watch market. Watches that use the same mechanism include Breitling Windrider B13358LA/A700 and Rolex Submariner . You will even find it in some vintage watches.

ETA's build quality, precision and reliability are the three reasons why we decided to select this movement. Unfortunately, opting for a premium watch movement comes with a premium manufacturing price. Therefore, the biggest constraint we have is order volume and securing the watch movements, and this is where we need your support!

Watch customisation

We have a good understanding of design, materials and colours but also appreciate that sometimes you, whether buying for yourself or as a gift, want a greater level of control. This is why we have integrated a level of customisation into our first automatic watch. You will be able to select from a pre-defined palette of materials and build a unique, premium timepiece. The customisation is extended to case, dial, strap, crown, buckle, minute, hour and second hand, and you can adjust everything: design, colour, material.

Watch components

We've brought together a palette of colours that reflect a broad spectrum of tastes. From muted metallics to bright accent hour hands. Your design, your time.

Lets design

Now we have the components, lets design! All of the cases, crowns and buckles come in a matte finish. There are two dial designs and four options of Italian leather straps.

These are a few of our favourites. What is yours?..

 

So many options, I need help

We've tried to make it a little easier for you to select the best option, from an all black watch to a beautiful gold nude version. Download and save these documents to your computer to help. Your final design will even be collected via a survey at the end of the project. All in good time...

 

Watch specification

All our watches are unisex and have a 42mm case, are 11.5 mm thick and are rated to 5 ATM (50 m). We are currently offering a number of finishes including Diamond Like Carbon (DLC), IP and gold. We use sapphire glass.

 

Our principles  

At Objest we believe in putting pleasure into the everyday. As our name suggests, we combine the playful with the practical, to produce beautiful contemporary objects that reward every touch and glance. Through imaginative conception and unexpected detailing, we seek to create a smile and unlock the lasting pleasures of thoughtful, personal design.

Our deeply held design principles shape our products. We are dedicated to high-quality materials, top craftsmanship and simple, elegant and engaging design. Adhering to these ensures beautiful, cultured products that will be treasured for a long time.

Production schedule

We have a very close working relationship with our Swiss partners and will ensure the campaign and product runs within the schedule. We will be shipping March 2017. We have meetings setup in November and are on track to delivery watches within the project timeline.

 

About Objest

Objest was founded by Jared Mankelow. After fourteen years of collaborating with Conran, Tangerine and Ideo, he was inspired to create a new premium lifestyle brand.

Objest is immersed in London’s unique currents of design, art, architecture and culture, all of which find expression in the products we create for our worldly, wise and design-conscious customers.

story:
Hi.
We are WANTED GENUINE LEATHER, a family venture, led by we two university young people in professional and business formation.

We have set up a business model, that allows us to offer manufactured products with excellent raw materials, the best genuine leathers.

We are supported in pre-established business agreements with the entire chain of product development from its conception, factories, prototype testing, cost analysis, logistics coordination for shipment, rewards structuring, packaging following the valuable recommendations of the Indiegogo platform.      

Thanks for your support !

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

Q: How do I select the color of my perks?
A:  At the time of making the contribution, in the payments window
 
Q: Are the products you offer, genuine leather?
A: Of course; All the products we offer are high quality genuine leather. 
 
Q: Are the colors accurate as the photograph?
A: The representation of the color is approximate, since each device can show something different. We have tried to illustrate the color in the most approximate way, comparing the photo with the original product.
 
Q: Can I use an access card without having to remove it?
A: Of course, you can use the wallet, without taking out your card. It should not be placed into the card trigger system. Place in the trigger system cards that require RFID protection.

 

Q: How long would it take to get my products?
A: Once the campaign is over, we will start production, which is manufacturing, manual processes. We have the support of high quality factories, which will help make this process efficient and fast. Based on this we have made our TIMELINE exposed.
 
Q: Do the Perks cover all import costs and shipping costs?
A: As stated in each Perk, only shipping costs are covered. Import tariffs and other customs fees or shipping handling, and others are not covered by us.

 

 
Before packing and shipping the products offered, an exhaustive quality inspection is carried out, one by one, which guarantees the quality offered; we do not offer refund or returns on products that were received as an Indiegogo perk.
Crowdfunding is an amazing tool that allows people to get their ideas off the ground. Indiegogo is not a store and our "perks" are the way that we say thank you for supporting us (and trust us, we are VERY grateful). Every dollar received from this campaign will go directly into making WANTED GENUINE LEATHER a reality.
 


We want to make all of you part of this dream, part of the "WANTED GENUINE LEATHER" family.

That's why we invite you to support our project to take it to a higher level, without your help, it would be very difficult to achieve. The money raised will be used for the purchase of raw materials, the contracting of factories and the shipment of perks, surpluses will allow us to organize and hire a greater team of developers and equip ourselves with the technological tools needed to consolidate the enterprise.

Our first developments are available in this campaign. We want to develop more amazing models of accessories in genuine leather and surprise you with their unique benefits.

 

We want your reward to be meaningful by participating in the campaign.
Reward levels have been studied and tried out to ensure that the greatest possible discount is for your benefit.

You can get greater discount, with combo perks. Group with friends, to achieve it.

Welcome to this adventure of being born and growing a venture, Share with your family and friends through social networks, know and support our campaign,  group with them, choose your best perk.

                                                                                      Start your SUPPORT NOW !

  Before packing and shipping the products offered, an exhaustive quality inspection is carried out, one by one, which guarantees the quality offered; we do not offer refund or returns on products that were received as an Indiegogo perk.Crowdfunding is an amazing tool that allows people to get their ideas off the ground. Indiegogo is not a store and our "perks" are the way that we say thank you for supporting us (and trust us, we are VERY grateful). Every dollar received from this campaign will go directly into making WANTED GENUINE LEATHER a reality. We want to make all of you part of this dream, part of the "WANTED GENUINE LEATHER" family.That's why we invite you to support our project to take it to a higher level, without your help, it would be very difficult to achieve. The money raised will be used for the purchase of raw materials, the contracting of factories and the shipment of perks, surpluses will allow us to organize and hire a greater team of developers and equip ourselves with the technological tools needed to consolidate the enterprise.Our first developments are available in this campaign. We want to develop more amazing models of accessories in genuine leather and surprise you with their unique benefits. We want your reward to be meaningful by participating in the campaign.Reward levels have been studied and tried out to ensure that the greatest possible discount is for your benefit.You can get greater discount, with combo perks. Group with friends, to achieve it.Welcome to this adventure of being born and growing a venture, Share with your family and friends through social networks, know and support our campaign,  group with them, choose your best perk.                                                                                      Start your SUPPORT NOW !

story:
Are you tired of losing things? Do you wish there was a neckwear option that was not only stylish but also trackable?

Introducing the world’s first location-tracking necktie: the Little Colonel Locator. It combines fashionable neckwear with the latest in location-tracking technology. Now you can find anyone or anything that’s wearing this tie—as long as they’re within 100 feet of your smartphone. And if they’re farther away than that, it will tell you where they were last in range. 

Because it’s a clip-on, you can attach it to lots of things. However, the tie is not recommended as a way to track children, because outside of 100 feet it will not provide live-tracking updates like a GPS device does. That said, they’ll still look pretty cool wearing the tie.

 

 

 

 

  • Tie width: 5.7" from bow end to bow end
  • Tie technology: Integrated Bluetooth tracking device and red flashing light with clip-on tech
  • Tie details: Clip-on, pocket in the back of tie to access the integrated Bluetooth technology
 
 
  • 100 feet trackable range from your smartphone

  • Use the Bluetooth tracker's smartphone app to find your tie

 

Founded in 2019, KFC Innovations Lab is dedicated to bringing new ideas to life through crowdfunding. Learn more
KFC Innovations Lab has a collection of innovative offerings to choose from and support below.
