Warehouse Employees
Factory Workers
Farmers

     Environments are dynamic, in which, they are always changing. Utilizing UWB radio the accuracy is not affected by terrain or obstacles. While using D.A.R.K.(danger zone alert ranging kit) for its intended use, the challenges that come with a dynamic environment will not jeopardize the integrity of the product. With every change comes challenges. The uses of D.A.R.K.(danger zone alert ranging kit) has large range of uses that include but is not limited to:

Alerting a Team of Potential Hazards 
Ensuring Involve Parties are Somewhere Safe
Real time Headcount

story:
MEET PAUSE 


ABOUT THE PROJECT

Our goal is to bring conversation back to the table!

Phones are addictive and our impulse to check and use our phones has seeped into all aspects of our lives. Pause is here to encourage you to put your phones aside, if only for a short meaningful while. 

When you put your phones in a Pause box, it blocks all wi-fi signals, all incoming calls, and all text messages as well as any other cell phone distractions.

 

IN THE PRESS


 

WHY PAUSE?

The simple answer is that phones have an addictive nature.  We all claim that we'll disconnect, but the truth is, most of us never do.

This is why we need Pause.

Pause isn't a magical fix, but it is a lifestyle product designed to encourage and make it easy for us (both adults and kids) to put our phones down.

 

HOW TO USE PAUSE?


It’s super easy- just put your phone in the box and close the lid. That's it. It’s made from special materials that block all cellphone signals.

Pause was designed for the whole family, starting with parents who set the example by putting their phones in first to communicate the message that “family time is important.”

 

FEATURES

 

 


WHEN TO USE PAUSE? 

 

CREATE YOUR OWN ROUTINE 

When challenging families to set their phones aside, we’ve found that it’s more difficult than it sounds.

Developing new routines is a great way to break bad habits and Pause was designed to encourage the whole family to create a new phone-free daily routine. 

Before you know it, Pause will become a part of your day too.

 

BENEFITS

Reclaim family time
Research has shown that spending just 20 minutes of quality family time together is key for healthy child development and helps bring families together. Also, social gatherings are much more fun when you’re actually paying attention.

 

Reduce conflict
Pause reduces friction and it’s ease of use helps minimize family arguments over phone usage. No more, “I’m just checking that last email” or “just googling what we talked about on Wikipedia.” Once you put your phones in Pause it shifts the atmosphere, eliminating all distractions.

 

Unwind
Having some “me-time” can help you concentrate, relax and reconnect. Pause helps you reduce anxiety caused by being available 24/7. It’s very simple - less stress equals more happiness.

Be more efficient
Pause can combat what’s being reported as the biggest problem with meetings by 47% of employees - lack of attention across the board.

Stay Focused
Pause lets you totally disconnect, allowing you to focus on people and  projects that you don't normally have time for because you're constantly distracted by messages, emails, social media, and all the other wonderful things the internet has to offer.

 

HOW DOES PAUSE HELP?

Pause helps us disconnect using three key aspects: availability, ease-of-use, and physical separation. 

Availability
Pause serves as an invitation to spend phone free family time together, and its provide a constant reminder to put phones away.

Ease of Use
Pause is quick and easy to use, no setup required - just close the lid 
 

Physical Separation
Pause uses "Out of sight, out off mind" principle to remove the temptation of peeking at email or social media when focus is needed elsewhere 

 

 

CHOOSE YOUR PAUSE

 


JUST SHARE - BRING BACK FAMILY CONVERSATIONS 

We understand that sometimes, after putting your family’s phones in Pause, it can be difficult to start a meaningful and constructive conversation with each other.

That is exactly the reason why we've decided to partner with "Just Share" and offer you a basic set of amazing playing cards suitable for kids and teens to help you initiate a conversation. Now you can talk to each other and share your daily moments.

The game aims to strengthen the bond between parent and child, between siblings or friends by exploring  and sharing feelings, thoughts, and experiences with one another in a creative way.  
"Just Share" is a non-competitive activity for the whole family. The recommended ages are for parents and children aged 5-12, though children of any age can enjoy and partake in the fun.

What's in the package: a basic set of 12 Just Share cards

 

WHAT EXPERTS SAY

World renowned educational adviser Tamir Leon says:
"We must accept that excessive smartphone use has symptoms of addiction. For the good of our families, we need to be able to disconnect. I believe in Pause and in the transformation it can do in our lives. It is a smart and simple solution for a big problem. It is the perfect tool to create a family habit and to remind us all to disconnect.” 

 

WHAT YOU GET

The Pause package includes the Pause box, which can contain up to 6 smartphones.

Choose your Pause's top color - Pinewood, red, cream, green or blue.


 

REWARDS

 


 



SPECS

The Pause Box was especially designed to block radio transmissions, Wi-Fi, and cell phone frequencies. The aluminum made structure and unique seal of the lid are what enables Pause to completely block all signals.

The complex engineering is based on Faraday Cage concept. Once your phone is in Pause it’s radio waves are literally transformed into electric currents so that you can enjoy phone-free quality time.

The Pause Box is designed to blend in into any room or office with quality silver matte polished exterior and your choice of color for the top.

Each Pause Box can fit up to 6 phones at any time.



TIMELINE





MEET THE TEAM


 

 

Tenenbaum Hazan Creative House

 

FAQ

What exactly does Pause do?
Pause blocks cell-phone signals, Wi-Fi included, and enables families, friends, and groups to create phone-free quality time. 

Why do I need it? Why not just put my phone on airplane mode? 
We agree and we encourage you to do so. Families we spoke to expressed their challenges to us, which is what led us to design Pause in the first place.  It’s just one of those things that seems easier than it is. The mere presence of Pause serves as a reminder to put your phone away and helps families create a daily phone-free routine.  

How can Pause help me?
We designed Pause to eliminate distractions and make it easier for all of us to disconnect from our smartphones. We’ve been testing Pause, and over the last few months Pause has helped our families greatly reduce our phone overuse. With continuous use, Pause can help us build and strengthen a habit of putting our phones away and being present.

How do I use Pause?
Just put your phones inside the Pause box and close the lid. That’s it. There are no installations, no setups, no downloads nor any kind of activation. It’s like a plug n’ play, only the opposite: unplug and don’t play.    

Why do you think we need help?
Let's face it - excessive smartphone use is a modern day epidemic. We’re available 27/4 but never truly present with anyone anywhere. In the recent years it’s becoming more and more rare to have a genuine, present conversation with other people. Pause provides an incentive and a daily reminder to take control over your time and attention.
 
It doesn’t really solve the problem as I still need to put my kids phones in the box
We’re not claiming Pause is magical. You’ll still need to enforce the new tradition, but after a few days, you’ll notice that everyone will start to look forward to it, and appreciate the time spent with one another. Pause is a tool, not a magic bullet - you have to set the example (you set an example)
 
Will the phone’s battery be drained while inside the box?
Nope. The box's technology doesn’t drain the battery. Smart-phones behave as if in any other environment that lacks reception.
 
Is there a safety issue?
Nope. The physical nature of Pause is based on the "Faraday Cage Concept", which means that the case is blocking the phone's RF inside the box and transforming it to electric fields. In that way much less radiation is transmitted outside of the box and using it is 100% safe.

 

SOCIAL

story:
The Concept

I am a female business owner who has run a successful vintage clothing shop online for 10 years called Posies for Lulu Vintage www.posiesforluluvintage.com. I also managed a boutique in Venice, CA for 4 years and managed a restaurant for 3 years. I have gotten as far as I can working from home and need to scale up. I am ready for the next step: opening an exquisite vintage boutique in downtown Asheville. I have crunched the numbers, done my market research, created inspiring design concepts for the space, and have gotten my business model together, and have just secured this amazing space right in the heart of downtown Asheville.

What I need

I need to raise $10,000 more. I have $44,000 in start up costs, $34,000 of which I has already raised outside of this campaign. The $44k will go to things such as equipment, displays, racks, mannequins, tables, front desk, lighting, painting, building dressing rooms etc... What I will bring to the table is over $60,000 in merchandise, and over 30 years of experience buying vintage and 10 years in selling vintage online. 

The Impact

America alone throws 3 TRILLION pounds of clothing and textiles into landfills each year. Vintage fashion is 100% sustainable fashion. Buying and selling vintage is helping save the planet.

Other Ways You Can Help

Support women in business and sustainable fashion by sharing this campaige with as many people as you can!

story:
​

We wanted to make an everyday item more practical and useful than ever. Our belts are just that. This is an accessorie that you can bring anywhere, use it when you go to the city, on hikes or any of your adventures. The perfect everyday belt is born. 


Design 1: ODIN

The Odin paracord belt gives you everything you need when you need it the most. It comes with a Firestarter & Steel integrated in buckle to ignite fire, a Emergency Whistle as well as 12 meters of Paracord! 

SUMMARY:

• 12 METERS PARACORD

• FIRESTARTER & STEEL INSIDE BUCKLE

• EMERGENCY WHISTLE INSIDE BUCKLE



Design 2: THOR

Thor is the perfect belt for any occassion, with its sleek design and metal buckle it's the new everyday belt. Discguised is the 35-50 METERS of PARACORD, as well as Firestarter weaved in. 

SUMMARY:

• 35-40 METERS PARACORD

• METAL BUCKLE

• FIRESTARTER 


Firestarter is weaved in the paracord on the "Thor" belt, additional knife or stone is needed to rub against the firestarter to make fire. 






WHAT is Paracord ?

Paracord comes from the cord originally used on the Soldiers’ parachutes in WWII. The term 550 simply means that it has a minimum breaking strength of 550 pounds, giving it the name of 550 paracord, or 550 cord. When Soldiers landed in the battle fields, they would cut the paracord off their parachutes and pack it up for later use. This particular cord would come in handy for the Soldiers during battle, whether it was used to strap gear to harnesses, build shelters, or sewing string, the cord could be used in endless ways.




WHY Paracord ?

1. Emergency Situations

Rig a shelter by tying branches together when there’s nowhere else to sleep. Cut the cord, pull out the inner threads, attach a hook and you have a makeshift fishing line. Break a bone while out in the bush? Use the cord and a stiff branch to fashion a splint until you can seek further medical help. Simple sprain? It’s easy to make a sling to keep weight off the hurt appendage. If the situation is really serious, use the cord as a tourniquet to stop bleeding.







PERKS





1. Can you untie and tie back the paracord ?
Absolutely, though we would not recommend doing it unless you have to. It's meant to use in emergency situations.
2. Size and Colors

The belts are unisize. We will reach out to you about available colors to choose after the campaign has ended, make sure to not miss that email.

story:
Short Summary

Hi everybody.

We, Benoît DESGUIN and Romain GAUTIEZ, are two belgian entrepreneurs who associated their strength and passions to create the first tactical mechanical watch, the One Day One Color (aka O.D.O.C) !

Romain is engineer in electromechanics and Benoît is architect / designer. They know each other for a very long time but this project is their first collaboration. While Romain created the functions of the tactile system that moves the hands of the watch, Benoît designed several watches drawings until the moment their common goals were reached : a design and technological watch, O.D.O.C. This watch combines all the classical side of the watch (circleshaped, hands) but with a complete new technology never used before !

Our campaign has a very simple goal : manufacture and expand the collection of O.D.O.C. For the moment, the watches that are showed in the video are working prototypes. We now need support and funding to buy and create the manufacturing tools we need for a complete production and to hire a marketing company that will expand and sell our brand throughout the world.

As mentioned in the video, we're working on this project for almost three years and we are really proud of what we were able to achieve ! We are fully aware that launching a project in a very competitive market such as the watches' one is difficult but we are very confident that O.D.O.C has a design and technology to succeed in this world !

So, by funding our project, on any level, you'll help us to (trully) make a dream come true for us ! And more of that : you'll wear on your wrist a unique watch only available with this campaign !

What We Need & What You Get

The funding we need reaches 70,000 $.

We need these to buy the tooling machines and produce the watches you've ordered to us (and we thank you for that ;) )

In the price of our different perks, the transportation is included so the price you pay for the perk is fixed and nothing more will be asked to you !

Our perks are quite simple : it's all about watches !

We can propose you two different styles of O.D.O.C : 

- Stainless steel case : the black, design and sober watch with a leather strap.

- Aluminium case : the colorful, fashion and enjoyable watch with a rubber strap. 

The perks detailed : 

- 1$ thank you : thank you for your support, pal ;)

- one aluminium case watch : it couldn't be more obvious ! This perk make you the owner of a colorful watch in one of the following colors : blue, red, green, yellow and black.

- one stainless steel watch : nice choice ! You are now the owner of one of our black leather strap watches : gold, pink gold, blue and silver.

- Two for one alu perk : you'll get delivered two aluminium case watches of the color of your choice.

- Two for one Steel perk : chose among our steel case watches and pick two.

- In the mix : chose one alu and one steel watch and we'll send it to you !

- All-in alu : you'll receive all of our actual color in the aluminium model. 

- All-in steel : you prefer steel ? No problem, we'll send you all we have ! 4 steel cases watches with genuine leather strap

- Re-seller perk : 10 watches of your choice.

- Distributor perk : you'll get 20 of our watches, specify what colors, steel or alu case and you'll get it !

If we are not able to reach our funding, we thank everybody that helped us but we can't do anything unless we reach our goal, the tooling machines are way too expensive for us to buy them by ourselves. So all the fundings will be given back to their founder. But you and us this won't happen, right ?  ;)

The Impact

Once we succeed in our campaign, you'll see O.D.O.C watches in the jewelry, mall, shop...next to your home. That's really our main and most important goal : expand our brand so anyone can wear a design technological quality watch at an affordable price !

Risks & Challenges

As already mentioned, the watches' market is a very difficult one where success and defeats are seen everyday !

We know it ! And now, so do you ! But we are convinced that our O.D.O.C brings a fresh air to this market. We have to make it accepted by the resellers and by you, the public ! So feel free watch our video as many times as you want and, of course, ask us all the questions you need.

Even if we don't reach our funding goal, we will never fail thanks to the experience we collected, the links to the professionals of watches (distributors, subcontractors, fair organizers...). If this campaign fail, we'll consider as the launching of the next one !

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love our project but you never wear watches, feel free to help with the most important perk : the 1$ support perk ! Everyone that helps deserves our gratitude, no matter what !

You can also share and spread this campaign to all your friends, relations, colleagues, family...Anyone you think will love this project just like you, share ! Share ! Share ! Indiegogo created very useful tools for sharing, so please, use them ;)


We really hope you'll enjoy wearing O.D.O.C just like we enjoyed creating it !


Thank you very much, to all of you !

Benoît and Romain

If we are not able to reach our funding, we thank everybody that helped us but we can't do anything unless we reach our goal, the tooling machines are way too expensive for us to buy them by ourselves. So all the fundings will be given back to their founder. But you and us this won't happen, right ?  ;)
The Impact
 Once we succeed in our campaign, you'll see O.D.O.C watches in the jewelry, mall, shop...next to your home. That's really our main and most important goal : expand our brand so anyone can wear a design technological quality watch at an affordable price !
Risks & Challenges
 As already mentioned, the watches' market is a very difficult one where success and defeats are seen everyday !
We know it ! And now, so do you ! But we are convinced that our O.D.O.C brings a fresh air to this market. We have to make it accepted by the resellers and by you, the public ! So feel free watch our video as many times as you want and, of course, ask us all the questions you need.
Even if we don't reach our funding goal, we will never fail thanks to the experience we collected, the links to the professionals of watches (distributors, subcontractors, fair organizers...). If this campaign fail, we'll consider as the launching of the next one !
Other Ways You Can Help
 If you love our project but you never wear watches, feel free to help with the most important perk : the 1$ support perk ! Everyone that helps deserves our gratitude, no matter what !
You can also share and spread this campaign to all your friends, relations, colleagues, family...Anyone you think will love this project just like you, share ! Share ! Share ! Indiegogo created very useful tools for sharing, so please, use them ;)

We really hope you'll enjoy wearing O.D.O.C just like we enjoyed creating it !

Thank you very much, to all of you !
Benoît and Romain

story:
With Cord Cuver™ you no longer have to deal with the frustrating issue of tangled headphones:

  • No need to buy ANOTHER pair of expensive headphones, they work with your existing ones.
  • Cord Cuvers stay on your headphones, eliminating the worry of constantly dragging around an unreliable & flimsy cord organizer.
  • Using a Cord Cuver is extremely easy and storage is a breeze.
  • Cord Cuvers are completely customizable and also fashionable.

Also available in White

We designed Cord Cuver to eliminate this perplexing problem by encasing the wires that tend to create havoc when left alone. Just feed your headphone jack through your Cord Cuver's hollow sleeve, and you're all set!

Don't let this happen to you anymore...

Cord Cuvers are easy to put away, and can be stored in a variety options:

  • Pull your Cord Cuver over your headphone cables, then just throw it in your bag, pocket, purse, wherever!
  • Wrap your headphones around your hand & use the strap to snap them in place
  • Bunch up your headphone cord, then wrap the strap around cables
  • Wrap around your phone or MP3 player

We are now at the stage where we have perfected our design of this amazing and unique product. With your help we will be able to make our first mass production run, and finally offer a viable solution to an issue that plagues millions of - no more tangled headphones!

Factory Printing Samples

Our hope is to eventually expand our product line by offering consumers a wide range of customization options: patterns, sports teams (NFL, college, MLB, ect), special color blends, custom logos, cartoon characters ect. Please help us share and solve this problem once and for all! Thank you guys for your support!

Campaign Contest!


FAQ's

Will a Cord Cuver fit my particular headphones/earbuds?

Cord Cuvers are currently designed to work with most vertical headphone jacks (See the picture below). To be sure, try comparing the width of your headphones (The microphone, volume control, the jack, ect) and see if they would fit through a tube about as wide as your thumb nail, if so you're all set!

Each Cord Cuver is exactly 5/8'' wide if you have a ruler handy


Do you have something that works for headphones with a bent jack?

We are currently working on some Elastic Cord Cuvers that will be able to stretch to accommodate these particular jacks. Cord Cuvers work best with vertical headphones jacks.

How do I get the headphone cord into my new Cord Cuver?

It's simple, all you need to do is feed the headphone jack through the sleeve while pinching both sides of the Cord Cuver for easy insertion.

Got a different question? - Feel free to post a comment or send us a message!

story:
Who we are

Mongrei was born of the belief that beauty and affordability do not necessarily mean mass production or compromises in quality.

Being a boutique company with no expensive marketing budgets, we harness the power of the Internet to reach our customers directly, with no middlemen or expensive TV ads. These savings allow us to focus on what really matters: giving you a premium-quality luxury item at a very affordable price.

We carefully source the best materials, the most important of which, of course, is our Italian leather. It is vegetable-tanned through natural methods only, free from harmful chemicals, making it last much longer than the chemical processes used by most of the industry. You will get an accessory of unsurpassed quality, made in an environmentally friendly way.

Reviving the ages-old Polish tradition in the manufacture of handmade leather goods was also one of our goals. Each piece is handcrafted with love by skillful artisans whose knowledge has passed from generation to generation. Your Mongrei bag will help keeping that tradition alive.

Being a hectic mother of three, I designed my bags with style and practicality in mind: they combine elegance with roomy and well-divided interiors, and are a delight to carry throughout your busy day. And to add an extra touch of elegance, I partnered with the talented, London-based designer Grzegorsz Wróblewski, who created the distinctive snake pattern with hand-applied studs that has made these bags so unique.

This is our “natural luxury” way.

 

 

Lilly Studded Tote Bag

$390 INDIEGOGO / $460 RETAIL

The Lilly Studded Tote Bag embodies the quintessential feminine modern design and the ultimate practicality for a busy day-to-day life. The engraved Mongrei snake logo, surrounded by a beautiful pattern of hand-applied studs makes this bag a unique and timeless piece of design. Made by skilled Polish artisans with the utmost attention to detail.

Premium Italian leather, vegetable-tanned
Engraved Mongrei logo
Hand-applied studs
Roomy interior with detachable purse
Dimensions: height 28 cm, width 36 cm, depth 16 cm
Made in Poland

 

 

 

 

 

Zoe Studded Bucket Bag

$365 INDIEGOGO / $430 RETAIL

Our cult, undyingly fashionable Zoe Studded bucket bag, with the engraved Mongrei snake logo surrounded by an elegant pattern of hand-applied studs. Small but roomy, made of top-quality Italian vegetable-tanned leather, with a long adjustable strap. The inner removable zip pouch can carry a phone and all your other little things.

100% Italian vegetable tanned leather
 Long, leather, adjustable strap
Roomy interior with detachable purse
Engraved Mongrei logo and hand-applied studs
Dimensions: height 25 cm, width 30 cm, depth 12 cm
Made in Poland

 

 

Lilly Tote Bag

$270 INDIEGOGO / $320 RETAIL

A cool classic, the Lillty Tote Bag, with subtle Mongrei logo on its minimalistic shape. Crafted from Italian vegetable tanned leather, soft and durable. Spacious enough to accomodate your laptop or spare shoes, this go-to tote will carry you from office to weekend with chic ease. The inner removable zip pouch can hold a phone and all your other little things.

Premium Italian leather, vegetable-tanned
Mongrei stamped logo
Roomy interior with detachable purse
Dimensions: height 28 cm, width 36 cm, depth 16 cm
Made in Poland

 

 

Production Schedule

Duty / Vat charges

International shipments may be subject to import taxes, duties and customs fees, which are levied once your package reaches the country of destination, and are the responsibility of the recipient. 

 

 

 

About me

 


Hi, I’m Kinga! My years in the wearable merchandising business, when I was always on the lookout for original ideas for my client companies, allowed me to discover true gems, not only in terms of astonishing materials, but also small, family businesses taking pride in their traditional, old-fashioned ways of manufacturing. When my third baby was born, I couldn’t find a bag both elegant and practical for a fashion-conscious mommy like myself. So I thought: “Why not design my own?” And that’s how it all started: with the support of my best suppliers, I created my first bag.

Years have passed and I am still wearing it. It looks as good as new. Moreover, people kept asking where they could get one for themselves. Meanwhile, my baby was growing, which encouraged me to apply my inspiration to situations in life that were becoming increasingly important again: work, leisure, weekends, social gatherings… and why not irreverence and joy of living? This is how this collection, which now incorporates bolder designs with big graphic patterns and metallic studs, came to life.

That’s why I need your support. By sponsoring this project, you can play a key role in making this dream come true, allowing many other women to share my passion for truly beautiful, timeless accessories that keep tradition alive.


Thank you!

 

Learn more about us at www.mongrei.com

or

contact us at shop@mogrei.com

story:
Short Summary

We have built a prototype of the moving tail, “Tailly”, which uses sensors on the inside of the belt to measure the user’s heart rate. 

Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/project.tailly
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ProjectTailly

Normally the tail hangs down, but when the user gets excited and their heart rate increases, the tail starts wagging, and when they calm down and their heart rate decreases, the tail swings slowly.

Tailly is not just a toy, nor is it a fashion accessory or a gadget. It is those three items combined, and, since it reacts to the heart beat rate, an extension of the users’ body. Tailly is fun to wear to parties, while out with friends or playing with kids. You could even wear Tailly on a date and express your true feelings through the wagging tail. Even better, your partner could also wear one for the both of you to add a level of subconscious communication between the two of you.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The basic color of the tail is white, but the tail is interchangeable, and we also are offering covers in Black, Fox and Pink. Fox and Pink are Indiegogo limited color.

We set the fundraising goal to $50,000. If we meet the fundraising goal, we will aim to deliver “Taillys” to our kind supporters in September 2013. If more supporters join us, the perks which are limited in number will have priority.

 

The Impact

I, Shota Ishiwatari, the creator of Tailly, previously developed prototypes of Necomimi for Neurowear.

Thanks to NeuroSky, “necomimi” has successfully shipped to the market and has reached numerous customers. I am very happy about this and am immensely grateful to Neurowear and NeuroSky. As a matter of fact, the idea behind Tailly was born after those who bought Necomimi repeatedly asked when a matching tail would be available to complement their playful outfit.

However, this time around, I do not want to only create the protoype, but also see through the product design and production by myself. To make this possible, I need to raise $100,000 in order to cover the manufacturing costs for the production of the first lot. I have negotiated with a trading company to contribute half of the initial cost of $50,000. That is why I have launched this project with Indiegogo and am asking for your cooperation.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share information on Tailly through Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr or the social media of your choice to spread the word. Please share the charm of Tailly to media and distributors in your neighborhood.

story:
한국어 페이지는 여기 / 日本語ページはこちら

인디고고 후원 방법에 대한 가이드는 여기에서 확인하세요!

 

The SOOMDUCK Riders Jacket is inspired by the Starfleet survival suit as seen in the movie Star Trek Beyond. It brings some of the key design motives from the survival suit but is not an exact replica of the uniform. 

This sleek and modern leather jacket is designed and handmade to be worn as a daily outerwear, featuring slim waistline and padded shoulder. 

 

 

 

SOOMDUCK is an independent design agency based in Seoul. We make high-quality apparel and accessories for pop-culture fans.  

Our mission is to bring to life designs inspired by manga, anime, film, and TV series that blend in with modern, everyday lifestyle. We discover and partner with talented, passionate handcraft artists who actively create pop-culture inspired goods in small batches.  

Our first crowdfunding campaign raised over $13,000 from 379 backers on Tumblebug.

 

This time, SOOMDUCK is widening its reach to a global audience and launching the Starfleet Survival Suit inspired Riders Jacket via Indiegogo. This funding project is run in collaboration with Otakatz, an interest-based networking platform and marketplace for otaku and Soojak, a handcraft artist and a long-time Star Trek fan.

 

 

Were you mesmerized by the way captain Jim Kirk rode a bike like a wild beast? The scene wouldn’t have been half as cool if it wasn’t for his perfectly fitted Starfleet survival suit.    

Despite our love for the captain, the Starfleet, and its uniform, it’s a difficult choice as your everyday outfit. (It’s bright blue with a pair of yellow epaulets on the shoulder!!)  

So we decided to take the key motives from the jacket and design an outfit that is 1) simple and stylish enough to wear to any occasion, 2) uses high-quality fabric materials, 3) produced to high quality, and 4) still affordable.

 

 

 

The Riders Jacket is not a cosplay item and we want you to really wear it to any occasion. So we designed it as stylish and comfortable as possible but without losing the look and feel of the Starfleet survival suit.  

 

There are several design traits that we paid extra attention to:  

  • The waistline: Hand stitched pads shaped to make your waistline slimmer.  
  • The shoulder angle: Ever so slightly padded to complement your shoulder shape.  
  • The length: Designed to covers just the tip of your tailbone to match with any outfit.  
  • The dual look: Zip it up all the way for that uniform look, or Zip it halfway through for a more wild, I ride my bike around this barren planet look.  

 

The original design sketch by SOOJAK

 

To make sure that the jacket looks great and also feels great to wear, we’ve tested several prototype designs made of cotton cloth material. We have also created the final prototype in leather fabric (as you can see in all model shots above) and we are extremely happy with the quality. 

 

 

 

 

While the SOOMDUCK Riders Jacket is designed as a daily outwear, we understand that some of us might prefer to have a bit more 'touch of Starfleet' to show off their loyalty to the fandom.

Once we reach 100% of our initial $9,000 funding goal, special add-on items will be revealed. We are working with artist SOOJAK to create Anya Hindmarch style stickers that you can use to decorate your jacket, bag, mobile phone cover, laptop, or anything you want :)

+

If we reach 200%, all backers will receive a pair of a Starfleet motive epaulet, which can be easily attached on top of the shoulder pad without having to stitch or sew on.

(Real-life design of the epaulet will be revealed later on)

 

 

Each jacket will be handmade, due to its complex design and the sensitive nature of the leather material. So we have secured a deal with a supplier that has both the experience and the capacity to handle large volume.

The crowdfunding campaign will allow us to secure the minimum order necessary to bring the production cost down and also upgrade the material to a genuine leather fabric. 

Our suppliers are ready to go and we can kick off the production and get these beautifully designed jackets made especially for you once we secure the minimum funding.

 

 

The funding will last for 40 days. Once the campaign finishes, we will send you a final survey to confirm your pledge and make an order to the supplier to kick off production. We are hopeful that shipping will begin in mid-December 2017 and complete all shipping by the end of February 2018. 

As always, there may be unexpected delays with every stage - especially with the Christmas and New Year's holiday happening in the midst of shipping. But we will keep you posted on any major change, and do our best to respond to your comments and questions within 24 hours cycle. 

 

Otakatz(オタカツ) is a combination of Japanese words Otaku(オタク) and Katsudou(活動), which literally means 'Otaku Activities'.  

We are a team of lifetime manga/anime/pop-culture fans joined together to build the world's first interest-based networking platform and online marketplace for fujoshi(female otaku) around the world. 

The beta version is currently available in English, Korean, and Japanese language. It will launch officially in early January 2018.

story:
Hi! We are Elyse Taylor and Kate Czerwonka and we are here to bring you the Taylor Trunk Generation Collection!  

Elyse is the fifth-generation of Taylor Trunk Company. Our story began in Louisville, Kentucky in 1883 when my great-great grandfather started building travel steamer trunks in his garage.  Over the next 133 years each generation in the Taylor family has further developed the company, each bringing new innovative ideas... ultimately contributing to our resilience and success of where we are today.  My forefathers have survived nationally difficult economic situations and have persevered as a travel centered business during times when traveling wasn't desired.  Now as the retail industry is evolving it is my turn to build upon my legacy and conquer my own hurdles. I have welcomed this opportunity & responsibility with open arms.

So, with your help we plan on building the Taylor Trunk name into a brand. With over 130 years in the luggage and travel goods business, Taylor Trunk understands our customer's travel needs. Therefore, we believe that we can build a brand that will be the foundation of all our customer's travels. 

In order to this we must stay true to our developed TRUNK values: 

Tradition: For five generations, Taylor Trunk Company has been a place where tradition and innovation come together."  Therefore we have chosen the name "Generation Collection" to support our proud family heritage of tradition.

Reputation: Our excellent reputation within the city of Louisville is pristine, and we are committed to always keeping it that way. Therefore we wanted our own product to obtain the same excellence.  The select pieces of the Generation Collection are made from the finest top grain leather, using high-quality hardware, and superior craftsmanship. Personal attention to detail from craftsman who genuinely care about their work go into every piece. You can expect leather goods of distinction and durability from the Generation Collection."

Unique: Every item in our collection is unique because every hide is unique. The Columbian leather that we have chosen is an entirely natural product. Therefore, each individual piece within our collection will vary slightly, which will add to the character of the bag. Like a fine wine, this leather will only get better with age and use... as it develops a deep, rich, beautiful patina. 

Neighborliness / Trustworthy: We have always considered customer service as one of our top priorities. Therefore, we have established a 3 year warranty for any manufacturer defects of our products. We believe that this adequately displays our confidence in our products quality. 

Knowledge / Expertise: We wanted the products of our Generation Collection to support what we specialize in: Duffles, Backpack, Totes, & Business Cases such as the executive brief, slim portfolio, & letter pad... and Travel Accessories such as the  utility kit & ultimate travel companion. 

These products will range from $10 - $425 MSRP. 

We have developed seven pieces for the Generation Collection.  These pieces have been on the market for approximately a year and make up less than 5% of Taylor Trunk's total sales.  With the $100,000 we plan to develop an in-depth and strategic marketing campaign that specifically targets to boost sales of the Generation Collection.   Our largest problem is that Taylor Trunk is known as a luggage retailer but not as a brand.  We have a loyal customer following and know the luggage and travel industry well. Elyse, Vice President of Taylor Trunk Company, has developed a strategic marketing plan that will reach our current customers and target new customers as well.  With your help we will use the funds we raise to establish ourselves as a brand and make the Generation Collection a household name.  Currently, an out dated website (poor techonology) has not allowed us the cabibility  for online sales and with your donations Elyse has been working effortlessly to launch a new website that is capable of handling online orders.  The Generation Collection will also be sold in our Superstore in Louisville and on Amazon.    Additionally, we hope to create additional pieces for the line that target a more feminine audience.  Within the next six months we plan to launch our new website and marketing campaign.  Within that we will reveal several new products that are specifically geared towards women,   Kate, our Innovation and Product Specialist, is working with a team of designers to create new peices that will expand the collection and offer more variety.  Over the next year we expect that the Generation Collection will be responsible for 15-18% of Taylor Trunk's overall sales.  With the high threat of competition from other brands we know that there are lots of other choices out there.  But with our130+ year reputation and commitment to exampilaory products we know that you investing in the Generation Collection brand is an investment in another 130 years of success, 

We are eager to start this new chapter with you, and we appreciate you taking the time to learn about our story.  Any donation, big or small, helps!  For a limited time we will be offering pieces of our Generation Collection at a discounted price as a thank you for donations of those monetary denominations.  Listed below are the current pieces in our collection and for a limited time only you can receive one of these handmade pieces with your donation.  Thank you for supporting Taylor Trunk Company’s Generation Collection!

Elyse & Kate

story:
Who's CAPUMON?

 

We're CAPUMON, we started about a year and a half ago creating unique designs inspired by video games, anime and cosplay. We only create things that don't already exist. We run on votes, we want to make what you want to see (of course with our own twist!). We've done over 10 successful pre-orders within a year and attended around 20 events so far! It's really inspiring seeing you guys rep our hats, we hope you can join us on our first pre-order on INDIEGOGO!

 

 

So Here's The Deal!

 

We need at least 40 of you to pre-order for this to happen.

This is a fixed campaign, you will only be charged if we reach our goal.

(So if you believe in this please pledge!)

This is not a donation. You will recieve the hat as soon as it's produced and shipped,
the price includes FREE SHIPPING. (Usually $6 USD domestic and $10 USD international.)

This hat is LIMITED EDITION (just like our other hats),
meaning there will only be 96 TOTAL in the WHOLE WORLD! 

This campaign will end September 20th, 2017 at 11:59 PM EST.

That's about it! I really hope we can bring this cutie to life! 

 

 

This design was created by us to celebrate the 20th anniversary of Pokemon last year. Based on the sprite of Snorlax from Yellow version. All black and white except for the fat paws on the side panels, it features a retro message box reading "ZZZ" under the brim and a big 1996 embroidery on the back. This design is similar to our other retro design inspired by Haunter, HAUNTING GHOST (1996) in that sense. 

 

 
 

This Ain't Easy TBH!
 

100% of the funds collected go towards making these hats! 
This includes designing, manufacturing, shipping/handling, marketing, the list goes on.
We do this because we love it, and we want to see you guys happy! 
 

You Don't HAVE to Pre-Order But...


Simply sharing this pre-order link does wonders!

https://www.indiegogo.com/campaigns/lazy-cat-1996-retro-snorlax-inspired-snapback

Like us on Facebook! Tell your friends and family about it! 

http://www.facebook.com/capsulemon

We're on everything else too, Instagram, Tumblr, Twitter, you can see it all on our homepage!

http://www.capumon.com


Thanks for the support guys!

CAPUMON

story:
Who is RedTown?

Introducing RedTown's original camera strap line, inspired by the cities they're named after. Made with genuine leather, complimented by elegant metal bindings and high quality stitching. These designer inspired straps have an ergonomic design that distributes weight evenly for maximum comfort and usability without ever compromising on style.   

The major focus of this line is to give photographers a chance to show off their personal sense of style and individuality. RedTown subscribes to the philosophy that it's just important for the person behind the camera to look as great as the photos they are taking!  

Our ”Toronto” strap is made of genuine black leather accented with chrome coloured adjusting buckles. The “New York” strap is made of genuine brown leather accented with gold coloured adjusting buckles.

 A RedTown camera strap is perfect for the on-the-go fashionable photographer, whether strolling about or stopping to shoot, the strap looks great and works effortlessly. A RedTown genuine leather camera strap is the perfect gift for the fashionable photographer in your life

 Vitaly and I started RedTown with the vision of providing a better looking camera strap that people will be proud to wear. Currently all that we are lacking is the start-up capital.

Why do you need funding?

This is where you come in! We need 142 lovely funders to pre-order a RedTown genuine leather camera strap to begin production These pre-orders will cover the cost to create the mold, materials, labour, packaging, shipping, and IndieGoGo fees. Get your beautiful black or brown genuine leather camera strap today for this special pre-production price! Fund RedTown and shoot in style!

The Impact

We hope that our company would pioneer the designer leather strap market, as we feel that nylon straps take away from the sophisticated pieces of photographic equipment. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Once the company is launched the straps will be sold at $149. During this fundraising stage we are looking to sell them at $87, making it a great purchase or a gift idea. We need to sell 142 straps to reach the goal. You can also contribute an amount that you think can bring us closer to the $12,500 goal. We appreciate you sharing this page with your friends photo enthusiasts.

RedTown. Shoot in Style

story:
Be Safe, Be Free, With Bpod!

Bpod is a multi-function baby chair that will replace the bouncy chair, high chair, and swing while providing a safe, soothing environment for infants. Unlike baby chairs on the market today that rock, swing, or bounce your baby, B-pod's gentle dual oscillating motion and low-intensity vibration can soothe even the most restless infants into sleep naturally-- just as if they were in Mom or Dad's arms!

Compact, Lightweight & Easy to Use

The Bpod measures 4' x 2.5' making it compact enough to place almost anywhere inside your home. Its design and 30 lb weight make Bpod strong and sturdy but lightweight enough to easily move from room to room. Plus, the built-in video monitor means you can keep an eye on your baby via a WiFi-enabled mobile device from any location in your home.

Now that we've perfected Bpod's design and the initial prototype (shown here) using a CAD model and a 3D printer, to take Bpod to market we need a professionally made prototype and master mold from which Bpods can be "Made in America".

Indiegogo supporters who contribute $699 or more will receive the Bpod View unit equipped with these features:



Indiegogo supporters who contribute $499 - $698 will receive the Bpod BASIC unit equipped with these features:



Soothe Your Baby With The Natural Motion Of Oscillation!

Oscillation is a repetitive action, usually over a period of time, that has equal movement. For example, an oscillating fan, turn to the left so many degrees, then to the right the equal distance, then repeats its movement over the same period of time.

Oscillations occur not only in mechanical systems but also in dynamic systems in virtually every area of science: for example the beating human heart, business cycles in economics, vibrating strings in musical instruments and stars in astronomy.


What We Ask of Supporters Like You

Now that we've perfected the initial prototype using our CAD model and a 3D printer, we need a production quality prototype and master mold created from which Bpods can be "Made in America". In order to proceed and be successful with this product, we have to hit an acceptable price point in manufacturing so that we can offer a fair price for the quality of goods.  With low production quantities, the price per unit increases. So, like every other product, more = better.


As early supporters your investment will go into packaging, printing, hardware (nuts, bolts, screws, switches, grommets, etc), manufacturing, assembly, shipping parts, tooling fees, designer costs, advertising, and distribution.

What you will receive:



Who is Bpod Baby? 

Bpod Baby is a small company based in Newport News,VA, that designs high quality, innovative baby products that advance babies' development and make life easier for busy parents. As parents, co-founders Josh and Tatiana Turner know first-hand how difficult it can be to soothe a colicky baby. That's why Sophia, their first daughter, was their inspiration for the Bpod, Bpod Baby's first product that will go to market in 2015 with your help.

Prior to founding Bpod in 2013, Josh had 15 years of experience working with major companies in the sales and distribution industries. Josh has a degree in business and is currently working towards his MBA. Tatiana's background and education are in the areas of business and Information Technology (IT). She obtained dual degrees in business and information technology (IT) while pregnant with Sophia.

 


The Impact:

By supporting Bpod Baby, you are directly and indirectly assisting with child growth and development.Your support allows us to continue to set bold goals in 2015. Your contribution also assists the evolution of function into function and form. We are very excited to bring Bpod to life and watch how it changes the baby industry.

Thank You,

Bpod Baby


FAQ:

How much does Bpod weigh?

Currently, the Bpod weighs in at a lean 30 lbs (13 kg) with the battery installed.

How long can Bpod last on a charge?

It has a range of approximately 8 to 10 hours on a single charge depending on use.

What powers Bpod?

Bpod is powered by a lithium-ion battery and a stepper motor rated at 1.3 amps.

How do you recharge Bpod?

It uses a charger that plugs into any standard 120-220 volt wall outlet and fully recharges in 3 hours. The battery can be charged 5000 cycles. Spare batteries and chargers will be available for purchase.

Is Bpod easy to use?

Bpod stands 4ft tall and is very balanced with a 2.5ft base. In a matter of minutes you’ll master the on board controls and confidently navigate your way through our mobile app.

Can children easily operate Bpod?

Bpod is very easy to operate but it is designed for an adult operator. It is not suitable to be operated by children.

How much does Bpod cost?

Based final costing and with large production runs we anticipate Bpod will be priced in the $399 range for the base model and there will be additional accessories for customization.

Where can I buy one?

We’ll be launching our Indiegogo campaign in July 2014 and depending on how much support we receive will decide our release date.

Does Bpod come in different colors?

Our color options for production are endless, but we will offer a select pallet to choose from. Custom colors would be considered a special order with special order pricing.

Does Bpod have a line of accessories?

We are planning to launch along with Bpod, a line of accessories that add to the babies experience which include,attachable and detachable toys, smart device dock for your babies developmental stimulation, interchangeable seat covers, etc..

How does my smart phone work with my Bpod?

Bpod provides a app to view your baby and to control Bpod's primary fuctions via smart device and a USB connection to charge your devices. We are currently developing a Bpod App to be launched in 2015.

What is the weight capacity of Bpod?

Our current model has the weight capacity of 35 lbs.

What is the warranty on Bpod?

Our company is establishing our resources for all the components that make up Bpod and will provide a one year limited warranty on the product. We will only introduce a product that can meet 100% satisfaction from our customers and will honor any concerns and issues that arise with our product.

story:
High Performance - Spa Quality
Nourishing Winter Gloves

So here's the deal. Winter is awesome, but dry, scale-y hands are not. Harsh winds, bitter cold -not to mention snow and ice- wreak havoc on poor defenseless hands! Any level of protection is great, but to truly be healthy, hands need to be nourished.

There's no reason why skiers and snowboarders of any age can't look good and feel good when they're slicing through the trees, hitting up back-country powder, or ripping up the terrain park.  DarkSyde offers you superior quality winter gloves that make you look good; make your hands feel good; and make your ride even more awesome! 

Performance : Comfort : Style

Each one of these is equally important in creating the ultimate winter glove. So we have painstakingly sourced the perfect fabrics & essential oils and designed high performance gloves to suit your needs on and off the hill.

the GLOVE

We've made DarkSyde the best winter gloves ever. Say goodbye to the days of cold, dry hands! Revel in the comfort of a waterproof outer, and soothe hurting hands with the oil-infused liner! And don't forget your phone...conductive patches on the thumb and index finger let you use touch screen devices without getting chilly fingers.

A design for every rider. Every detail was carefully considered to provide you with the most comfortable, high performance glove ever.

  • Botanical oil-infused liner to nourish thirsty hands
  • Durable & slightly stretchy fabric (so comfy you won't want to take it off)
  • Conductive patches for touch screen devices
  • Waterproof outers
  • Flattering unisex design and sizing
  • Four unique designs to suit your mood, or the terrain

The PALMYRA is the better-than-ever basic.  Along with all the features above, a waterproof, nylon outer protects hands even on the sickest terrain.  Elastic guards and wrist straps mean you won't lose your glove if you happen to tomahawk down the hill.

:

 

The BRECKINRIDGE is our take on the mitten.  It features the same details as the PALMYRA but in a style reminiscent of snow days and snow ball fights.

The JACKSON is our convertible mitten.  It features an oil-infused half glove with a corresponding mitten cover and velcro retention.  You still get conductive patches on the thumbs, but for those who need extended use of their hands, the JACKSON is for you.

The ASPEN is the leather driving glove for those who spend more time in traffic than on the slopes (but we know where you'd rather be, right?).  Thinly insulated, the ASPEN features a tighter fit and an adjustable Velcro wrist strap on a waterproof leather outer.  Warm enough for pounding the pavement and stylish enough for any suit-and-tie.

Find Your Fit

You could have DarkSyde in your hot little hands by September 2012, just in time for winter weather! Your support will make this project possible and help the hands of winter sports addicts. How awesome is that?! Let's get this party started!

Find your fit using the sizing chart below.  To ensure that you get the goods that you want, please make sure the name of the reward to the right corresponds with the names above. If you want more than one product, that's great! Just email to let us know which products you want, and we'll tell you the corresponding donation! Don't hold back! And if you have any questions please email or message us.

Spread the Word!

Check out our brand new Facebook page. You can truly help us get the word out by sharing our link with your family and friends. Oh, and there will be a pair of gloves given away to one of our fans at the end of our campaign so be sure to "like" our page!

You can also follow us on Twitter @darksydegloves.
story_txt:
High Performance - Spa Quality Nourishing Winter Gloves
So here's the deal. Winter is awesome, but dry, scale-y hands are not. Harsh winds, bitter cold -not to mention snow and ice- wreak havoc on poor defenseless hands! Any level of protection is great, but to truly be healthy, hands need to be nourished.
There's no reason why skiers and snowboarders of any age can't look good and feel good when they're slicing through the trees, hitting up back-country powder, or ripping up the terrain park.  DarkSyde offers you superior quality winter gloves that make you look good; make your hands feel good; and make your ride even more awesome!  
Performance : Comfort : Style
Each one of these is equally important in creating the ultimate winter glove. So we have painstakingly sourced the perfect fabrics & essential oils and designed high performance gloves to suit your needs on and off the hill.
 the GLOVE
We've made DarkSyde the best winter gloves ever. Say goodbye to the days of cold, dry hands! Revel in the comfort of a waterproof outer, and soothe hurting hands with the oil-infused liner! And don't forget your phone...conductive patches on the thumb and index finger let you use touch screen devices without getting chilly fingers.
A design for every rider. Every detail was carefully considered to provide you with the most comfortable, high performance glove ever.

Botanical oil-infused liner to nourish thirsty hands
Durable & slightly stretchy fabric (so comfy you won't want to take it off)
Conductive patches for touch screen devices
Waterproof outers
Flattering unisex design and sizing
Four unique designs to suit your mood, or the terrain
The PALMYRA is the better-than-ever basic.  Along with all the features above, a waterproof, nylon outer protects hands even on the sickest terrain.  Elastic guards and wrist straps mean you won't lose your glove if you happen to tomahawk down the hill.

:

The ASPEN is the leather driving glove for those who spend more time in traffic than on the slopes (but we know where you'd rather be, right?).  Thinly insulated, the ASPEN features a tighter fit and an adjustable Velcro wrist strap on a waterproof leather outer.  Warm enough for pounding the pavement and stylish enough for any suit-and-tie.

You can also follow us on Twitter @darksydegloves.

story:
To us, a watch is not only a time instrument but also a life essential to represent ourselves, to mark every moment, and to create memory. 

Instead of being a norm consumer, we want to realize the revolutionary concept of making everyone an active designer and watchmaker! We believe this is the best practice of the latest consumer trend, Industrial 4.0 concept. Thus we name our first project MMM 4.1. 

As a group of watch enthusiasts, our ultimate goal is to create a seamless platform for you to customize your watch. A unique watch is perfect for nearly all occasions.

More Memomem stories at:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Have you imagined that you can on your own create a characteristic Swiss Made watch simply with your finger tips? 
This is what we are offering you now!

MEMOMEM provides an online design platform for you to visualise your creative color design and to turn your artwork into a sophisticated timepiece. Pick the component, select the color and style, and preview your product. Easy and user-friendly!

 

To achieve the goal of creating a legendary watch that combines quality, value and personalisation, MEMOMEM selects the finest details for you. 

 

In order to make a MEMOMEM watch stand out of the crowd, there is a customised rotor with our signature logo! 

 

No one can stop you from wearing a MEMOMEM watch in any situations, because the rubber strap is highly resistant to most environmental factors including acid, oil, ultraviolet, heat and water. 

The MEMOMEM watch is your best partner for all-day activities! 

All MEMOMEM watches you purchase will be shipped using express courier services (USD35 shipping charge, tax and duties not included). We will ship MEMOMEM watches worldwide to wherever our appointed international courier service provider can reach. If there is any problem with the destination provided by you known to us before delivery, we will ask for alternative address that complies with the scope of service as soon as possible and make appropriate arrangement. The restricted destinations in our knowledge now include Comoros, Falkland Island, Faroe Islands, Greenland, Monaco, North Korea, São Tomé and Príncipe, Somalia, Somaliland, and Tunisia. 

 

 

Since MEMOMEM watchis a personalized product, you shall not cancel or return any of the watch that have been made to measure, altered, or personalized to your specification. No refund will be made once the perk between you and MEMOMEM is concluded.

The product images and information texts displayed on this page reflect the product as much as possible. We cannot guarantee that all pictures accurately reflect the true appearance of your watch. All pictures should be seen as illustrations only, and do not guarantee correct appearance and characteristics.

 

 

Some risks are not avoidable in normal business situations, such as delivery delays. Given every MEMOMEM watch is made and assembled in Switzerland, we admit that unexpected circumstances may be arising from the production and assembly.

However, MEMOMEM strives to provide you with the best ordering experience. To limit the risk of late delivery, MEMOMEM will keep close contact with our supplier and factory, and provide effective solutions. In the meantime, MEMOMEM will update you throughout the entire process.

Thus we name our first project MMM 4.1. As a group of watch enthusiasts, our ultimate goal is to create a seamless platform for you to customize your watch. A unique watch is perfect for nearly all occasions.More Memomem stories at:         

 
 

 

 
 

  Have you imagined that you can on your own create a characteristic Swiss Made watch simply with your finger tips? This is what we are offering you now!MEMOMEM provides an online design platform for you to visualise your creative color design and to turn your artwork into a sophisticated timepiece. Pick the component, select the color and style, and preview your product. Easy and user-friendly!http://www.memomem.com/ksdesign


  MEMOMEM believes details make perfection. Every MEMOMEM watch is complying with the Swiss regulation as "Swiss Made", and is 100% hand assembled, from movement to complete watch. For centuries, the Swiss had a tradition of precision craftsmanship. We choose to manufacture every piece of MEMOMEM watch with the Swiss because of their demand for reliability and stability. Through a well-established system from craftsman training to effective regulations, all MEMOMEM watches are produced under close supervision and attention.     MEMOMEM values precision and perfection. Every component of a MEMOMEM watch is designed, manufactured and assembled in extreme care and strong diligence. To achieve the goal of creating a legendary watch that combines quality, value and personalisation, MEMOMEM selects the finest details for you.  MEMOMEM strives for excellence, so we have chosen the Swiss Made automatic movement that guarantees high degree of reliability and sophistication.  In order to make a MEMOMEM watch stand out of the crowd, there is a customised rotor with our signature logo!    Hour and Minute Hands on a MEMOMEM watch are equipped with GTLS (Gaseous Tritium Light Source) tubes. GTLS is a completely novel light source that combines tritium and phosphors to create visible light which tell the time in the dark. It is safe, reliable and ever lasting in all conditions.    MEMOMEM watchcases are manufactured by marine grade 316L Stainless Steel, with impeccable corrosion resistance, cryogenic strength and excellent formability. These chemical advantages make 316L Stainless Steel a popular material for most high standard watches.  
 FKM Rubber is a high-tech strap material in watch industry because of its multiple advantages in making a watch more user-friendly and daily wearable. No one can stop you from wearing a MEMOMEM watch in any situations, because the rubber strap is highly resistant to most environmental factors including acid, oil, ultraviolet, heat and water. The MEMOMEM watch is your best partner for all-day activities! Our MEMOMEM watches are perfectly fit for men and ladies. Measure your wrist, and pick the strap with your size (Large or Small)! 
  
 
 
  

To realize the headline, you need a watch from MEMOMEM. 
To REMEMBER three essentials in life:
You are unique, and so is your MEMOMEM watch. 
Every component on our MEMOMEM watch including the bezel, watch case, dial and hands can be customized in wide varieties. You can also put your names, messages or anything you can think of onto this characteristic wrist-wear. 
It can become your character, your niche and your lifestyle, because it belongs to you. 

 

To mark every precious moment in your lifetime, all MEMOMEM watches are automatic watches originating in Switzerland.Benefited from our well-established manufacturing competence in Switzerland, MEMOMEM combines every meticulous detail with traditional craftsmanship into every component of your watch.

 

“The best thing about memories is making them”. The special features of a MEMOMEM watch allow you to create a tailored gift for your family, your friends and people that you cherish. Instead of leaving your messages on a wishing card, you now can choose to write on a Swiss-made customized watch.

  
 
 
 
 MEMOMEM is offering every watch lifetime warranty of performance with regulated servicing interval. Within 2 years from delivery of the watch, MEMOMEM bears all repairing costs together with return shipping if the watch is sent in for non-artificial performance failure. After the first 2 years, MEMOMEM watch owners can extend the warranty for lifetime by returning your piece to us for servicing not longer than 2 years interval. Our servicing will include cleaning, lubrication, repairing defective parts and full testing, and will essentially contribute to the long life of your MEMOMEM watch.
 
 All MEMOMEM watches you purchase will be shipped using express courier services (USD35 shipping charge, tax and duties not included). We will ship MEMOMEM watches worldwide to wherever our appointed international courier service provider can reach. If there is any problem with the destination provided by you known to us before delivery, we will ask for alternative address that complies with the scope of service as soon as possible and make appropriate arrangement. The restricted destinations in our knowledge now include Comoros, Falkland Island, Faroe Islands, Greenland, Monaco, North Korea, São Tomé and Príncipe, Somalia, Somaliland, and Tunisia.   Since MEMOMEM watchis a personalized product, you shall not cancel or return any of the watch that have been made to measure, altered, or personalized to your specification. No refund will be made once the perk between you and MEMOMEM is concluded.The product images and information texts displayed on this page reflect the product as much as possible. We cannot guarantee that all pictures accurately reflect the true appearance of your watch. All pictures should be seen as illustrations only, and do not guarantee correct appearance and characteristics.  
Some risks are not avoidable in normal business situations, such as delivery delays. Given every MEMOMEM watch is made and assembled in Switzerland, we admit that unexpected circumstances may be arising from the production and assembly.
However, MEMOMEM strives to provide you with the best ordering experience. To limit the risk of late delivery, MEMOMEM will keep close contact with our supplier and factory, and provide effective solutions. In the meantime, MEMOMEM will update you throughout the entire process.

story:
My late husband Richard and I built a business from the ground up expanding on his trade of re-manufacturing automotive and heavy truck transmissions. As Vice President of Key Accounts and Business Operations, I secured several multi-million dollar contracts in the U.S. and Canada with some of the nations’ largest fleet operators. 

 In 2013, Richard became critically ill and we set out on a very difficult battle with his health, a battle that we would lose. Following open heart surgery and in need of a kidney transplant, I dedicated myself and my energies to caring for my husband, my best friend. Serving as a caregiver in those final days of the life of my husband was a true awakening for me. In an instant I realized the preciousness this life we are given, and that we all must live out our legend. 

Unfortunately, Richard passed away and I had to start over. Following my passions and talents, I designed my first collection in February of 2017 and had completed samples in September 2017 when I experienced my first live television interview, participated in my first runway show, and was named a finalist for Style Chicago’s Design Challenge Presented by Cadillac. I am very proud of this collection and have designed my next collection for FW2018 with the same intense pride. 

 My story is one of struggle, determination, fortitude and faith. I welcome you to take this journey with me! 

When I began creating my first collection in February 2017, I used my own hard-earned money and resources. Along the way, I have driven for Uber, sold items on Ebay, and offered professional training and diet planning in addition to my full-time job. There has been no shortage of hard work!

 

What We Need & What You Get

 I love my first collection! It is beautiful. It is feminine. It is edgy but classic offering a modern twist. All pieces are made of the highest quality textiles, design, and construction. My pieces are built to last.

I have created this campaign and invited you on this journey with me to secure the capital I need to manufacture my second collection and continue living my legend. To show my immense gratitude for your support, I am offering pieces from my SS18 collection at various pledge levels.

If you like what you see in this first collection for SS18, you will love my second collection for FW18, which offers vibrant color with a lot of movement! Thank you for joining me on this amazing journey. With your support, I can continue to live my legend and create beautiful clothing to empower women.

 

Risks & Challenges

With any project or risk comes challenges. Only challenge I foresee would be a delay in manufacturing and delivery of the pledges. I am very strong in communication and will notify all contributors of any delay.

I look forward to making it a success! Thank you for your interest in my project!

story:
Saint. Design

My name is Noah Hahn,

Saint. Design is a passion project of mine, created while dreaming of creating a sense of community through clothing. 

What We Need & What You Get

$600 is needed in order to cover all the costs to begin. Including website setup costs, manufacturing, and printing for the first Shipment of 20.

Why Saint.?

Throughout school life I was known as the "Christian Kid", or "Bible Boy". Which as a young kid can make you feel ashamed for no reason at all. That was until one name didn't fill me with shame, instead filled me with joy and pride of who I am. "Saint.".

Saint. was created to reject shame, and instead show our pride in who we are. Connecting a community in similar situations.

"So then you are no longer strangers and aliens, but you are fellow citizens with the SAINTS and members of the household of God" Ephesians 2:19

Share the Word.

Saint. isn't meant to be a hidden, underground operation, but rather one to be worn proudly. Showing God's children in community.

Share to spread the movement.

story:
ORDER NOW AT 


WWW.BUCKLEPUFFER.COM

 

 

 

 

 

Overview

We have come up with an innovative sylish and stealth way of carrying a tobacco pipe.

Through months of design, redesign, and testing we have developed our final prototype. The Buckle Puffer is machined from solid blocks of 6061 Aluminum, and then nickel plated in an FDA approved facility. The industrial hard Nickel plating gives the Buckle Puffer a bright shine, long lasting durability, and provides safety when smoking out of. The Buckle Puffer was designed with functionality and style in mind.  Two precisely offset Neodymium magnets (the strongest magnets on the market) are used to create a constant pull on the pipe producing a tight rattle free seal. In addition to the pull of these magnets, we've designed a latching system that utilizes the same magnetic field. The pipe can only be ejected when the magnetic powered release button is pressed. Unlike latches powered by unreliable springs, the magnetically powered latch can never wear out. 

Additional features include:

  • Instant put out technology
  • Prevents emission of any noticeable odor due to extremely precise fit.
  • Deep reservoir
  • Double barrel intake
  • 100% boilable for easy cleaning
  • Made in USA

Materials

The Buckle Puffer is precision cut from solid blocks of 6061 Aluminum. Not die cast. This method produces a stronger better quality more consistent product than casting Aluminum into various shapes. After precision machining, an industrial hard Nickel plating is applied using the electroless nickel plating process.  This process is performed by an FDA approved facility. The nickel plating gives the Buckle Puffer a smooth sliding feel, a bright cosmetic look, and superior corrosive protection that will last a lifetime.

Finish

Each Buckle Puffer is hand finished to ensure quality. It will not rust or corrode. Strategic areas are hand polished to a mirror finish, then secured to a quality genuine leather belt for a style that will make you smile.

How the Campaign Works

The Buckle Puffer's fate is in your hands. Buckle Puffer Ltd will need to raise enough funding to begin the first production run of Buckle Puffers. Through your support and the collective pledges from hundreds of others, we can make this first production run a reality.  If we raise enough funds during our 45 day campaign, those who pledged will receive a Buckle Puffer a few months thereafter, allowing time for manufacturing.  If we do not reach our minimum funding goal, our many supporters will be sad, and 100% of every supporter’s pledge will be refunded, and no one will get a Buckle Puffer. Let's work together to make this campaign successful...Please help spread the word!

 

Anything Goes

Feel Sexy

Provoke your optimism.

 

Rock the Suit

Fits with everything from an office suit to your birthday suit...,When it's on, it's on!!

 

Relaxation & Freedom

Let the experience unravel.

__________________________________________________

How To Order

We will contact you via your supplied email address about sizing and color.

Must be 18 years or older to pledge.  For Tobacco Use Only.

__________________________________________________

Perks

$5 = Buckle Puffer Sticker + Twitter Shout-out

 

$20 = Puffer Tee (American Apparel)

 

$75 = EARLY BIRD: Buckle Puffer Belt

 

$85 = EARLY BIRD: Buckle Puffer Belt + Puffer Tee (American Apparel)

 

$85 = Buckle Puffer Belt

 

$150 = BUDDY DEAL: TWO Buckle Puffers

 

$170 = BUDDY DEAL: TWO Buckle Puffer + TWO Puffer Tees (American Apparel)

story:
Welcome to Rocket Glass Works, a small craft glassware company started by me, Sam Schumacher. After starting to work with glass in 2009, I became obsessed, and started to see its connection & use in everyday life. Look around you; at the glass screen you're reading this from, the windows in your room, and the lenses in your glasses. This material has changed the world, and yet its properties and production are still a mystery to many. Large-scale manufacturing has detached us even further, so I set out to build a company that re-connects people to the products they use everyday.

Up to this point, I've been building my client base with commissions and individual sales through a small gallery attached to the cooperative studio I help run. It's been great, and allowed for a lot of creative opportunity. However, I have my sights on something bigger. I'm ready to build a full line of tableware, lighting and home decor products. To accomplish this, I need a little help, and that's where you come in.

With your contributions, I'll be able to expand & develop the RGW product line, making it the best it can be, while building the backend infrastructure and production techniques to bring the products to stores, design shows & customers worldwide.

I have fully developed a handful of products for the first line of RGW glassware. Each of these designs took dozens of sketches, prototypes and failures to lead to the finished design and the creation of efficient manufacturing processes.

I have sketches and ideas coming out my ears, the obstacle lies in translating those ideas into glass. It takes, dedication, patience & funding; two of which I have, one of which, not so much... 

I'm offering up rewards ranging from fully developed products to one-of-a-kind prototypes yet to be created, I know you'll find something to match your budget and still give you something cool in return.

Thanks everybody! I'm really excited to get my glass into your hands & homes! I've been completely captivated by this medium, and I can't wait to share it with the world!
