story:
Visit our website www.MaritimeWatches.com
 
Thank you so much for checking out our campaign, we really do appreciate your support.

What's is "Maritime Watches?"
Defining Maritime:"connected with the sea, especially in relation to seafaring" - Our team created Maritime Watches out of a desire to build a better watch brand, one that gives back to water related causes. Many people desire high quality dive watches but can't afford the multi thousand dollar price tag. Our goal is to create something beautiful, affordable, & robust. We have spent the past 2 years developing this project and finally we are partnering with highly skilled watch makers to fill this gap in the market.

When designing our collections, we made sure of THREE key factors:

1. A luxurious look at an affordable price...
2. A water tight, steel case...
3. And, giving back to water related causes.
 
Three Options:

 1. Ocean Blue (Blue & Black Bezel) 2.  Black Pearl (Black Bezel) & 3. "The Prospector" (Steel & Gold Colored center links)

 

How do We Give Back?
We are partnering with two Non-for profit organizations that are experts in their respective areas. We focus on bringing you the best watches we can, while they focus on their causes that will save many lives both human and marine life.

Going Forward: 
We will continue to design beautiful, functional dive watches for all to enjoy. Join with us on this epic adventure and be apart of every step.  We will send out updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are all caught up on any important details.  We want to create a relationship with our customers because we want you to have the best and most positive experience and product we can offer. We are excited to officially launch this company with your help.

Meet our Team:

Other than my friend Shane, who is a dedicated social media guru, I work on this project from top to bottom on my own. As we move forward I hope to expand my team to other individuals who are passionate about creating beautiful products and having a positive impact on the world. If you have any hesitation that the project will not be able to be completed, let me tell you this: everything is all lined up, all we need is funding and then it's a GO. We are ready to grow and scale to new heights and we hope you join us on this journey. Thank you. 

Watch Specifications:
Case Material:  316L Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 45 mm
Face Diameter: 40 mm
Band Material: 316L Stainless Steel
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Crystal Glass
Display: Analog 
Movement: Automatic NH35 (Trusted & Reliable Seiko Movement)
Date Function: Yes

Water Resistance: 328 feet = 100 meters

Now we're here, on IndieGogo, with a fully functional and beautiful prototype. We just need one more thing... your support! "It's Time for A Change" - Maritime Watch Company

We Need Your Support!
In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but sharing the story with friends and family. By supporting this cause, you have the chance to have a lasting impact on those less fortunate and saving marine life as well. We can't do this without your help. Help start a business that can change the way we think about water. Clean water is a human right.

If we are funded, how will we fulfill your orders?
After a year of design development we have finalized our designs, partnered with a great manufacturer and are ready to move forward. Once the funds are release, we will be able to pay the deposit and start production. Production time should take a month and a half (pending on the size of the order). Then each order will be shipped out by our dedicated team to our amazing backers. 

Please note: some design elements may change going forward to bring to market an even more beautiful and unique design, once we reach production. We will communicate with our backers as we get closer as to what elements may change or not, but please understand our current watches are functional prototypes in attempt to show we can build a beautiful and robust watch. Thank you for understanding and supporting our project.

"It's time for a change"


From all of us here at Maritime Watches, thank you for helping us starting something that matters.

story:
3D printing is a revolutionary way that goods are being made across the world, and for this campaign I am launching a product that celebrates the Maker in all of us. Something that showcases the incredible speed and precision of modern manufacturing, while also serving as a platform for creative messaging and self-expression.

I’m proud to present the Prodigy Ring as that platform—a ring that puts the power of 3D printing in and on your hands.  With the Prodigy Ring, you can showcase your individuality, and let your creativity GROW!

 

  

  

A Prodigy Ring can be designed to commemorate a special date or a meaningful occasion. It can show dedication to an organization or cause you care deeply about, or it could simply hold a positive message that uplifts and encourages you throughout the day. The Prodigy Ring is the ultimate gift for any occasion!

 

Option #1: Material

Strong & Flexible Plastic

  

  

Plastic Prodigy Rings are fun and affordable accessories for you or a large group. These rings are smooth and lightweight and make great gifts.  The Plastic Prodigy Ring is perfect for those who want to take advantage of the many color options for an added level of creative expression.

  

Non-Precious Metals

  

  

3D printed Brass and Bronze are softer metals which mimic the smoothness and shine of precious metals, but at more affordable price points. These softer metals can capture complex designs and detailed fonts with ease, and they can also be left unpolished to showcase a beautiful and intricate surface design.

  

Steel

  

  

3D printed steel is a durable material that can easily stand up to daily use. These rings are remarkably light for their strength and have a smooth but wonderfully textured feel against your skin.

 

Precious Metals

  

  

3D printed brass is coated (or ‘plated’) with a precious metal of your choosing (14k gold, 18k rose gold, or rhodium). This gives the brass the outward appearance of a precious metal to let you make a luxurious statement that won’t break the bank.

The silver materials (Raw or Polished) are solid all the way through, and their ability to stand up to everyday wear make them excellent materials for long-lasting rings. Plated rhodium has incredible rust-proof properties that make it an outstanding material for personalized trophies or mementos.

  

Option #2: Band Style

  

  

Wide Bands have extended edges to help you make a bold statement with your custom ring.

Narrow Bands have a thin strip of metal connecting the top and bottom of the letters. These bands are unisex and discrete, and stand a little taller than an average wedding ring.  This style also makes great custom necklaces.

Stackable Bands make for dainty rings that feel weightless on the finger. These bands can be combined with other stackable rings to produce custom messages that go up and down the finger, or with a variety of materials to take your accessories to the next level!

   

Option #3: Charms

  

 

Charms are centerpiece symbols that give a bold callout to each ring. Use these to truly make your ring a one-of-a-kind masterpiece!

  

Option #4. Custom Message

  

  

Unlike with a typical ring engraving, your personalized message is built into the ring's design to guarantee it won't be overlooked.  No other jewelry like this exists, and no jewelry making process can achieve this other than 3D printing.

  

Option #5. Font

  

   

You can also choose a custom font to add deeper sentiment and personalization to your message.

   

Ring Size

  

Because each ring is individually crafted, it is designed to fit you perfectly.  You only need to specify the size of the ring, which can range from 4.5 to 13.5, and is available in half-size increments.

 

 

 
  

Long Distance Purchases

  

 

 

 

With an infinite number of messages and over a dozen material options and styles to choose from, each Prodigy Ring is guaranteed to be uniquely yours. The Prodigy Ring is bespoke, luxurious and a creative statement; it breaks the mold of the traditional jewelry industry by offering a modern piece that is designed with sophisticated, cutting edge 3D printing technology.  But ultimately, what makes these rings special is that they are designed for you, and by you.

  

  

Want to see more awesome pictures of Prodigy Rings? Check out our Instagram page here. Also, follow us on Facebook!

  

 

Jewelry creation (3D printed or otherwise) typically begins with a wax version of the piece which is hand-carved by a designer. That wax object is then immersed in a heat-resistant material such as plaster to form a mold, and the wax is melted out of the mold to create an empty space that is then filled with molten metal. Once the metal cools, the mold is broken and discarded to obtain the final object.

 

Diagram showing the Step-by-step production of 3D printed jewelry. Image courtesy of Sculpteo.

 

3D printing speeds up the traditional jewelrymaking process by allowing the precise creation of many wax rings in a matter of hours, which is significantly faster than the days that it could take a designer to hand-carve even a single custom piece. (It's also much faster and more scalable than other automated methods of wax mold production, like CNC machining). By automating one of the most time-consuming steps in jewelry production, we can create stunning one-of-a-kind rings for everyone to enjoy at affordable prices.

 

Prodigy Rings make excellent custom napkin rings for banquets and weddings as well! The pictured ring is a wideband in size 8, 3D-printed in raw bronze. Size 13 is recommended for cloth napkins.

 

3D modeling and 3D printing are incredibly powerful tools for creation on their own. But by using computer programming, the average time to complete the 3D modeling design process for any number of rings can be reduced from 30 minutes to 30 SECONDS per ring. See the difference in the video clips below!

 

 

 

Prodigy Rings are designed with precision and detail in mind for any ring variation you choose. Here's some of the steps we've taken to ensure the quality of your ring.

 

Consistent ring sizing across all materials

  

Materials tend to expand when they are 3D printed. The computer code compensates for these changes to calculate an accurate sizing for each ring.

 

Advanced 3D Printability checks that ensure design integrity

  

Each 3D model goes through a digital quality check to ensure that it can withstand the 3D printing process.

 

 

Manual Inspections

  

Finally, each ring will be inspected by hand and thoroughly checked for abnormalities before being shipped to a backer.

 

 

Not Sure About Your Ring Size? No Problem!

The Prodigy Ring has tons of uses that go beyond jewelry, but if you intend on wearing your customized ring then you’ll need to know your ring size.

The most accurate way to determine your ring size is by making a stop to any local jewelry store for a free sizing which only takes a couple minutes. But there are plenty of other ways you can determine your ring size from the comfort of your own home. Take a look these Design Guidelines to learn more!

  

Reward tiers are determined based on your choice of material. From there you can choose any other customization options you like; there is no additional fee for your choice of Band Style, Ring Size, Charm, Custom Message, or Font. Customization choices will be taken via email

  

  

  

  

  

The money from this campaign will be put into reward fulfillment and helping me launch my business. It will also go into buying advanced 3D printing equipment that would help me test new designs so that I can offer them to the public faster. I have many more ideas that I'd like to share with you all, so please, help make this dream a reality!

 

About the Creator

  

My name is Allan! I'm a mechanical engineer based in Arlington Virginia. I received my B.E. from Vanderbilt University in 2014 and the following year I got my M.S. in Technology Entrepreneurship at the University of Notre Dame. When I'm not designing jewelry I can be found watching anime, teaching 3D modeling, or building things at my local TechShop.

  

This Kickstarter means more to me than just selling goods: it's about me finally getting to share my skill and passion with the world. It's about technology, it's about teaching, and most importantly it's about every one of us. We all have innately unique and beautiful things about ourselves which deserve to be celebrated, because each of us is a Prodigy in our own right.

  

So one question remains: What will you create?

  

   

Links to my personal pages:

story:
Hello !  

We are Frederic Leuba and Pascal Robert, founders of MUSE Swiss Art watches. We started our journey with this project in early 2016 and we have enjoyed every minute of it so far. We are delighted and proud to present our creations.  

Our MUSE watches are both reliable timepieces and jewelery with a totally unique and innovative design. Our new concept replaces traditional hands in favor of finely crafted patterns that run at the speed of hours, minutes and seconds, generating compositions in perpetual motion, offering you a true living art.  

We aim to raise funds to produce our watches in Switzerland with the highest quality materials, such as titanium and natural stones and equip them with a 1969’s"collector" movement. Our goal is to offer you a product of luxury with innovative design and the fairest price. That's why we want to be in direct contact with you on kickstarter.  

Our products are aimed at all those who understand and appreciate the art of watchmaking and design and are looking for an exclusive and innovative Swiss automatic mechanical watch with the highest degree of know-how and quality of materials.  

Both watch engineers, we have been working in this industry since 1995.

Thank you for taking the time to read us. We hope you will share with us the adventure of MUSE and we look forward to counting you among our fervent supporters.

 

 

The power of the present moment:  

As our name suggests, our watches are designed to inspire their wearers, whether male or female. In a hyper-connected world that is constantly accelerating, MUSE watches are a poetic and artistic reminder of the need to take a step back to relax and connect with the essentials. That's why we've replaced traditional hands with finely crafted patterns that evolve over time and create compositions in perpetual movement. This show is an invitation to open a parenthesis, to pause, and to live at a more natural rhythm, that of the present moment.  

Swiss watchmaking know-how:  

Our watches are born in the Vaudoises mountains. They were imagined, designed, assembled and tested between St Cergue and La Chaux-de-Fonds. They are dozens of passionate craftsmen, working in different trades, who helped us to give them life. For them, as for us, quality and reliability are paramount principles. We thank them warmly and wish to pay homage to them with our creations which combine traditional mechanics and contemporary aesthetics.  

At the service of design:  

You may have noticed, our logo and the name of our brand do not even appear on the dial. We consider, in fact, that the purity of our design is more important than our advertising. We consider that the purity of our design and your reading comfort is more important than our advertising.

 

 

For us, luxury is synonymous with rarity and high quality. Therefore, each MUSE Swiss Art watches model is limited to 100 pieces.  

You will receive your numbered watch according to your backer's number. It will be accompanied by a certificate of authenticity. You will be sure to own a rare and unique watch. 

Our wish is that your MUSE becomes your talisman, personal and precious, carrying meaning and positive energies that will accompany you everywhere

 

 

The muse watches are dressed with two 44mm or 37mm titanium case. We chose titanium for two reasons. first of all for its lightness and therefore its comfort of use and on the other hand its high resistance which ensures excellent longevity.  

Our two cases are adorned with two sapphire crystal treated with a double antireflection coating that allows you to admire, in the best possible way, the stone dial and the finely chiselled patterns, real lace, which replace the traditional hands.  

The crown is screwed and provides excellent sealing for this kind of watch (50m / 165 feet).  

The finishes play with the contrasts of polish, satin and micro-blasted for a refined and elegant rendering.

 

At the heart of each of our models beats the self-winding mechanical caliber ETA 2776. A historic movement, created in 1969 and whose production has stopped since 1982. We had the heart to revive this treasure asleep by reworking several hundred kits, carefully guarded for decades by a collector. We equipped it with a 21,600 (3Hz) oscillator so as to favor the power reserve. This is 48 hours minimum. 

Embellished with black rhodium, its finishes are unique: "côtes circulaires", graining, diamond-cut edge and a sunny finishes on the oscillating weight whose engraving remembers the logo of the brand. We have renamed it, Caliber MUSE "MU 01".

 

 

Our six models are equipped with Onyx and aventurine dials. These semi-precious materials are found in many prestigious watches. They also echo our philosophy by bringing you their protective benefits.  

If we cross the bar of 100,000 CHF we will offer two other types of stones: Picasso jasper and red jasper. The watches equipped with these dials will have a price equivalent to the models with onyx dial. Choose your watch now and you can choose one of these dials later.

 

                       STELLA - Aventurine Dial - 37mm

 

All the jewels we offer as a reward are in silver. Necklaces and earrings, 23mm or 38mm, are all inspired by our MUSE logo.

 

 

There are no better ambassadors than satisfied customers. That's why we attach great importance to the quality of our products.  

MUSE watches are guaranteed for 3 years. The after-sales service of our products is done in the canton of Neuchâtel, Switzerland, with the same craftsmen who assembled them during the production. An excellent knowledge of the product is thus guaranteed.

Your right of return is 30 days.

 

 

MUSE watches will be shipped for free around the world except for the following countries: Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, Lebanon, Myanmar, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen.

Please note that you are responsible for potential customs duties or other taxes applicable to your area.  

Follow the various information and updates in the "ACTU" section on the campaign page. You can always contact us by e-mail at the following address: info@muse-watches.com

 

 https://www.facebook.com/MuseSwissArtsWatches/    

 https://www.instagram.com/muse_watches/

 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC39SArGNSgrI3UivIBzf8GA

 

 info@muse-watches.com

 

 

VERSION FRANCAISE

 

 

 

Hello ! 

Nous sommes Frederic Leuba et Pascal Robert, fondateurs de MUSE Swiss Art watches. Nous avons commencé notre voyage avec ce projet au début de l'année 2016 et nous en avons aimé chaque minute, jusqu'à présent. Nous sommes ravis et fiers de vous présenter nos créations. 

Nos montres MUSE sont à la fois des garde-temps fiables et des bijoux au design totalement unique et innovant. Notre nouveau concept fait disparaître les aiguilles traditionnelles au profit de motifs finement ouvragés qui tournent à la vitesse des heures, des minutes et des secondes, générant des compositions en perpétuel mouvement, vous offrant ainsi un véritable art vivant. 

Nous cherchons à lever des fonds pour produire nos montres en Suisse avec des matériaux de la plus haute qualité, comme le titane et les pierres naturelles et les équiper d’un mouvement « collector » de 1969. Notre but est de vous offrir un produit de luxe au design novateur et au prix le plus juste. C'est pour cela que nous cherchons à être en lien direct avec vous, sur kickstarter. 

Nos produits s’adressent à toutes celles et ceux qui comprennent et apprécient l'art de l'horlogerie et du design et recherchent une montre mécanique automatique suisse, exclusive et innovante, avec le plus haut degré de savoir-faire et de qualité des matériaux. 

Tous les deux ingénieurs horlogers, nous œuvrons dans cette industrie depuis 1995. 

Merci d’avoir pris le temps de nous lire. Nous espérons que vous partagerez avec nous l’aventure de MUSE et nous nous réjouissons de vous compter parmi nos fervents supporters.

 

 

La puissance du moment présent :  

Comme notre nom l’évoque, nos montres ont pour ambition d’inspirer leurs porteurs, qu'ils soient masculins ou féminins. Dans un monde hyper connecté qui accélère sans cesse, les montres MUSE rappellent de manière poétique et artistique, la nécessité de prendre un peu de recul pour se ressourcer et se relier à l’essentiel. C’est pourquoi nous avons remplacé les aiguilles traditionnelles par des motifs finement ouvragés qui évoluent au fil du temps et dessinent des compositions en perpétuel mouvement. Ce spectacle est une invitation à ouvrir une parenthèse, se poser, et vivre à un rythme plus naturel, celui de l’instant présent.  

Le savoir-faire horloger Suisse :  

Nos montres sont nées dans les montagnes Vaudoises. Elles ont été imaginées, conçues, assemblées et testées entre St Cergue et la Chaux-de-fonds. Ce sont des dizaines d’artisans passionnés, œuvrant dans différents corps de métier, qui nous ont aidés à leur donner vie. Pour eux comme pour nous la qualité et la fiabilité sont des principes primordiaux. Nous les remercions vivement et souhaitons leur rendre hommage avec nos créations qui allient mécanique traditionnelle et esthétique contemporaine.  

Au service du design : 

Vous vous en êtes peut-être aperçu, notre logo et le nom de notre marque n'apparaissent même pas sur le cadran. Nous considérons en effet, que la pureté de notre design et votre confort de lecture sont plus important que notre publicité.

 

 

Pour nous, luxe rime avec rareté et haute qualité. Par conséquent, chaque modèle de montre MUSE Swiss Art watches est limité à 100 pièces.  

Vous recevrez votre montre numérotée selon votre ordre d’arrivée de contributeurs. Elle sera accompagné d’un certificat d’authenticité. 

Vous serez ainsi sûr de posséder une montre rare et unique. Notre souhait est que votre MUSE devienne votre talisman, personnel et précieux, porteur de sens et d’énergies positives qui vous accompagnera partout.

 

 

Les montres MUSE sont habillées avec deux boîtiers en titane de 44mm ou 37mm. Nous avons choisi le titane pour deux raisons. D’une part sa légèreté, donc son confort d’utilisation, et d’autre part sa haute résistance qui assure une excellente longévité.    

Nos deux boîtiers sont équipés de deux verres saphir traités avec un double antireflet qui vous permet d’admirer de la meilleure façon possible le cadran en pierre et les motifs ouvragés, véritable dentelles qui remplacent les aiguilles traditionnelles.  

La couronne est vissée et assure une excellente étanchéité pour ce genre de montre (50m / 165 feet).  

Les finitions jouent avec les contrastes du poli, du satiné et du microbillé pour un rendu raffiné et élégant.

 

 

Au cœur de chacun de nos modèles bat le calibre mécanique à remontage automatique ETA 2776. Un mouvement historique, créé en 1969 et dont la production a cessé depuis 1982. 

Nous avons eu à cœur de réanimer ce trésor endormi en retravaillant plusieurs centaines de kits, précieusement gardés durant des décennies, par un collectionneur. Nous l’avons équipé d’un oscillateur à 21'600 alternances (3Hz) de façon à privilégier la réserve de marche. Celle-ci est de 48h minimum. 

Paré de rhodium noir, ses finitions sont inédites : côtes circulaires, angles diamantés et une masse oscillante ensoleillée dont la gravure rappelle le logo de la marque. Nous l'avons renommé Calibre MUSE "MU 01".

 

 

Nos six modèles sont équipés de cadran en pierre naturelle semi-précieuse, soit en onyx, soit en aventurine. Ces matières équipent parfois des montres de prestige. Elles viennent aussi faire écho à notre philosophie en vous apportant leurs bienfaits protecteurs.   

Si nous franchissons la barre des 100'000 CHF (91'000€) nous vous proposerons deux autres pierres semi-précieuses elles aussi : la jaspe Picasso et la jaspe rouge. Les montres équipées de ces cadrans auront un prix équivalent au modèle équipé d'un cadran en onyx. Choisissez votre montre maintenant et vous pourrez choisir l’un ou l’autre de ces cadrans après la campagne.

 

            Cadran en aventurine pour montre STELLA 37mm

 

Tous les bijoux que nous proposons en récompense sont en argent. Les colliers et boucles d'oreilles, 23mm ou 38 mm, s'inspirent tous de notre logo MUSE.

 

 

Il n'y a pas de meilleurs ambassadeurs que des clients satisfaits. C'est pourquoi nous attachons une grande importance à la qualité de nos produits. 

Les montres MUSE sont garanties 3 ans. Le SAV de nos produits se fait dans le canton de Neuchâtel, en Suisse, avec les mêmes artisans qui les ont assemblés lors de la production. Une excellente connaissance du produit est ainsi garantie.

Votre droit de retour est de 30 jours.

 

MUSE vous offre la livraison de votre montre partout dans le monde sauf pour les pays suivants : Argentine, Biélorussie, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libye, Liban, Myanmar, Corée du Nord, Russie, Somalie, Soudan, Syrie et Yémen.  

Prenez note, s'il vous plait, que vous êtes responsables des potentiels droits de douanes ou autres taxes applicables à votre région.

Suivez les différentes informations et mises à jours dans la rubrique "ACTU" sur la page de la campagne. 

Vous pouvez toujours nous contacter par e-mail à l'adresse suivante :  

info@muse-watches.com

 https://www.facebook.com/MuseSwissArtsWatches/

 https://www.instagram.com/muse_watches/

 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC39SArGNSgrI3UivIBzf8GA

 

  info@muse-watches.com

TANOURA - Onyx Dial - 44mm / Limited Edition of 100 pieces CLICK HERE TO SEE THE VIDEO  AKYLON - Onyx Dial - 44mm / Limited Edition of 100 pieces CLICK HERE TO SEE THE VIDEO  KAGURA Full Black PVD - Onyx Dial - 44mm / Limited Edition of 100 pieces CLICK HERE TO SEE THE VIDEO  TANOURA - Onyx Dial - 37mm / Limited Edition of 100 pieces CLICK HERE TO SEE THE VIDEO  STELLA S - Onyx Dial - 37mm / Limited Edition of 100 pieces CLICK HERE TO SEE THE VIDEO  STELLA - PVD Red-gold - Aventurine Dial - 37mm / Limited Edition of 100 pieces CLICK HERE TO SEE THE VIDEO
 



 
Hello !  
We are Frederic Leuba and Pascal Robert, founders of MUSE Swiss Art watches. We started our journey with this project in early 2016 and we have enjoyed every minute of it so far. We are delighted and proud to present our creations.  
Our MUSE watches are both reliable timepieces and jewelery with a totally unique and innovative design. Our new concept replaces traditional hands in favor of finely crafted patterns that run at the speed of hours, minutes and seconds, generating compositions in perpetual motion, offering you a true living art.  
We aim to raise funds to produce our watches in Switzerland with the highest quality materials, such as titanium and natural stones and equip them with a 1969’s"collector" movement. Our goal is to offer you a product of luxury with innovative design and the fairest price. That's why we want to be in direct contact with you on kickstarter.  
Our products are aimed at all those who understand and appreciate the art of watchmaking and design and are looking for an exclusive and innovative Swiss automatic mechanical watch with the highest degree of know-how and quality of materials.  
Both watch engineers, we have been working in this industry since 1995.
Thank you for taking the time to read us. We hope you will share with us the adventure of MUSE and we look forward to counting you among our fervent supporters.
 
STELLA - PVD Red-gold - Aventurine Dial - 37mm
 


 
The power of the present moment:  
As our name suggests, our watches are designed to inspire their wearers, whether male or female. In a hyper-connected world that is constantly accelerating, MUSE watches are a poetic and artistic reminder of the need to take a step back to relax and connect with the essentials. That's why we've replaced traditional hands with finely crafted patterns that evolve over time and create compositions in perpetual movement. This show is an invitation to open a parenthesis, to pause, and to live at a more natural rhythm, that of the present moment.  
Swiss watchmaking know-how:  
Our watches are born in the Vaudoises mountains. They were imagined, designed, assembled and tested between St Cergue and La Chaux-de-Fonds. They are dozens of passionate craftsmen, working in different trades, who helped us to give them life. For them, as for us, quality and reliability are paramount principles. We thank them warmly and wish to pay homage to them with our creations which combine traditional mechanics and contemporary aesthetics.  
At the service of design:  
You may have noticed, our logo and the name of our brand do not even appear on the dial. We consider, in fact, that the purity of our design is more important than our advertising. We consider that the purity of our design and your reading comfort is more important than our advertising.
 


 
For us, luxury is synonymous with rarity and high quality. Therefore, each MUSE Swiss Art watches model is limited to 100 pieces.  
You will receive your numbered watch according to your backer's number. It will be accompanied by a certificate of authenticity. You will be sure to own a rare and unique watch. 
Our wish is that your MUSE becomes your talisman, personal and precious, carrying meaning and positive energies that will accompany you everywhere
 

 

 
The muse watches are dressed with two 44mm or 37mm titanium case. We chose titanium for two reasons. first of all for its lightness and therefore its comfort of use and on the other hand its high resistance which ensures excellent longevity.  
Our two cases are adorned with two sapphire crystal treated with a double antireflection coating that allows you to admire, in the best possible way, the stone dial and the finely chiselled patterns, real lace, which replace the traditional hands.  
The crown is screwed and provides excellent sealing for this kind of watch (50m / 165 feet).  
The finishes play with the contrasts of polish, satin and micro-blasted for a refined and elegant rendering.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
MUSE Caliber MU01 - 3Hz - 48h PWR - 25 Jewels
At the heart of each of our models beats the self-winding mechanical caliber ETA 2776. A historic movement, created in 1969 and whose production has stopped since 1982. We had the heart to revive this treasure asleep by reworking several hundred kits, carefully guarded for decades by a collector. We equipped it with a 21,600 (3Hz) oscillator so as to favor the power reserve. This is 48 hours minimum. 
Embellished with black rhodium, its finishes are unique: "côtes circulaires", graining, diamond-cut edge and a sunny finishes on the oscillating weight whose engraving remembers the logo of the brand. We have renamed it, Caliber MUSE "MU 01".
 


 
Our six models are equipped with Onyx and aventurine dials. These semi-precious materials are found in many prestigious watches. They also echo our philosophy by bringing you their protective benefits.  
If we cross the bar of 100,000 CHF we will offer two other types of stones: Picasso jasper and red jasper. The watches equipped with these dials will have a price equivalent to the models with onyx dial. Choose your watch now and you can choose one of these dials later.
 

                       STELLA - Aventurine Dial - 37mm
 




MUSE Art jewelry - Necklace 38
All the jewels we offer as a reward are in silver. Necklaces and earrings, 23mm or 38mm, are all inspired by our MUSE logo.
 





 
There are no better ambassadors than satisfied customers. That's why we attach great importance to the quality of our products.  
MUSE watches are guaranteed for 3 years. The after-sales service of our products is done in the canton of Neuchâtel, Switzerland, with the same craftsmen who assembled them during the production. An excellent knowledge of the product is thus guaranteed.
Your right of return is 30 days.
 

 
MUSE watches will be shipped for free around the world except for the following countries: Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, Lebanon, Myanmar, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen.
Please note that you are responsible for potential customs duties or other taxes applicable to your area.  
Follow the various information and updates in the "ACTU" section on the campaign page. You can always contact us by e-mail at the following address: info@muse-watches.com
 



 https://www.facebook.com/MuseSwissArtsWatches/    
 https://www.instagram.com/muse_watches/
 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC39SArGNSgrI3UivIBzf8GA
 

 info@muse-watches.com
 
 
VERSION FRANCAISE
 

 
 


 
Hello ! 
Nous sommes Frederic Leuba et Pascal Robert, fondateurs de MUSE Swiss Art watches. Nous avons commencé notre voyage avec ce projet au début de l'année 2016 et nous en avons aimé chaque minute, jusqu'à présent. Nous sommes ravis et fiers de vous présenter nos créations. 
Nos montres MUSE sont à la fois des garde-temps fiables et des bijoux au design totalement unique et innovant. Notre nouveau concept fait disparaître les aiguilles traditionnelles au profit de motifs finement ouvragés qui tournent à la vitesse des heures, des minutes et des secondes, générant des compositions en perpétuel mouvement, vous offrant ainsi un véritable art vivant. 
Nous cherchons à lever des fonds pour produire nos montres en Suisse avec des matériaux de la plus haute qualité, comme le titane et les pierres naturelles et les équiper d’un mouvement « collector » de 1969. Notre but est de vous offrir un produit de luxe au design novateur et au prix le plus juste. C'est pour cela que nous cherchons à être en lien direct avec vous, sur kickstarter. 
Nos produits s’adressent à toutes celles et ceux qui comprennent et apprécient l'art de l'horlogerie et du design et recherchent une montre mécanique automatique suisse, exclusive et innovante, avec le plus haut degré de savoir-faire et de qualité des matériaux. 
Tous les deux ingénieurs horlogers, nous œuvrons dans cette industrie depuis 1995. 
Merci d’avoir pris le temps de nous lire. Nous espérons que vous partagerez avec nous l’aventure de MUSE et nous nous réjouissons de vous compter parmi nos fervents supporters.
 
KAGURA - Full black PVD - Onyx dial - 44mm

Ecrin Muse Swiss Art watches et STELLA - pink gold - 37mm


MUSE Art jewelry - Silver necklace 38
